Character.753: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
Character.943: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
Character.3941: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time

Quote.0: People respect it when someone they are distant from is boring and harmless. However, they only like that person because he or she doesn't get in their way. No human would want to hang around a boring person.
Quote.1: Manga that's born from people taking responsibility for their own work, banging their head in frustration, feeling cornered, and like they want to escape, and then using that extreme situation, mental ability, stamina, and panic to create... would never lose to some soul-less manga that's just made up of other people's ideas without any kind of resolve!
Quote.2: Well, nothing in life is ever certain.
Quote.3: The real world is scary. It’s pain to deal with other people.
Quote.4: Nobody thinks they're cuter than others unless they're conceited.
Quote.5: It's you that I want. Do you not want me? Don't you want to be together? (to Rin)
Quote.6: [after Naruto does his Shadow Clone Jutsu] Oh, there sure is a lot of garbage scattered around here. But, trash is just trash after all. It simply needs to be cleaned up.
Quote.7: [after drawing the infinity symbol] I thought of it myself, it stands for... Mugen.
Quote.8: Sometimes, the questions are complicated - and the answers are simple.
Quote.9: If you're gonna kill me, then kill me. If you're gonna execute me, stop waiting. Until then, I live by my own rules!
Quote.10: I'm prepared for anything! Up until now, I have been running away from every fight, afraid of losing. But running away is even worse than losing. Unless one continues to fight, without succumbing to the pain of defeat, it is impossible to achieve victory. That is what people I love taught me.
Quote.11: You're too loud, Police Girl. I don't care if you're a vampire, you're still English. Have some manners.
Quote.12: I was in the avatar state... But I was outside my body watching myself. It was scary. I was scary...
Quote.13: There's no one who can live their whole life being completely uncorrupted.
Quote.14: No matter what, if you intend to interfere, I will eliminate you too.
Quote.15: But... If you're the kind of person who can devote herself like that to someone, then I'll bet you anything there's someone out there who'll fall in love with you.
Quote.16: There are three conditions to terrify someone: One, the monster can't speak. Two, the monster has to be unidentifiable. Three, it's meaningless if the monster can die.
Quote.17: I want to hear it again, yet I don't want to hear it again. I want to see her, yet I don't want to see her. What do you call this kind of feeling again?
Quote.18: Dreams, ambition, love, hope; in this world, could the glories of a youthful heart be.. forbidden?
Quote.19: The second humans lose their comfort zone, the more simplistic their actions become.
Quote.20: You can’t cause a change without some courage and determination.
Quote.23: You guys are free to have a fight anywhere you want to, but interfering with an innocent girl’s meal is unforgivable. And, if it happens to be Lina Inverse’s meal, you’re lucky to be alive!
Quote.24: If you begin to regret, you’ll dull your future decisions and let others make your choices for you. All that’s left for you then is to die. Nobody can foretell the outcome. Each decision you make holds meaning only by affecting your next decision.
Quote.25: There's only one certainty in life. A strong man stands above and conquers all!
Quote.26: If a person you love doesn't love you back, you're worthless. That's what I always told myself.
Quote.27: For one that turns against God to come in person to receive judgement... Today is a good day!
Quote.28: 'Slacking off' sounds bad. However, enjoying more of your day with the time you saved by doing your job in a clever way is definitely not a bad thing. Times like that are what makes a human's life rich. If you exaggerate, it could be called laziness, surely. However, people only become mature when they are able to balance work with enjoyment. In short, if all you care about is your job, you're not fully mature.
Quote.29: It is a tasteless life if you don't have something you regret.
Quote.30:
You’re always in my mind and it makes me both happy and sad.
I guess that’s what it feels like to be in love.
Quote.31: Playing a game by yourself is boring. You need a loser to crush so badly they can't recover.
Quote.32: Know how strong you are... and do what you can do. If you misjudge your abilities on the battlefield... you'll get yourself killed.
Quote.33: [To Starrk, about Lilynette] That child with you... Can you send her somewhere else? I can't really go all out with her there.
Quote.34: Hey! Hold on, come back! I'll tell you what! I can lower those 1,000 provisions down to 800, just as long as you take part in the five hour story telling party.
Quote.35: Hmm... *puts on a happy face* Delectable tea... *changes to serious face* or deadly poison?..
Quote.36: There are all sorts of mysteries in this world, like snacks and candy and sweets falling from the sky!
Quote.37: How far do you want me to suppress myself so that you'll be satisfied?
Quote.38: The amount of money one owns ultimately decides the victor. This doesn't stop within the walls of a casino, or it's cash flow. It's a rule that forms the basis for a capitalist society!
Quote.39: If all life is so important, then the most evil of all beings on this earth are without a doubt humans. If there weren't any people on earth, the environment and conditions that all living things live in would be drastically better. Even if there were no school to teach us the stuff we know, it would still be obvious to everyone, wouldn't it? Just think of all that's happened to the earth due to our desires and ego.
Quote.40: I went with raven for a long bathroom break.
Quote.41: I can't promise you that good things will come to your life, but I do know that no one but you have the power to give meaning to your life in this world.
Quote.42: Bearing the sins of the children of earth, the moon begins to consume its light.
Quote.43: This will just be a signal fire. We’ll fill those heroes full of holes… and put them in their place. All for a brighter future.
Quote.44: I don't think it's possible to save everyone. I just want to save as many as I can.
Quote.45: If there's no one happy, is it really a victory?
Quote.46: Sometimes, your future is already set, and there's nothing you can do about it. There are some things you just can't change, no matter how hard you work. Unfair, don't you think? It isn't an easy fact to accept, and I'm not telling you to, but that's just how life is. Unfair.
Quote.47: Very well. Then krieg(German for "war") is what you shall have. We are a clenched fist, ready to strike down all who oppose us with our might. But, after enduring over half a century wallowing in the darkness, for us, a simple, "ordinary" war will no longer be sufficient. We need a massive war! A war beyond any other that man's history has ever known! We are but a single battalion, the remnants of a defeated army numbering less than a thousand strong. However, I believe that each of you old warriors is worth a thousand of their sickly soft children! We represent a force that could easily defeat an army of a million and one men!
Quote.48: Love always happens without warning. At that time, the gears of fate will start spinning. Just like the hands of a clock, two people’s hearts will separate and meet again. Eventually, they reunite.
Quote.49: Without love, people could exist without knowing truth and falsehood. By knowing it, they cry and grief and get lost. I was the same back then.
Quote.50: Schools are facilities where human society secludes the troublesome children by age criteria.
Quote.51: Anything at all. Just this once I'll fulfil whatever your wish is. Whether is world conquest, or eternal life, or to defeat the saiyans that are coming to earth.
Quote.52: What is truly good about a person can't be expressed in words, that it can not. What matters is the feeling of trust one gets after spending time with him.
Quote.53: The coin is appreciated...but not as much as your smile.
Quote.54: Everyone exists for a reason. As small as it can be. I'm sure you have a meaning too.
Quote.55: Are you telling me to exploit an opening for the likes of you? Do not speak out of your league, boy.
Quote.56: It's over when you give up.
Quote.57: I wasn't always fighting for love and justice. I was fighting for my friends and loved ones.
Quote.58: Look Goku, you can go out in public and have your hair sticking out in every direction if you want to, but not me!
Quote.59: [To Yoruichi] It's alright! Kurosaki-san's potential is greater than mine!
Quote.60: In the end, L is indeed the greatest detective on earth...
Quote.61: They say that fools learn from their experiences, while the wise learn from history. I hope you're not a fool.
Quote.62: When I'm with Iruka-sensei, I think if that's what having a father is like... *to Sasuke* When I'm with you, I think if that's what having a brother is like.
Quote.63: Of course they are my family, isn't it obvious? And a wonderful family they were. It happened long ago when I was still in the flower of my youth. The cities began to grow wild, people lost hope for the future, they became lazy idol time wasters. And to my everlasting shame I was no exception. Thus I began to watch the 7 O'Clock news religiously every night!
Quote.64: Why did you run away, Chitoge-chan? No... I don't want this... I won't be happy with you just giving up... To end up liking the same person. It's painful, for sure but Chitoge-chan, you like him enough to not be able to face him again after that, don't you? Regardless of who ends up with him, I want to be satisfied when it happens. I thought for sure that you think the same way. Is there a reason why that can't happen? Tell me Chitoge-chan...
Quote.65: About Usui, I really don't know anything at all. It's mortifying... Yet I already don't want him to turn away.
Quote.66: It’s like a doll house. You hang out together and pretend to be friends, but when it doesn’t suit them they abandon just you.
Quote.67: That's right! Whatever the tragedy or the blunder is, only the things that actually happened are written in stone!
Quote.68: Sharing your secret with someone means you involve them in your problems. It may make things easier for you, but your family could end up suffering for it too.
Quote.69: No matter what, I’ll be always be your friend. No matter how far you go, I’ll be thinking about you everyday.
Quote.70: Whether it's good or bad, it's so unfortunate to wake up during a dream.
Quote.71: When you're sincere about doing something, you're stalked by the fear that there's no turning back.
Quote.72: I yearn for true gender equality. I have no patience for one who talks about female privilege when it suits them, and then complains about someone "not being a man" when it's convenient.
Quote.73: I don't think much of you for sending a girl your age to the place where a wierd man lives.
Quote.74: The only one who can beat me, is me!
Quote.75: All those times I got hurt, all the crying I did, all the pain I felt, all the fighting I did with my life at stake... And my reward was her name and a single smile. Jeez... Talk about unequal compensation.
Quote.76: There are some scars that never fade.
Quote.77: You remind me so much of myself from the past. I also used to think that perseveration had some credits, that it was the best way to change the world... but with that alone you cannot accomplish anything. Without power, you're doomed to become dependent on others, that's the way the world works.
Quote.78: Saying things like "It would be troubling for her" are just really convenient excuses for yourself. If you can forgive yourself like this, then you can just enjoy staying in your comfort zone, right?
Quote.79: If you keep bad-mouthing someone, you might feel like as if you are on a higher position than that person. But in actual fact, its completely wrong to do that!
Quote.80: What exactly is the end? The end. The end. The end. I've seen the end over and over. What is the end?
Quote.81: Brilliant people shine more brightly than ordinary ones. They never regret or agonize over what they've done.
Quote.82: I am not a hero. I can't make anyone happy with any result. I can only do what I deem right with me not hating my choice at a later point.
Quote.83: I'm pretty confident about my reflexes. And pretty strong too. I'm a guy after all. When the time comes, I can protect you even at the cost of my life.
Quote.84: I can do it I know I can do it. I’m the guy who gets it done broken bones or not… No matter what… I can do it! I can fight!
Quote.85: Nobody knows what will happen in the future. Something even better might happen tomorrow.
Quote.86: I'm just a dude who's way ahead of his time you know? Does that mean I was born too early because time can't keep up with me?
Quote.87: You were ready to kill another creature, yet you’re scared of being killed yourself. Don’t you think that is strange? When you point a gun at a living thing… this is what that act means.
Quote.88: I took the life of the woman I was supposed to call mother in the process of being born... in order to become the world's strongest shinobi... I became the incarnation of sand...
Quote.89: The tattoo is a symbol of my family, the Star Clan. They were a clan of assassins. Everybody knew they would do anything for money. After a while killing people wasn't enough, they were hungry for even more power so they began hunting human souls. But now it's just me, I'm the last member of the Star Clan. 13 years ago their souls were taken by Lord Death and the Meisters from the Academy. At the time I was still a baby, so they didn't take my soul. That's when the school took me in. That's it. The end.
Quote.90: If you truly desire greatness, you must first know what makes you weak!
Quote.91: Every sword belongs in its sheath. Go back to the sheath your master holds. Go back to Griffith.
Quote.93: It's nice not to be alone.
Quote.94: At night the moon shines with daylight. Our dreams are an ocean… each wave is the dream of an individual. The tide is controlled by the pull of the moon… it illuminates our dreams. If you open the moon, you will discover the path to dreams. When one finds death, they are submerged in the ocean of dreams. At the end of life’s path is a door that leads us to this ocean. Our dreams transcend the self to reach this sea… connecting us all within its lunar tide.
Quote.95: *after seeing Grevil's unicorn hairstyle for the first time* I've never seen such a creative hairstyle!
Quote.96: Having my fate decided for me from the time I was born goes against my view of beauty.
Quote.97: On this planet you call females who have yet to become adults, girls. It makes sense then that since you'll eventually become withes, you should be called Magical Girls.
Quote.98: Why did he smile? Why? Did he know he would be saved? No. In that instant, he must have understood that his life was going to end. Death. He accepted it. He was fully prepared for it and smiled.
Quote.99: You won’t know if you don’t give it a try.
Quote.100: What is right? What is wrong? In this mixed up world, deciding what is right and wrong is not easy. You can't just go by somebody else's rules. If you let yourself be controlled like that, you'll just become a puppet that can't make decisions on it's own. You have to live by your rules.
Quote.101: No, things can change. But things don't have to change. Whatever is fine.
Quote.102: When surviving today is so simple and matter-of-fact people tend to forget. They forget what it means to eat a pig. They say all life is equal, but how much life is consumed to keep them alive everyday?
Quote.103: It’s a slow but steady effort. I’m going to beat fantasy with science. This is exhilarating.
Quote.105: Don't be frightened by the waves. If we read the flow of the waves and accept them, we can overcome it. There's no wave that can't be overcome!!
Quote.106: In all things, I think having a dream requires having the resolve to struggle with reality.
Quote.107: To me, Kawai-san is like a mirror. A mirror that reflects all the bad parts about you. A devil-like mirror that contaminates your heart.
Quote.108: Hey Kaiba, maybe we should duel sometimes.
Quote.110: Let me tell you how important it is to keep your mouth shut. Me, I've seen so many damn people going on and on about "these will be the last words you ever hear" and "take these words with you to the afterlife", and then that gives whoever they're fighting an opening to strike back. Crazy, isn't it? I see it all the time, in books, in plays, even in real life! I don't even know why, but somehow the more comfortable someone is with killing, the more they flap their mouth when it comes time to do the deed, yakking on and on and on. As you might have guessed, I myself happen to be such a person! And therefore, as such, in light of that revelation, I'll say that one is enough, and since that one is of course myself, I want you all to shut up. You're boring. Swallow those words and take them to the afterlife yourself, if you want them delivered there so damn much.
Quote.111: Things would have been so much better back then... If we had heard each other's voices. I hate myself. I was selfish, and I never thought about anyone else's feelings. Since then, my classmates have all looked down on me. I've lived for seventeen years, and I haven't lived one of them as a good person. The only time I heard your voice was when we got into that fight. And what pisses me off the most is the fact that I haven't changed at all since back then! But.,. But now, I think I can understand what you were saying... Nishimiya. Me and you... Can we be... friends? Shit!! I went way too far!! I was just gonna apologize and get out of here! Why the hell did I end up asking her to be friends?... Why did I even say that?! Jeez, that's so embarrassing! How can you even say that?
Quote.112: It's true that there's a lot we don't know about this world. But that's why we must go forward and do what we can. One thing at a time.
Quote.113: Love is like a firework from the past... it's more beautiful for it to go to pieces and scatter far off.
Quote.114: It is those who possess wisdom who are the greatest fools. History has shown us this. You could say that this is the final warning from God to those who resist.
Quote.115: As far as I'm concerned, I think I'd rather know the truth. Even if learning the truth changed who I am.
Quote.116: But your kindess doesn't come from being a Coordinator... it's because of who you are Mr. Yamato
Quote.117: Who am I? One name you might have for me is the world, or you might call me the universe, or perhaps God, or perhaps the Truth. I am All, and I am One. So, of course, this also means that I am you. I am the truth of your despair, the inescapable price of your boastfulness. And now, I will bestow upon you the despair you deserve.
Quote.118: *to Edward* There's something disturbing about having to be in your debt...
Quote.119: The moment you back down is the moment you lose!
Quote.120: The avatar state is a defense mechanism - designed to empower you with all the skills and knowledge of the past avatars. The glow is the combination of all your past lives. Focusing their energy to your body.
Quote.121: Liars always say the same things. "I'll believe in you. I'll protect you. I care about you." I'll never believe that again... No one will ever protect me. I won't even think about it. I'll fight alone, live alone, and die alone. I know... I've felt it on my skin and in my body... That it's better not to believe in anyone than believe and be betrayed!
Quote.122: Never trust anyone too much, remember the devil was once an angel.
Quote.123: Stop living in the past like an old man.
Quote.124: Even the most ignorant, innocent child will eventually grow up as they learn what true pain is. It affects what they say, what they think… and they become real people.
Quote.125: Items to invent: Bed, massage chair, humidifier, rubber band, Rube Goldberg Machine, religion... Religions are invented? I've learned something new.
Quote.126: Man fears death and yet, at the same time, man is drawn to death. Death is endlessly consumed by men in cities and in literature. It is a singular event in one's life that none may reverse. That is what I desire.
Quote.127: There are no convenient miracles, and there is logic that should be inviolable.
Quote.128: I may be inept, but at least I don't forget to aim high!
Quote.129: All those times I got hurt, all the crying I did, all the pain I felt, all the fighting I did with my life at stake... And my reward was her name and a single smile. Jeez... Talk about unequal compensation.
Quote.130: (to Kiritsugu) I shall not let you die easily. I shall use healing magic to regenerate your heart and lungs, while I rend every inch of your flesh. In pain and despair, you will die as you suffer. And while you die, you will curse them... You will curse the cowardice of those who hired you! You will curse the Einzbern's for disgracing the Holy Grail War!
Quote.131: How come you wear glasses? I mean, you're really pretty but you can only appeal to a tiny section of the fanbase. *To Miyuki*
Quote.132: Why do people depend on each other? In the end you're on your own.
Quote.133: I'm not fat, I'm pleasingly plump!
Quote.134: If you don't want to be betrayed anymore, then start by doubting the person you want to doubt the least.
Quote.135: Freedom is something you have to fight for, rather than something you're given. Being free means being prepared to carry that burden.
Quote.136: No, not yet, now that you've made me this serious. Regret as much as you damn well want!!
Quote.137: Idiot! Don't spit while you talk! Your virginity might be contagious!
Quote.138: You're right. Whether I ever see that ygirl again or not, that doesn't change the fact that this promise is important to me. I'm gonna go on treasuring it.
Quote.139: It's very difficult for me to step on an ant without crushing it.
Quote.140: When I saw him struggling, with the odds stacked against him… it got me thinking… Who protects the heroes when they need protecting?
Quote.141: It doesn't matter how much trash you pick up. You just have a pile of trash.
Quote.142: You didn't raise a weapon. You raised a son.
Quote.143: There's only one certainty in life. A strong man stands above and conquers all!
Quote.144: Once the revenge is dealt, you are required to pay the compensation.
Quote.145: I don't have any regrets. I'm glad I met you, Sousuke Sagara.
Quote.146: How can you work so hard? There might be something really bad waiting for you ahead. How can you still make yourself move on despite that? The older we get...the number of annoying and troublesome things we have to face only increases- and wonderful things stop happening. In the days ahead of us... we have to bear each painful thing one at a time, conquering them...overcoming them...the power to do that just doesn't spring out of me. The power to move ahead.
Quote.147: *talking about King Bumi* This isn't about finding a teacher. This is about finding my friend.
Quote.148: If you have a wish, don't go back to the past and redo everything. If you want to change yourself, don't change the past, but change who you are now!
Quote.149: The weakness that had accepted death now became the strength of wanting to live.
Quote.150: Mere scores do not measure a person’s worth.
Quote.151: Only brute warriors find glory in destruction!
Quote.152: We are all farsighted, we give importance to those things that are far from us, while neglecting the things that are close to us... only to realize their value later, when they are out-of-reach again.
Quote.153: Everyone thinks at some point if what they are doing has any meaning or not. Will the day come when I get what's coming to me, or not? How much influence does my existence have on the world at all, or doesn't it?
Quote.154: It doesn't matter what you do, if you live and die as you like. However, no matter what road you end up taking, remember to protect the people that are precious to you.
Quote.155: You shouldn't mouth off when you don't know shit.
Quote.156: Happiness depends on each person. If you think you're happy, then you must be happy.
Quote.157: What could be more beautiful than doing work that puts your soul at risk, because that's what it means to be alive!
Quote.158: There were two kinds of strength. One was the strength that came with having something to protect. The other was the strength of having nothing to lose.
Quote.159: All for one, one for all! There are times when a man has no choice but to act!
Quote.161: I am not a hero. I can't make anyone happy with any result. I can only do what I deem right with me not hating my choice at a later point.
Quote.162: Adults say you shouldn't do things half-heartedly. But in reality, you can get by with doing just that. Of course, it would be great to stand out. But how many people can live like that? It's really hard to be exceptional.
Quote.164: In exchange of being able to get something that normal people can't have... you must let go of what normal people have.
Quote.165: I can do it I know I can do it. I’m the guy who gets it done broken bones or not… No matter what… I can do it! I can fight!
Quote.166: Being able to realize your own fault is a virtue.
Quote.167: I can kill anything that exists - even if it's a god.
Quote.168: I will hunt down Kikyou's killer and avenge her death
Quote.169: Even if it's dangerous, even if it lasts until the ends of the earth... I need to walk my path.
Quote.170: It's true, crying unexpectedly does make you feel better. When you're an adult you forget that.
Quote.171: You can't be strong not because you can't throw away your weakness, but it's because you don't face your own weakness.
Quote.172: If you live after giving up on the things you want to do and the world around you doesn't sparkle, it's the same thing as being dead. If you don't give up, even if it's short, it'll be a fantastic life!
Quote.173: There isn't anything more painful than to have someone say that he doesn't believe you.
Quote.174: The slight difference between those who always aim for the top and those who don’t, it’ll come to matter in a big way once you all emerge into society.
Quote.175: If you can't see something through the end, then don't do anything.
Quote.176: It's troublesome if the villain doesn't show their evil. Villains are necessary to make knights into heroes.
Quote.177: There are things you can only share with someone by fighting. For instance, how serious you are.
Quote.178:
Maybe we can't help feeling scared alone! But we're all right here, together! We've got out friends close by!
Now there's nothing to fear, because we are not alone!
Quote.179: Any event is a personal episode, where only those involved comprehend what's happening.
Quote.180: Game over. If that's the case. I just have to play again.
Quote.181: Play to the last note, and leave no regrets.
Quote.182: Any treasure you attain without anyone ever working for it is no treasure at all.
Quote.183: No, order exists to protect the people. We must not aim our guns at the wrong people. What we should eliminate are our doubting hearts and minds.
Quote.184: One ought to experience loneliness at least once or twice in life. No, you have to experience it. The idea of being chained to another person without reprieve is far more abnormal and disquieting. One has no choice but to learn about loneliness. I’m sure some things can’t be experienced without it.
Quote.185: If you come across an event that's too good to be true, it's probably poison.
Quote.186: I never... [chuckles]... laughed this hard in front of my parents.(to Tohru)
Quote.187: Those who hurt her, put her in danger, those who caused her misfortune, I eliminate them. Even if the cause is me.
Quote.188: [After getting hit by Yammy Llargo's Bala] You mean do I have a defence? Truth is, I’ve never really had any plans against any attacks. I just knew I had to win so I did. That’s my plan. I don’t care if you’re higher ranked than the other Espadas' were, to me it’s all the same. I’ve gotta defeat you so I’ll find a way to do it. Simple.
Quote.189: I'll give you some wise words, Shining Sleepless General. All heroes die of overwork.
Quote.190: Your own path is for you to find out on your own.
Quote.191: What exactly would change if I wanted revenge, was consumed by hatred, or went insane with rage?
Quote.192: If you were to turn into a snake tomorrow and began devouring humans, and from the same mouth you devoured humans, you cried out to me, "I Love You!" Would I still be able to say "I Love You," the same way I do today?
Quote.193: Are you afraid of other people? I know that by keeping others at a distance you avoid a betrayal of your trust, but you must endure the loneliness. Man can never completely erase this sadness, because all men are fundamentally alone. Pain is something man must carry in his heart, and since the heart feels pain so easily, some believe that life is pain.
Quote.194: I want you to be happy. I want you to laugh a lot. I don't know what exactly I'll be able to do for you, but I'll always be by your side.
Quote.195: Even if you destroy the world, the world you wish for won't come.
Quote.196: If I was the protagonist in this story, I'm sure someone would come save me. It would be like a miracle. But I have no one to save me. There is no god who would grant me a miracle. I'm a murderer, after all. But I've done nothing bad. All I did was feed myself. If I hadn't, I would have starved to death. Would it have been better that way? Am I evil because I didn't let myself starve to death? Give me an answer, Muroi-san! I didn't willingly become such a creature. But if I have a life, shouldn't I treasure it? Is that a sin? Muroi-san! This is what it means to be abandoned by God.
Quote.197: Don’t forget that kindness can hurt people too.
Quote.198: To be able to forgive those who have wronged you... only the truly strong can do that.
Quote.199: Let those who seek death find it.
Quote.200: Your darkness and hopelessness are like vapor. They're nothing more than shadows that shall melt away and disappear under the moon's light
Quote.201: People can live without friends. Friends are not oxygen or water, they're more like luxury goods.
Quote.202: Justice is a weapon. It can be used to cause harm, but it cannot protect or save others.
Quote.203: The more fun I have, the more it'll hurt when we part ways. I know that all too well.
Quote.204: There’s no reason to pretend to be cool. Let’s show our lame sides. That’s who we really are, after all.
Quote.205: The future of humanity will be doomed. Having said that, I’m not about to sit around while we all get slaughtered.
Quote.206: Earthbenders! You don't know me, but I know of you. Every child of my water tribe village was rocked to sleep with stories of the brave Earth Kingdom and the courageous earthbenders who guard its borders. Some of you may think that the Fire Nation has made you powerless. Yes, they have taken away your ability to bend, but they can't take away your courage and it is your courage they should truly fear! Because it runs deeper than any mine you've been forced to dig, any ocean that keeps you far from home. It is the strength of your hearts that make you who you are, hearts that will remain unbroken when all rock and stone has eroded away. The time to fight back is now! I can tell you the Avatar has returned! So remember your courage, earthbenders, let us fight for our freedom!
Quote.207: If all things are in fact preordained, then why... why is humanity able to think for itself?
Quote.208: Having someone saying you're okay as you are and being needed by that person... It was nice to have someone like that.
Quote.209: Can we really be proud of our own survival that's predicated on sacrificing our own? There lives aren't all we lose.
Quote.210: It is a virtue to devote one's self to something, firmly believing in one's own ideals. But that does not mean it's alright to belittle the ideals or feelings of others. If you lead such a busy life and you don't realize how your parents feel, it's only self-satisfaction. It's alright to stop every now and again, if you want a moment's rest, if you want to feel what other people feel.
Quote.211: No matter how painful, no matter how much solitary struggle awaits us, because we have joyous moments like this, we can face the challenges over and over again.
Quote.212: I'm sorry for not saying this to you, Akihisa-kun. I know I shouldn't hide this from you, but I was wondering whether I should tell you this. Because if I told you that, you'll definitely tell me "you should go", or something like that. I understand you'll say that for my sake, but I don't wish to hear you say anything like a farewell to me, Akihisa-kun. Because-- I like you, Akihisa-kun!
Quote.213: There's nothing known for certain. Adolescence is like that anyway. It's like a train ride with no destination and nobody. There's no destination and outside everything is flashing by so you can't see anything.
Quote.214: Revenge that involves unrelated people isn’t valid at all. All he’s doing is hiding his vengeful hate with the title of God’s representative and acting sublime.
Quote.215: Even if you can't move anymore, or your back gets bent out of shape, it doesn't matter! What matters is what's inside! Not what someone looks like, dammit!
Quote.216: [dying] Kuchiki, I dragged you into this...I'm sorry. You must've been scared. Thanks, Kuchiki. Thanks to you...I can leave my heart here.
Quote.218: Is that so? Then I'll just use "pathetic" next time.
Quote.219: What I want isn't money or pretty dresses, but a place that recognizes me as who I am. Fairy Tail is my other family, and it is a far more warming family than here!
Quote.220: I want to know if it is a crime to live as you are, when you are different from others.
Quote.221: There's always someone better. That's why I can't stop fighting.
Quote.222: Loathe me, o fierce deity. Accept and awaken to your maelstrom of hate...god of calamity, Yato!
Quote.223: Please, let that iron guard down for a minute. It's only hurting you. I know when you've hit rock bottom, people trying to cheer you up can be really annoying. "What would you know?" "Just leave me alone." But what if someone you're pushing away is really worried about you? That'd be a shame.
Quote.224: It is a simple story. There is nothing that brings me happiness. It does not matter, let it be believing in people or having people believe in me. What other people called happiness did not bring me any joy.
Quote.225: Once you've been loved once and have loved once, you cannot forget it.
Quote.226: Hey God, if you're there, my life has really sucked. So please, for once, let me have a sweet dream.
Quote.227: You can't carry me AND dodge at the same time, Tetsuzaemon!
Quote.228: Blood calls for blood, while hatred begets hatred, and the energy that comes forth begins to take root in this earth and engraves a crest of blood. They never learn, no matter how many times history is repeated. Humans are foolish, sorrowful creatures.
Quote.229: If you don't see her, you won't fall in love. If you don't fall in love, you won't get hurt.
Quote.230: There's something wrong with people who seek reality in fiction.
Quote.231: We think the flower on the precipice is beautiful, because our fear makes our feet stop at its edge, instead of stepping forward into the sky, like that flower.
Quote.232: Little fool, demons exist, all right. They’re inside our hearts.
Quote.233: Why don't you give it a try? You don't need to come up with a reason, you try things because you want to. Isn't that how you start doing things that you really like?
Quote.234: Humans are easily tempted. When they are poised on the edge of hellish despair, and a spider-thin thread of salvation presents itself, they will invariably grasp it. No matter the human.
Quote.235: Something this, something that--jeez you're annoying. (to Yuki)
Quote.236: Unlike in manga and anime, in real life, no heroes can save you when you're down.
Quote.237:
The flowers bloom, then wither... The stars shine and one day become extinct. This earth, the sun, the galaxies and even the big universe,
someday will be destroyed. Compared with that, the human life is only a blink, just a little time. In that short time - people are born, laugh, cry, fight, are injured, feel joy, sadness, hate someone, love someone. All in just a moment. And then, are embraced by the eternal sleep called death.
Quote.238: Trunks, I never hugged you as a baby... let me hug you.
Quote.239: He realized that he had lost sight of something important. No matter what turn he took he should have kept singing. Even if his songs couldn’t save the world, he could still sing songs for her. Don’t ever lose sight of what’s important to you.
Quote.240: Simple yet mysterious. Distant ancestors unlike any plant or animal we've ever seen. These groups of odd creatures have induced whispers of fear among man since ancient times.
Quote.242: [clapping] A beautiful speech, I can see it now, you truly are a prince with the royal blood of a Saiyan.
Quote.244: Don't care anything and do not do anything that's a waste of energy.
Quote.245: What's past is past. I cannot redo it, nor go back to it. I have escaped from that scene and still continue to live. All I can do is look forward.
Quote.246: In order to learn you may have to risk your life... no, even your soul.
Quote.247: Aang, this is my friend Foo-Foo Cuddly Poofs, Foo-Foo Cuddly Poofs, Aang.
Quote.249: Choosing your calling based solely on your talents won't always guarantee you happiness.
Quote.250: That rose whip of his must be ten feet long. Where does he stash it? All the ways I can think of sound kinda painful.
Quote.251: A man who raises his hands on a woman is trash. If I have to become trash in order to survive... It'll be just like dying.
Quote.252: As my fingers and toes re-grew like fingernails or hair over and over and over and over... and over again, every single time I got the feeling that I truly, truly truly was a monster.
Quote.253: No matter what I attempt, even if it's the most simple of tasks, it always ends in failure. Unfortunately, I find that my life is one big regret after another. Yet, after all these years, I still don't know when to give up. Is it my fault to keep trying when the results are always the same? Is it impossible for me to make things right? Even if I'd try to give up, I don't think I could. It's not in my nature to submit in the face of disappointment. In the end, I guess I'm just a glutton for punishment. I really am an idiot.
Quote.254: If you have time to think of a beautiful end, then live beautifully until the end.
Quote.255: How can you not see the beauty of our evil?!
Quote.256: *after Katsura asks him about what he is doing* Well, I suppose I'm doing something odd, like jogging or taking a walk or something like that.
Quote.257: Don't judge me based on the same story and laugh.
Quote.258: Now listen up, any power that surpasses reason, still comes from reason, right? Magic isn't some kind of miraculous power. It is a talent that only works when the flow of energy inside of us and the flow of energy in the natural world are in perfect synchronization. To perform magic one must have a strong mind and the ability to focus. It should take over your being and come pouring out of your soul! If all we do is worry about following rules, then our magic will never progress.
Quote.259: [his parting words to Arrietty] My heart is stronger now, because you're in it.
Quote.260: Is there a different sorry for simple and complicated situations? Whether it's a simple or complicated problem, if you think you've done something wrong, then in the end you'd say sorry either way.
Quote.261: Especially Yuki... He was my first love after all... [Tohru stops walking]
Quote.262: He's swinging his sword with the grace of a flyswatter. That's no way to survive.
Quote.263: Anything can happen. No one ever thinks it will until it does. What will happen, happens. That's how the world is. The most important thing is to not let the tragedy defeat you. To believe that you can get through it.
Quote.264: For a pregnant woman to give birth, she's gotta feel the pain of pulling a watermelon out of her nostril. For an Artist to create a masterpiece, he's gotta feel the pain of pulling entire galaxies out  of his ass.
Quote.265: [talking about food] The last bite. It is the final one, and the most suitable one to enjoy the most. No matter what it costs, I will not give it up.
Quote.266: First we’re the milkmen, and now we’re stinkin’ farmers. We never did this in Orin Temple.
Quote.267: Azula always lies, Azula always lies.
Quote.268: If you are afraid to get hurt, you won't obtain what you really desire.
Quote.269: I don't give a damn about the real world.
Quote.270: Broken promises, regardless of how horrid transform into rage that stinks to the ocean floor. Through those bonds, we're drawn together countless times.
Quote.271: How did you learn of the reality that you speak of? The entire world is governed by the reasoning of dirty-minded adults. We're able to obscure reality according to our obsessions. We're never actually shown what reality is. In this case, the reality that you speak of is a half-baked nonsense that has been altered. Trying to conform this bullshit reality into the one you want is like trying to join two pieces of a puzzle that do not fit.
Quote.272: History books are rewritten with the changing of times. At any rate, classroom lectures are worlds apart from the battlefield.
Quote.273: A person grows up when he's able to overcome hardships. Protection is important, but there are some things that a person must learn on his own.
Quote.274: I don't have the strength or wisdom to stand up against someone who is insusceptible to reason. You won't even give me time to make an effort. That's why I'm going to rely on numbers!
Quote.275: The choices we make in life have unlimited possibilities.
Quote.276:
People... humans are the being who look for happiness. What the Britannian boy, Lelouch, wanted to have was nothing but a small happiness. It's nothing special. At least at the root of his motives, there were only humble wishes that were simply natural to any human. Who could ever disclaim such dreams and such vows? Who could ever have the right to do that? However, whoever you might be, without choice, you have to deal with others and with the world, and have yourself be regulated and set down. Therefore, in the face of the world's wills, your personal speculations are so ephemeral they can't help being overwhelmed. Sins and punishments, destiny and judgment. What stands in front of Lelouch is the past he brought forth by himself. Is it a hatred resulting from the fact that humans are humans? Nonetheless, for now, we should be grateful... Yes, at least, to the fact that humans are the beings who look for happiness. 
A remaining piece of hope, a faint sign of wishes will be born from despairs.
Quote.277: Don't you think it's beautiful? That rosy red that spreads only where the body is wounded. Shall I paint you in that lovely red... little boy?
Quote.278: The worst kind of pain is when you're smiling just to stop the tears from falling.
Quote.279: Hero? No! We're pirates! I love heroes, but I don't wanna be one! Do you know what heroes are? Say there is a chunk of meat. Pirates will have a banquet and eat it, but heroes will share it with other people. I want all the meat!
Quote.281: The lifespan of a human is certainly way too short. That's why you've got to make the most of it and live your life to the fullest.
Quote.282: She was stolen away before I even realized I liked her.
Quote.283: Everyone makes mistakes, but then you recover. Look at all of the friends you have here who adore you. It would be difficult for anything to change that. If you keep that in mind, you should be able to get back on your feet any number of times.
Quote.284: Unwilling to listen or see anything else, you lost yourself in your own world and became incapable of seeing the things around you.
Quote.285: No matter where you are, people find a way to entertain themselves.
Quote.286: There are things that take a long time to acquire. Friends. Love. Really, nothing has been a waste.
Quote.287: (To Ichigo Kurosaki before getting shot point-blank by his Cero) I see. So you show no mercy. Just like a true Hollow. I care not. Defeated by you as I stand, my existence holds no further meaning. Do it.
Quote.288: No matter how big the place is, we'll eventually reach the edge if we keep moving forward!
Quote.289: There's a limit to the amount of pleasure a person can obtain. But pleasure brought out by intellect is infinite.
Quote.290: First, we are born in the same galaxy. Born of the same species. Our lifetimes overlap. The meetings between humans are so unlikely as to be miraculous. To laugh, to cry, and to fall in love... Everyone is made up of a collection of 1% chances. Thus, I'm dazzled by the fact that there are so many miracles in this world.
Quote.291: In this country, we don't call someone who can stop a scooter with her bare hands a girl. We call her a mountain gorilla.
Quote.292: They’ve been exposed to the outside world, up close and personal. They’ve had that fear planted in them. And they’ve endured it. Overcome it. Each has grown from that experience. And forgotten how to hesitate.
Quote.293: I never said I was a witch did I? You just made that assumption all on your own. I'm really just a cat with a ridiculous amount of magical power.
Quote.294: I want everyone to feel safe again soon...I want this to be a world where people can without fighting each other.
Quote.295: A fair warning... we ninja of the Sand aren't as easygoing as those of the Leaf. But getting close to Kuroari so carelessly...isn't good!
Quote.296: What people seek when the depths of despair and death are upon them, may be the silhouettes of the ones they love.
Quote.298: The world is very boring. Everyone tries to live like a normal person without a second thought.
Quote.299: Nanika, will you forgive me for being a bad big brother?
Quote.300: I work by myself. Only for Princess Tomoyo.
Quote.301: They say "there's always room for dessert", but for me, it's more like "there's always room if someone else is paying".
Quote.302: No world is more painful to live in than this one.
Quote.303: Going against the flow... takes a lot of courage. I respect that. Maybe people who can do it are just stupid, but... Well... What I'm sure of is that people like that are rare. So you can't call them common. You can't call them normal, either. People like you... get called special.
Quote.304: I thought that everyone in Japan had to be packed in there. So I turned to my dad and asked him,"Do you know how many people are here right now"? He said probably fifty thousand, since the stadium was full. I was only one little person in that big crowded stadium filled with people, and there were so many people there, but it was just a handful out of the entire population. Up till then, I always thought that I was, I don't know, kind of a special person. It was fun to be with my family. I had fun with my classmates. And the school that I was going to, it had just about the most interesting people anywhere. But that night, I realized it wasn't true. All the stuff we did during class that I thought was so fun and cool, was probably happening just like that in classes in other schools all over Japan. There was nothing special about my school at all.
Quote.305: If I wouldn't have tripped, you wouldn't have stopped, now would you?
Quote.306: People only have substance within the memories of other people. And that's why there were all kinds of mes. There weren't a lot of mes per se, I was just inside all sorts of people, that's all.
Quote.308: Don't go thinking you're my rival, you circus freak!
Quote.309: They are your words! This is your heart! Our desire to help our friends belongs to us!
Quote.310: What the hell can you hope to protect when your feelings are the only weapons you've got?
Quote.311: I start wars, resolve them myself, then I buy up the war ravaged lands for a low prince and make a killing off redevelopment and reconstruction concessions!It is a brilliant scheme.

Quote.313: My ears do more than just frame my face.
Quote.314: If you take someone at puberty, a teen... introduce him or her to a member of the opposite sex around the same age and say, "This is the person who was meant for you"... and then go on to spend a lot of time together... why wouldn't you fall for them?
Quote.315: Just because I've gotten weaker, it doesn't mean that you've gotten stronger, right?
Quote.316: Ore-sama no bigi ni yoi na!

Quote.318: I'm so happy I think I might die.
Quote.319: God, if this world, this story, is moving ahead according to the system you created... then I first need to destroy that illusion!
Quote.320: But I think... I want to live with all my memories. Even if they're bad memories. Even if they're memories that only hurt me... that I'd rather forget. If I keep them and keep trying, without running away, then someday I'll be strong enough that those memories can't defeat me. I believe that because I want to think that there's no such thing as a memory that's ok to forget.
Quote.321: Everything in the world is actually connected. That means, even if we get separated, we'll never be alone.

Quote.323: Huh? What are you, retarded? I'm super thoughtful. That's why I stay in the corner and don't cause anyone trouble.

Quote.328: Eternity is instantaneous, and an instant is eternal.

Quote.333: No matter how hard you try, you cannot exceed your true capabilities.

Quote.335: Enough. I've had enough. I'm dropping out.
Quote.336: Please don't worry, Mister, I only came here to obliterate you – not rob you.
Quote.337: Death is simply another stage of our life.

As long as it is a man and not a god, doing the governing, he can never be perfect. But should he neglect to make efforts to reach for perfection, a king will surely tumble down the slippery slope towards evil with no one around to stop him.
Quote.339: I'm alright. All I did was lose a love. Even without George, this city is still overflowing with people. My days are busy. Nothing will change. But... why do the lights look like they're in black-and-white? Just because one person isn't here.

Quote.341: I would no longer fight against my feelings because I realized how useless and ineffective it was to fight them.
Quote.342: Sometimes violence is the only way to get the message across.
Quote.343: A pig that doesn't fly is just a pig.
Quote.344: We'd rather die than abandon our comrade!!!

Quote.346: I'm not highly aware. I'm highly self-aware.
Quote.347: What else would I be here for? To illegally enter the premises, of course.
Quote.348: Listen carefully because I'm only gonna say this once, I love you.
Quote.349: The ticket to the future, is always blank.

Quote.351: Once you've recognized your mistakes, it's easy enough to correct them.
Quote.352: The world isn't as bad as you think.
Quote.353: Doubt them. Question them, suspect them... and take a good, long look into their hearts. Humans are the kind of beings that can't put their pain into words, after all.
Quote.354: A good book is always good, no matter how many times you’ve already read it.
Quote.355: I think running a restaurant would fit you better than being an assassin.
Quote.356: I was trying to chop off your head from the eye up. A little scratch counts as a miss.
Quote.357: People's thoughts don't always mirror how they feel. That's why they sometimes make decisions that seem nonsensical.
Quote.358: Caring for things brings a lot of trouble.
Quote.359: We have to fight in order to live. That's what will make us strong.
Quote.360: Sure there are things you can't do, things that seem impossible, but that's what makes everyone unique!
Quote.361: If you ever feel like dying to help the universe, just let me know. I'll be waiting.
Quote.362: There are some people who don't want a solution. Some want things to stay the way they are. There's no way to make things convenient for everyone. So the only option is to find a compromise.

Quote.364: Destiny is a mysterious thing. It lets people reach their intended destinations.
Quote.365: Thinking about whether it's because of jealousy or just saying it out loud by accident, aren't they all part of love? Love isn't always sweet.

Quote.367: For me and Mello, L has been the only person we adore, and the only person who deserves our respect.
Quote.368: If we are frightened, the people behind us will be, as well. You must be a shining star... that washes away fear, so that those behind you wil not be afraid!
Quote.369: Don't judge people from the outside. Like any rose has thorns, the more the person appears nice on the outside, the more you should doubt the inside.

Yet without all the individual ones, the all can't exist. This world flows by following grander laws that we can't even imagine. To recognize that flow, to work in it. To decompose, and recreate, that is alchemy.
Quote.371: There are things that cannot be taken back. But the world will keep on spinning whether you laugh or you cry. High school life will eventually end too.
Quote.372: Give advice and good guidance, then halt if such is of no avail. Do not disgrace yourself for it.

Quote.375: We have walked through the darkness of this world, that’s why we are able to see even a sliver of light.

Quote.377: What do you think a truly unusual life would be like? Something really unique. It'd be the kind of life where every single day, nothing new ever happened. Nothing changed. That kind of a life is truly unusual.
Quote.378: The pain of getting hit, the frustration of loosing, the joy of winning, all of that. They've been driven into this body, fists, and this head. It becomes my strength in the next fight. All of my battles up to now, those memories, they are all of my power.
Quote.379: Heroes and villains both thrive on violence, but we're still categorized. "You're good." "You're evil." That's how it is!! Symbol of peace? Hah!! In the end you're just a tool for violence, made to keep us down! And violence only breeds more violence.

Quote.382: Live by your own rules. And have reality accept your own rules. If you are able to do that, the future is all yours.

Quote.384: There’s nothing crueler than letting a dream end midway.
Quote.385: No human beings, regardless of who they might be, want to look directly at their own shortcomings.
Quote.386: I believe the difference between those up there and me is the question of whether you have given up or not.
Quote.387: What keeps me alive in this world is neither bodily organs, nor muscles - it's my soul!
Quote.388: As I had encountered kindness, I wanted to be kind myself. I wanted to be able to do something, just like others had done for me.
Quote.389: He wouldn't notice if I got a crew cut, shaved my head bald, or even grew an afro!
Quote.390:
When I get bigger, big enough to go somewhere by myself, I want to go to a land that’s far away.
I want to go to a faraway island. I want to go to an island that has no people. I want to go to an island that has no pain or sadness.
There are no adults, children, classmates, teachers or my mom on that island.
On that island, I can climb a tree when I want to climb, swim in the sea when I want to swim, and sleep when I want to sleep.
In the island, I think about the town that I left behind. Kids go to school, as if nothing has changed.
Adults go to the office, as if nothing has changed. Mom eats, as if nothing has changed.
When I think about the town without me, I feel a sense of relief. I want to go far, far away.
Quote.392: Are you not your own master? You should walk the path you desire. No one else should be able to stop you.
Quote.393: Don't just blame yourself. You're not tough enough to withstand everything. Split the load, to my shoulders, and to Ichigo's. Just stack it little by little. That's why we've become stronger. Believe in him, Rukia.
Quote.394: It wasn't the pain that hurt me. Rather, it was the feeling of me being ripped apart, and the sound of the knife plunging deep, deep into my heart. That incomparably bittersweet fear. My body shook and trembled at the thought of it. My silent weeping contained my uneasiness, my loneliness, my will to live. My tears aren't from the pain either, or from the fear of the encounter. It was for the brush of death that I had never before experienced, but had now fallen in love with, even though I pray every night for the strength to live.
Quote.395: If at some point in life, you made a mistake or keep failing over and over again, and you can't help but think it's useless and you're a good for nothing; Remember, you're only taking a detour. And I'm sure further along your path will come a day where you think, "It was a good life experience". That's why it'll be fine.
Quote.396: Yeah, I know. It's not good to be reading Jump at my age.
Quote.397: Manga endings might always end the same. However, if it comes to life. Neither you or I are mere readers. We are writers. We can change the ending.
Quote.398: ...There are two ways to change a country. Destroy it from the outside, or correct it from the inside.
Quote.399: I can't exactly fight a war with a big smile on my face.
Quote.400: [referring to a group of thugs] I disposed of some dangerous beasts. Mere animals that just happened to resemble humans.
Quote.401: Those who do not want to advance spiritually are fools.
Quote.402: You brake the law and I'll punish you, there is no room for discussion.
Quote.403: Life's never been easy! What you abandon, and what you take. Even I know that repeating that choice is what it means to be alive! But... If that means I have to keep losing everything over and over... I'll risk my life to try and take it all! I won't give up! Ever!
Quote.404: It takes more courage to speak the truth than it does to wield a sword.
Quote.405: A detective who corners a culprit with their reasoning and drives them to suicide in front of himself - is no different than a murderer.

Quote.407: It must make you sick to know an underling like me is going to kill you.
Quote.408: Sometimes you can't see what's right in front of you.
Quote.409: It's not the face that makes someone a monster, it's the choices they make with their lives.
Quote.410: We will not just fade away, thought there's no way to know how long it may last. We WILL leave our mark on this world!
Quote.411: What kind of mad scientist worries about not getting enough vegetables?

And the one who keeps the promise, or breaks the promise, is you. No one else can be burdened with holding you to a promise that's made to yourself.
Quote.413: Do you know how many civilizations are crowded together in the universe and how much energy is used up in one second? Eventually, you humans, will leave this planet as well, and join us. You wouldn't want to be handed an empty, desolate universe then, would you?
Quote.414: You've got nice solid childbearing hips, so I think you're sure to have healthy babies. Uwehehehe
Quote.415: Kurosaki Ichigo, those are the words of someone who does not know true despair. So I will show you. This is what true despair looks like.
Quote.416: Sometimes good people make bad choices. It doesn't mean they are bad people. It means they're human.
Quote.417: Got it. I won’t let Sakuna out.

Quote.424: Defiance toward parents is an establishment of one's self; it's a sign of independence.

Quote.441: There's no such thing as no such thing.

For the sake of the ninja world and as the Kazekage, I will guard you with my life. If as a member of Akatsuki, Sasuke Uchiha stands in the way of the ninja coalition... I will show him no mercy.
Quote.444: You sure can talk the talk, but you're not quite ready to walk the walk. Time's up, it's my turn.

Quote.451: I may be the only swords-lady among the pillars who can’t cut a demon’s head off. But anyone who creates poison that can kill demons can be quite amazing.

Quote.453: Seems appropriate for Nicol. A weapon fit for a coward.
Quote.454: Humans are creatures that dream. Different from others, they want to be special. Everyone knows there's no magic in this world.
Quote.455: We reset, and return to our separate lives. You can't reset your life, but you can reset your relationships.

Quote.457: Loving someone means entrusting all of yourself to that person.
Quote.458: When I told him my feelings, he understood. When I said I wasn't lying, he believed me.
Quote.459: True kindness isn't something we're born with. It's something we had to work on... (to Tohru)

Quote.462: I'm only attracted to girls in games!! Reality is just a shitty game.
Quote.463: I probably won't be able to look forward to summer for a long time. My chest will hurt. My tears will be overflowing. But this warmth in my hands and these summer memories will live on in my heart.

Quote.466: Really, what's with that? Such a power doesn't even appear in Academy City's databank. If I am a 1-in-328,571 prodigy, then aren't you, the only one in Academy City, a 1-in-2,300,000 disaster?
Quote.467: What do you think it means to be the strongest man in the world? The strongest man in the world has power, skill, wisdom, heart, and luck.

Quote.471: To take responsibility is to take the pain onto yourself. It means to bear more pain than what others felt because of your mistake.
Quote.472: I love the type of woman who can kick my ***.

Quote.474: When I fall it will be silent and tragic.

Quote.476: As far as relationships with other people go, they don't just end because one person decides that it's over.
Quote.477: Ugly? I'll have you know they call me The Rose of Martial Arts around here!
Quote.478: If I were to survive, but couldn't protect what was important to me, then I might as well be dead.
Quote.479: Whether we die or not, isn't really that big a deal.
Quote.480: I am Horo the Wise Wolf, and I am a very proud wolf.
Quote.481: A guy with only a cat for a friend won't look attractive by playing cool.
Quote.482: Listen up, I don't care what you punks do around the universe. But with this, my sword… anywhere it can reach, is part of my country! Asses who blunder in and violate my things… whether it be a Shogun, whether it be space pirates, whether it be a meteorite - I'll destroy them!!
Quote.483: I must protect my fledging Utopia.
Quote.484: Even if I'm not around, nothing will change, you say? It's not as if I'm living my life to prove something silly like that! We live our lives to see how the world changes around us, don't you think?
Quote.485: People have to save themselves. One person saving another is impossible.
Quote.486: It doesn't matter if we're wrong...because every time we go wrong, we'll continue to look for the right answer.
Quote.487: *To Tamaki* It's easy to feel sorry for him, but the hardships that he endured as a child, molded him into the person he is today. He'll be fine, the Host Club is his refuge, which means when all is said and done... he still has us.
Quote.488: What are you so hesitant about? It’s your dream, isn’t it? It’s right in front of you and you’re wavering? You gotta be reckless, and take whatever you can!
Quote.489: I now see that the circumstances of birth are irrelevant. It is what you do with the gift of life that determines who you are.
Quote.490: If a person continues killing, their heart changes into that of a demon without them even noticing.
Quote.491: The past is gone, you can not change it! But the future is based on the decision you make!
Quote.492: Is there... somebody precious to you?
Quote.493: There are people who can't act unless they're faced with a problem. Unless they find their reason. All I was left with was the sinking suspicion that I'd gone horribly wrong.
Quote.494: What a strange creature is man, who would cage himself so willingly.
Quote.495: I knew it. The Earth Forces' new mobile weapons. Father, I knew you'd betray us all!
Quote.496: I was, I am, and I remain a soldier, sworn to devote my heart and soul to the restoration of humankind! There is no greater glory than than dying for that belief!
Quote.497: No matter how strong the pain is, it's our duty to move forward. You're wrong for running away from reality.
Quote.498: Why did I fall in love with music in the first place?
Quote.499: People cannot win against their loneliness.
Quote.500: There are bad ways to win and good ways to lose. What's interesting and troubling, is that it's not always clear which is which. A flipped coin doesn't always land heads or tails. Sometimes it may never land at all.
Quote.501: Courage must know fear and make fear its own! Fear upsets breathing! Conquer fear and your breath will never fail you! Hamon breathing comes from courage! A good human is a brave human! Courage is a marvel of humanity!
Quote.502: It's not a sense of justice. Figuring out difficult cases is my hobby. If you measured good and evil deeds by current laws, I would be responsible for many crimes. The same way you all like to solve mysteries and riddles, or clear video games more quickly. For me too, it's simply prolonging something I enjoy doing. That's why I only take on cases that pique my interest. It's not justice at all. And if it means being able to clear a case, I don't play fair, I'm a dishonest, cheating human being who hates losing.
Quote.503: There are two types of dreams. Dreams from when you're awake and dreams from when you sleep. And both of those can become reality, if you strongly wish for it.
Quote.504: He told me...that which is incomplete seeks completion... yet...that which is incomplete is no better than that which is complete. Do you understand?
Quote.505: For the time being, all an idiot like me can do is to keep moving forward...
Quote.506: As long as no one got hurt, it's all good. Who cares who saved who?
Quote.507: Words aren't the only thing that tell people what you're thinking.
Quote.508: Death is a privilege of the living. A destiny without reason, continually roving on, evermore. How fleeting a thing it is. One cannot live and forget about death. The despair that is me, forgotten by death, can at least embrace my yearning at twilight, and sleep.
Quote.509: If you think reality is just living comfortably and following your own whims, can you seriously dare to call yourself a soldier?
Quote.510: I may not be able to beat you, even if we play a hundred more games. But if I have a chance of beating you the 101st time, I'll challenge you again and again.
Quote.511:
Merits, demerits, risks, returns; if they were these things then I understood. I could understand.

Desire and self-protection, hatred from jealousy. I could analyze the mentality of the actions that were grounded on these abundant, repulsive emotions. That's because I had plenty of those ugly feelings inside of me. That's why it was simple to imagine. if they were similar things, then there was still room to understand it. I could explain using logic.

However, if there wasn't, then it was difficult.

Without the concept of profit and loss, it was hard to imagine the feelings of people who went beyond people who went beyond logic and theory. I had too little to go on and above all else. I had committed too many mistakes up until now.

Good will, friendship, or even love; they were all things I had been mistaken with. I was sure that I was mistaken with them even now as I thought about them.
Quote.512: Rarely does one have the chance to exchange blows with heroes from another age. And with the chance to fight as many as six, I can't allow one of them to fall right now. Look at Saber and Lancer. Both are valiant warriors I would love to duel with. It'd be a pity to let either die.
Quote.514: You can't perform the same trick twice with one audience. If performed only once, the magic leaves a strong impression. It will then blossom into a beautiful miracle in their hearts. But, when used twice, rather than the audience enjoying the magic, they focus on unraveling the trick. As such, the chance of it being unveiled is high.
Quote.515: Different people have different perspective. So, I won’t deny the fact that some people are annoyed with the way I am. In exchange for those negative feelings, I just want to be the person that I am in love with the most.
Quote.516: Being hurt on the outside is better than being hurt on the inside.
Quote.517: A dog's happiness is measured by how useful he is to his master.
Quote.518: A friend would not just follow another's dream... a friend would find his own reason to live.
Quote.519: Only I could do it! I was well aware that killing people is crime in itself! Yet at that point it was the only way to make things right! I thought to myself that someday people will come to realize this as much, and regard it as an act of justice! I had no choice but to act as Kira… it was the destiny given to me. I was chosen to renew this rotten world, to bring about true peace – a utopia.
Quote.520: I think that in the end, I just care a lot about myself. I was the only one that I loved and respected. That's why I was scared to know what the others thought about me. I was afraid to get hurt, so I ran away and locked myself into my shell.
Quote.521: When the world is filled with red lights signaling danger, the world is safer than usual. But when it's filled with green lights signaling safety, it creates a place more dangerous than anywhere.
Quote.522: New eras don't come about because of swords, they're created by the people who wield them.
Quote.523: You know what, I wish I could give everyone a happy ending. But life isn't some romantic anime and I can't fix what's wrong in life stumbling around being oblivious and nice all the time.
Quote.524: Be on the Side that saves people, if both sides are the same, become a good man.
Quote.525: [to Luppi] Hyourinmaru is the strongest of all ice-type Zanpakutoes. Your weapon may have eight arms, but mine is all the water in the atmosphere! Sennen Hyourou!! [causes several pillars of ice to form, before using them to crush Luppi] Sorry. Eight wasn't enough.
Quote.526: Everyone has a sword within their hearts; the purer the heart, the sharper the sword.
Quote.527: It's the sky...that allows the clouds to move about freely.
Quote.528: It would be cruelest to keep your hopes up when I already know the answer.
Quote.530: I'm an abomination! I'm filthy and dirty! And unbalanced! Why is there only one set of stripes?! I'm garbage! Asymmetrical garbage! I deserve to die!
Quote.531: There are only so many lives I can value. And I decided who those people were six years ago. So you shouldn’t try to ask for my pity. Because right now, I don’t have time to spare or room in my heart.
Quote.532: Urameshi, I'm gonna mess your face up so bad that kittens won't even look at you.
Quote.533: If you ask what life is to me, I'd answer endless days of homework and pain. Why you ask? The amount of homework, it's too much.
Quote.534: If it's not enough to believe in justice, then I will become justice. I will seek out all evil in this world and wipe them out like the clouds in the sky. I swear I will...For justice.
Quote.535: If everyone were perfect, there would be no need to look out for others. Sympathy or love is needed because people are imperfect. A perfect human cannot love anyone.
Quote.536: When you aim to reach high places, you may find yourself on narrow footing and feel disheartened. And then your confidence will falter, and you will find it ever harder to believe in yourself. If you ever feel that you can't believe in yourself, please believe in your friends.
Quote.537: When pressured, people tend to choose the decision that is best fitted to the situation, but they usually realize later on, that it was a mistake.
Quote.538: You were chosen as a single fragment with which I will fill up my boredom.
Quote.540: I... don't know why I'm alive. I have no reason to live. I have no interest in others. Living without concern for others... That's the way to live. Working a job that earns me just enough to eat... A life like that was enough...
Quote.541: Kindness is weakness. Your weakness will delay the trigger by a moment. This world doesn't treat kindness kindly.
Quote.542: There are things people can't accept, even if they do understand them.
Quote.543: I killed many people to act on my ideal. I killed so many that I stopped caring about innocent people and I saved a thousand times as many as I killed.
Quote.544: Even if people refuse to accept you, it doesn't change the fact that I accept you and don't want you to leave.
Quote.545: I was feeling down, but you distracted me by subjecting me to your selfish whims. There are times when selfishness can save a person.
Quote.546: Whether you win or lose... You can always come out ahead by learning from the experience.
Quote.547: While it takes time to recover from the loss of a loved one, having an opportunity to take your mind off things helps too.
Quote.548: No matter who I was with, I could never forget you.
Quote.549: And there you go. You heard her, Iri. Our Heroic Spirit thinks a battlefield to be something better than Hell. What a joke. It's Hell itself. There is no hope on a battlefield. There is nothing but unspeakable despair. Just a crime we call victory, paid for by the pain of the defeated. But humanity has never recognized this truth. And the reason is that, in every era, a dazzling hero has blinded the people with their legends, and kept them from seeing the evil of bloodshed. True human nature has not advanced a step beyond the Stone Age.
Quote.550: The double grief of a lost bliss is to recall its happy hour in pain.
Quote.552: I just wanna enjoy myself. Seriously. Do some leisurely patrolling, put in a few appearances, say Aw shucks, no trouble today, and get a good night’s sleep! That’s my ideal life! I wanna make this world one where heroes have time to kill.
Quote.553: Stop Whining! All I did was cut off your stupid legs! Summon your demons! Transform yourself! Regenerate your legs! Stand up! Pick up your gun and attack me! Do something! The night is still so young, and the real fun is yet to start! Hurry, hurry, hurry, HURRY!!!
Quote.554: SLEEPING is the only TALENT I have.
Quote.555: Thinking of you wherever you are. We pray for our sorrows to end, and hope that our hearts will blend. Now I will step forward to realize this wish. And who knows... starting a new journey may not be so hard, or maybe it has already begun. There are many worlds, but they share the same sky... one sky, one destiny.
Quote.556: You need to accept the fact that you're not the best and have all the will to strive to be better than anyone you face.
Quote.557: Over the course of several hundred years, I've seen many ages end, conflict between people, hatred, wicked hearts. I always have hope that the new age will purify all of that. How many times has it happened? People repeat themselves. They commit the same mistakes, over and over.... They haven't survived, not in true sense. The precious race called people has become extinct.
Quote.558: Embrace your dreams. If you want to be a hero, you need to have dreams.
Quote.559: I guess it's only natural for inferior beings to ride on the coattails of their superior counterparts. If they wish to keep their lives, they have no choice but to obediently comply. It's a never ending chain... as the ones who are burdened with that trust, in order to escape that burden, seek to find someone even greater than themselves. These greater beings then seek others even greater than themselves to shelter them. This is how Gods are born. But make no mistake. They all still abide to me. Because from this point onward, you will witness first hand, the power of the God they foolishly placed their faith in. I will become that God they have no choice but to believe in.
Quote.560: Cute, cute Nanao-chaaaan. Lovely, lovely Nanao -- AHHHHHHH!!!!
Quote.561: We might not be a family by blood, but, we should treat all the teammates we’re going to make in the future as family!
Quote.562: You shouldn't judge people by how they look.
Quote.563: Before my eyes, it blocks my path. A high, high wall. What sort of scene is on the other side? What will I be able to see there? “The view from the top”. A scenery I will never be able to see on my own. But if I’m not alone, then... I might be able to see it.
Quote.564: Not fighting frantically for your life is all right, too. The important thing is… to decide on your own what you should do.
Quote.565: You see everyone wants everything, that's the way the world is. But I just might actually get it.
Quote.567: Those bound by superficial rules who do not use their pawns to the utmost are fools.
Quote.568: So don't be afraid to open your hearts to others. It's pointless to keep testing people. All you're doing is hurting yourselves.
Quote.569: If you have money, life is the same no matter where you go. But if you don't have money, your life can adapt to where you are.
Quote.570: The scariest thing about killing people is getting used to it! When you kill someone and realize you won't be punished... That's when people forget all about punishment!
Quote.571: Nothing's perfect, the world's not perfect, but it's there for us, trying the best it can. That's what makes it so damn beautiful.
Quote.572: Boredom - there are people that blast their own brain away just to escape from this beast.
Quote.573: Life perpetuates itself through diversity, and this includes the ability to sacrifice itself when necessary. Cells repeat the process of degeneration and regeneration until one day they die, obliterating an entire set of memory and information. Only genes remain. Why continually repeat this cycle? Simply to survive by avoiding the weaknesses of an unchanging system.
Quote.574: You're wrong. It's not the world that's messed up; it's those of us in it. Yes, some ghouls walk a path that leaves sorrow in their wake, but just like humans, we can choose a different path altogether. We have a lot to learn, both your kind and mine. We need to stop fighting, and start talking. Because when it comes to the state of the world, you can't point your finger at ghouls or humans. We're all to blame.
Quote.575: Don't bother coming to the darkness that you don't need to see... I don't want to show you the darkness that doesn't belong to you... Don't let yourself be hurt so much anymore... Rather, let me be your strength.
Quote.576: If I'm around you, I don't think I'll ever be bored.
Quote.577: I won't die no matter what. That's what I believe, so stay silent and believe in me. I am a guy who will never die.
Quote.580: Humans... Do humans have a purpose when they are born? I have been wondering recently. Because they are born, do they have an important duty? The meaning of being born... For humans to find that answer... It is the one freedom God gave them.
Quote.581: I thought that would be the only way I could become the world's strongest man. But you know... It didn't work. Your heart isn't something you can get rid of. If you're trying to get rid of your heart, your heart is making you do it. You can never abandon everything to get stronger. The one thing you can never stop is falling in love with someone!
Quote.582: Only victors are allowed to live. This world is merciless like that.
