Quote.583: When cats are near death, they leave their owner's side, right? I'm sure that's exactly how I feel. I want to disappear while they can think, "What a noisy, stupid girl she was, I wonder if she's doing okay."
Quote.584: Being prepared to die doesn't mean shit. The real hard part, is being prepared to live.
Quote.585: I know that I have no strengths to offer. It irritates me how weak I am. But let me protect them!
Quote.586: You're disgustingly hideous! What the hell kind of thing are you? I've never seen anything more messed up in my life! Do you know nothing about symmetry? Whoever made you should be dug up from his grave, shot and reburied! You make me violently ill.
Quote.588: I'm okay with anything as long as it doesn't harm me.
Quote.589: I don't even know the real names of the two... no, three that I killed back then. I just close my eyes, put my hands over my ears and tried to forget it all.
Quote.590: Wrongly placed jealousy is ugly when it goes too far.
Quote.591: I consider everything that happened to be precious moments of my life. The pain. The suffering. The fun… And I am here right now, because everyone was there for me. I couldn't have accomplished anything by standing still, without anybody's help. I treasure every moment I have spent here. Unlucky? I feel pretty lucky. This is my resolve.
Quote.592: Please... even if I die surrounded by snow that never melts... please let her be happy.
Quote.593: Talent is a key factor, of course, but without some luck on your side you're likely to fail.
Quote.594: Boys, am I not always telling you to get in touch with your feelings, your inner gangster? Okay, actually I don't care about your feelings, never did, never will.
Quote.595: Those who regretted their own actions. I would never trample over them. Because demons were once human, too. Just like me, they were human, too.
Quote.596: Yuji, You’re a strong kid, so help people.
Quote.597: It's not that I'm on the side of humans. I just really don't like you guys.
Quote.598: I just don't understand the reason why humans continue living on all the while as our individual egos hurt each other...
Quote.599: If I'm bad at doubting others, I'd rather believe in them! If I get tricked, I'll think about what to do when it happens! Things are simpler that way!
Quote.600: If it's a fight between a man and man, choose the path you believe is right. Only a fool would stand indecisive after being frightened at the thought of being soiled by the mud.
Quote.601: The longer you're with someone, the tougher it is to part ways.
Quote.602: I'm prepared for it all. Even if my chest hurts, even if I'm ripped apart, I won't let myself taste any regret.
Quote.603: Black Star, I can't come down, there's water. Carry me.
Quote.604: Every girl is born a princess, some of them just forget is all.
Quote.605: People can never truly understand each other! That's why we communicate and try to understand. We can only understand ourselves through being with others!
Quote.606: We probably are.  I can't explain it very well, but it seems that lately it doesn't matter, human or spirit.  If your hearts touch, it's the same thing.  When you're all alone, you get lonely, and the first step is always scary.
Quote.607: Even if I die, you keep living okay? Live to see the end of this world, and to see why it was born. Live to see why a weak girl like me ended up here. And the reason you and I met.
Quote.608: Everyone will always question your ideals. That's simply reality.
Quote.610: [a giant satellite bomb is headed towards the city] If that thing hits, do you think we'll have school tomorrow?
Quote.611: How I envy the feeble and frail... If I were inept, I could simply blend in, not stand out, and get lost in the crowd. I yearned to be just another sheep... And if that was asking too much I'd settle for... walking among the lions.
Quote.612: [clenches Fist] No matter how intelligent or how strong they are still nothing but vampire trash.
Quote.613: If you were to write a story with me in the lead role, it would certainly be... a tragedy.
Quote.614: Once you miss the opportunity to say something, the words become increasingly toxic. The best thing to do is to just say everything.
Quote.615: Do evil, get caught, then claim demons were brainwashing you. A common way that human politicians evade responsibility.
Quote.616: Canaan. You're a victim whose past was taken away by war. And she's a defeated person who lost her past in a power struggle. Soldiers who are born within destruction, take hatred as their weapon. Even though you and her became soldiers for the same reason, you both live differently. Listen Canaan, you cannot counter hatred with hatred... ever.
Quote.617: A samurai doesn't need a reason to do what's right. If you want to protect her, you must draw your sword.
Quote.618: *while stomping on Inuyasha* Lay down, be silent, sleep, rest, sleep... how many times do I have to tell you...
Quote.619: Helping people has nothing to do with being royalty or nobility or whatever.
Quote.620: In this world, the weak are the sustenance of the strong. The strong live, the weak die.
Quote.621: I’ve been in your shoes. I was also given a chance. There’s no rush. You’ll get better very soon.
Quote.622: War does not determine who is right - only who is left.
Quote.623: Once drowned in the depths of darkness, you lose sight of light. When that light has dispersed there is no return. My light has died out long ago and so there's nothing back for me to go back, or look forward to I shall continue to indulge myself in this darkness until it completely consumes me, then I will be nothing but an empty course left on this cold & cruel world to rot.
Quote.624: Magic is not meant to be used to kill people... but without power we can't even protect the ones we love...
Quote.626: Depending on your request, whether I will laugh or get angry - that will decide your lifespan, boy.
Quote.627: Symmetry is key everything must be esthetically pleasing. That's why I use the two of you as twin pistols in order to preserve symmetry. When I hold you both I'm completely balanced on the right and left. It isn't perfect because your human forms are so different from each other though. Your hair styles and height for example. Even your boobs are different sizes!
Quote.629: Teachings that do not speak of pain have no meaning, for humankind cannot gain anything in return.
Quote.630: [after Hisagi thanks him] Aren't you clever? Is that supposed to be sarcastic?
Quote.631: Or, as they say in the Fire Nation, "stay flamin'!"
Quote.632: You see, there was this girl and she just appeared out of the blue. To my surprise, she was the same kind of person as me, and she had the same kind of eyes, at first sight, I realized I wasn't a solitary existence in this world, I was so happy. That's right, until I met her, I was all alone in this world, I had not a soul with whom to share the scenery before my eyes, and not a soul with whom to share the music in my ears. But...I heard the voices all over the world, I could hear the whole world crying out, "save me". It's true, thus I could see the optimal path of the world. But it saddened me, because the moment I saw her - I knew we were never meant to be, yes, she refused to side with me. She rejected me - the only person who could see the same scenery.
Quote.633: Listen Ochaco, when I think about the people I love it makes me wanna become them. This desire to take all their blood for myself gushes up till I just can’t stand it. I get all emotional just thinking about it. That’s how I am, but other people aren’t like that. It’s so hard for me to live like this.
Quote.634: Hidden in truths lie lies, hidden in lies hides the truth.
Quote.635: Hold your tongue, the dead don't speak.
Quote.636: Friends are connected by heart! You can't just rinse off something that's stained on your soul!
Quote.637: Mayama, if you can't be with her on every festival, then you have no right to say anything.
Quote.638: I'll show you a real assassination. No... Maybe you won't even be able to see it.
Quote.639: You shouldn't judge something without trying it first. Having a variety of experiences is what makes life worth living.
Quote.640: I will stay by your side, my friend. Know that I am here, and that I am sorry. I am sorry that... I failed you. After waiting 600 years I made a beginner's mistake. I underestimated my enemy.
Quote.641: If you’re too lucky, people will get jealous of you.
Quote.642: Don't believe in the you that believes in me and don't believe in the me that believes in you. Believe in the you that believes in yourself.
Quote.643: People have emotions. A troublesome attribute that's not only invisible, but also changes easily. If it's friendship or love, then that's fine. But if by some trigger it changes to malice and vengeance, then that could bring forth thoughts of murder.
Quote.644: Well, I don't see what's so funny. I'm honest, I speak my mind, and I don't hold back. It's sneaky people like Kaoru who are the troublemakers.
Quote.645: We don't have time to waste asking for the things we don’t have, we can only look for the best way to fight with the things we do have.
Quote.646: I don't think it's all that bad to be surrounded by people who don't care much about authority or social status. It's good to know that there are various various ways of thinking.
Quote.647: i'm on a little boat. I'm going against the current of the river, downstream to upstream. If you want something more, you move forward with all your might. If you try to stop, you fall behind. Humans can never stop moving. If they do not yearn for something... Right! Nothing begins without action! You gain nothing if you do nothing! Satisfaction is stagnation! Stagnation is death! I want to know! See! Feel! Experience! Understand! This monster is amazing, but we know nothing about him! This monster strength was amazing. He won every battle he fought! The ultimate soldier! Now it's a war between vampires? I have to thank the Servamp of Melancholy! In every era, wars have created progress!
Quote.648: People remember their high school days as the high point of their lives. People say these things because everyone holds fond memories of their time in high school; however, I doubt that every high school student would want to remember their school life that way. For example, if neither studying, nor sports, nor socializing are of interest to someone, what then? What if there are students who prefer to keep a low profile? Though I guess that would be a pretty lonely way to live.
Quote.649: Time and titles do not matter in the bonds between people.
Quote.650: Though possessing two eyes, most creatures can see but a single thing at a time.
Quote.651: While it may be that ignorance is a sin, it's impossible to know everything.
Quote.652: When the guarantee of safety is dangled right in front of their eyes, humans will turn their eye from probability.
Quote.653: If it's my fate to be shot down by you, I thought this place would be appropriate... However, it doesn't look like there's any chance of that happening. After all, how could the "child" ever hope to defeat the "parent"?
Quote.654: We're all the same. No one really remembers the day he was born. We all have to trust another's word on the matter. It doesn't matter if it's true or not. Just having a birthday makes one happy I think.
Quote.655: You make me sick, you and your pathetic girly whining... You're not a MAN! You're just a little kitty-cat who's afraid to fight! Know what?! YOU CAN GO TO HELL! HAHAHAHAHA! UGH! (gets kicked by Kyo in the face)
Quote.656: Everything has a beginning and an end. Life is just a cycle of starts and stops. There are ends we don't desire, but they're inevitable. We have to face them. It's what being human is all about.
Quote.657: Death may be my only freedom.
Quote.658: Words are cheap. There's no guarantee she won't tell anyone. Humans lie without a second thought. Including me, of course.
Quote.659: It's something that appear on the chests of illegal contractees.
Quote.660: Oh, guilds are organizations where wizards gather to share information and find work. You can't be considered a full-fledged wizard unless you're in a guild.
Quote.661: The only reason I must rely on this sword is because I am imperfect. A true warrior...Needs no sword
Quote.662: If the ways of this world are based on equivalent exchange, as alchemy says, then in order to allow for a new generation to enjoy good fortune, the price that we must pay, is to carry the bodies of the dead across a river of blood.
Quote.663: Everybody makes a wrong turn once in a while.
Quote.664: Better to ask and be a fool once than never to ask and be a fool forever.
Quote.665: How about I gently shove my foot down your throat?
Quote.666: You can't trust people who call themselves your friends after you've just met them. This is a trap. I know it. A friend who gets close to the protagonist like this is actually the boss, bullying them from the shadows, cornering them into utter despair. And then comes this line... "The truth is I've hated you from the moment I met you!"
Quote.667: With death staring you in the face, you truly understand what it means to be alive.
Quote.668: Even if you can't walk or stand and even if you can't have kids, I'll still marry you, I'll always stay by your side.
Quote.669: Whether your words...are lies created to deceive me... or the truth that I have sought all my life... It makes no difference. You will rot.
Quote.670: Girls could never understand the passionate bonds that we men share. Male friendship is a bond that runs thicker than blood!
Quote.671: No one fears death. They fear the life that leads up to death. If one could die without suffering, no one would fear death, right? Being alive is, itself, an exception. The natural state of things is death. And life is, itself, a kind of sickness. When the illness is cured, your life vanishes.
Quote.672: So stupid! Stupid, Stupid! You're so stupid! You want to live your life scared of being ratted out?! Screw that! I'd rather let everyone know everything!! (to Yuki, Tohru, Kyo, and Momiji while destroying a classroom)
Quote.673: If we had spent more time together, maybe I would have seen another side of him. I wish I knew him more. I wish I knew more about what kind of person he was. I wanted more time. If we had more time, we would've gone through things together. Maybe we would've gotten annoyed at each other and fight. Maybe we would've disliked each other, or liked each other more.
Quote.674: [talking to Kiba, who is being held in a cage] Man, you really screwed up. I mean, I've seen one of us get hurt before, but never this badly. And you're caught, too.
Quote.675: We’re always serious. We’re seriously joking around.
Quote.676: "Isn't it okay? Even if you and someone meet for just a moment, that moment passes by...You might meet again somewhere, isn't that okay?"
Quote.677: I don't wanna see your face ever again. Keep that helmet on until you die.
Quote.678: If you haven't changed, that means you haven't improved.
Quote.679: It's so lovely to have been born a Witch.
Quote.680: The city is changing. Our surroundings, and even ourselves. And then one day, just about everything will change…
Quote.681: Rules exist to make the game more interesting. You, who don't know basic things like that, have no right to create the systems people play by.
Quote.682: If the world is full of things we never wanted to know, is our only option to look away? You won't solve anything by looking away.
Quote.683: Courage is the magic that turns dreams into reality.
Quote.684: The longer the days go by without them, the worse the sadness from losing someone gets...
Quote.685: Number 58 of the 1,000 provisions I would like you to observe, never talk to me while I'm humming to myself. This is an important provision do you understand?
Quote.686: People aren't so simple that they can accept anything and everything.
Quote.688: Anyway, here's my point. Trivial setbacks like yours and mine are nothing but common occurrences in everyday life! Getting hung up over pointless crap like that shows that you're a joke! A complete and utter joke!
Quote.689: In this world, when you face forward, that's the future. When you look back, it's a memory. And if you clip a part of it out, that becomes a story.
Quote.690: Everybody has to display a certain loyalty to their paycheck. I was the same way. It isn’t just a piece of paper, but a chain that binds people.
Quote.691: It's still too early for you to win against me.
Quote.692: People who know how painful it can be to be alive, are fascinating.
Quote.693: The first requirement of being a hero isn't being right. It's being strong. That's why the hero always wins.
Quote.694: If you're ever lost in the darkness, follow the compass in your heart.
Quote.695: No matter how much we think we want - it's never enough. I just want one thing to go right for me. I just need something to give me the energy so I can keep going.
Quote.697: No fair, sky. I'm the one who feels like crying.
Quote.698: I hate perfection. To be perfect is to be unable to improve any further.
Quote.699: Good… death is chasing me. Ones who kill are also chased by death, always living alongside death… Jobs that risk one’s soul are truly beautiful! How rewarding… my battlefield!
Quote.700: There are many unusual things in this world. Everyday events occur that cannot be explained. Bizarre phenomena that often go unnoticed because people close their eyes to what they don't understand. But the truth of the matter is, there are many unusual things in this world. And people... People are the most mysterious of them all.
Quote.701: I'm home. What, are you greeting me in an apron? You look pretty good in it.
Quote.702: I'm an arms dealer anyway. There's no point in fearing what I sell.
Quote.703: Even if you think I’m a nuisance, no matter where you go, I’ll find you. I’ll always be listening for your voice. When the rain falls, when the wind blows, when the flowers scatter, when shadow looms. In every sign, I’ll search for your voice.
Quote.704: It is far more difficult to capture an enemy than to kill them. Capturing a soldier involves three times the effort and three times the danger. If you wish to save the life of an enemy soldier, remember that you'll lose three of your own in the process.
Quote.705: You can't direct armies from your bedsheets.
Quote.706: Sketching a scene as you see it gives you a sense of being there, that's totally different from painting a copy of a photograph.
Quote.707: Stop rushing me. I want to take my time falling in love with you.
Quote.708: I'll enjoy shaving you to death.
Quote.709: I have not changed at all. There were two of me to begin with. It was merely a swap between us. I have no intent on hiding this. Whether or not you believe it is up to you, Tetsuya. However, if you want to call it a "change", then that was because it was necessary. The team did not change because I had changed. I changed because the team had changed.
Quote.710: Thanks for the real vote of confidence. You two should be cheerleaders, you'd look cute in skirts!
Quote.711: God gave us eyes at the front of our heads so we can look forward to the future.
Quote.712: When a human is victorious is when they're most vulnerable.
Quote.713: Ashes to ashes. Dust to dust. We are nothing, but dust and to dust we shall return. Amen.
Quote.714: *thinking* Every day, I hang out with an alien, a time traveler, and a Esper...and I'm still as sane and objective as ever. Hmm...I wonder if that makes me special or something.
Quote.715: The heart moves where the heart wills.
Quote.716: When a person is hard to reach, someone has to extend their hand to that person to get to them, because of that dream, because they dream that freedom really exists, the roses will look up at the sky when they bloom.
Quote.717: I never wanted anybody to hate me. I don't belong to any groups, and I have to fight and struggle to build myself up. In the end, all I want is just to not be hated by everyone.
Quote.718: All this time, I've lived in hope of telling you how sorry I am, I've fought armies, just to have this chance, but now, there's nothing I can say.. That's good enough.
Quote.719: I called his name again and again. And I learned that each time, nothing called back. I learned that no matter how much you want something, how many times you scream to it, sometimes it's out of reach. I decided to stop calling out for someone who would never call back.
Quote.720: Do whatever you think is right. That's the way of the Fairy Tail mages.
Quote.721: It doesn't matter if you can make 100 friends. Instead, make real friends who are as important to you as 100 is to them. It doesn't matter if you have one, as long as it's a friend that you care about.
Quote.722: When someone does something nice for you… shut up and accept it!
Quote.723: Human beings don't feel pain with their bodies. The brain is the thing that transmits the pain to the body.
Quote.724: I have no intention of risking my own life to save someone I had no intention of saving in the first place.
Quote.725: This world is merciless, and it’s also very beautiful.
Quote.726: The more painful the memories one recollects, the better the laughter.
Quote.727: Of course, every soldier is prepared to die. But these people aren't just pawns on a chessboard. They all have names, families and feelings in their hearts too. They are all humans who live and bleed. You have the responsibility to ensure their death will not be in vain. No matter what may come, remember this in your naive heart, and be ready to die to fulfill that duty.
Quote.728: I don't think it's completely such a bad thing to cling to one single person, but you have any number of people all around you. People are always connected to one another. You see? Just reach out your hand, and there's someone right here. It's when people realize how lonely it is being on their own, that they start to become kind.
Quote.729: It may be better to go and regret it rather than staying here and regretting it. If you don’t move forward, you can’t gain anything.
Quote.730: I am the white void, I am the cold steel, I am the just sword, with blade in hand shall I reap the sins of this world, and cleanse them in the fires of destruction! I am Hakumen! The end has come.
Quote.731: (thinking) I want Haru. I want all of him.
Quote.732: Do you value your life? Do you think that your family and friends are important to you? If they are, then you should never think of changing yourself. Otherwise, you will lose everything that is precious to you.
Quote.733: Moping around with sadness and sorrow... what will come of it? Even dead people can do that. However, I'll live and stand on my own two legs. If we are going to die one day, wouldn't it be better to have no regrets?
Quote.734: If you are weak, don't bare your fangs.
Quote.735: Aah... I said I'd "answer you" ... Not that I'd "give you a straight answer".
Quote.736: There are things you can't see unless you change your standing.
Quote.737: I believe that some truths should never be known.
Quote.738: It's not a crime! Caring about your friends is not a crime!
Quote.739: If you keep saving butterflies, spiders will starve to death! But... wanting to save them both is a contradiction. What would you rather do? Keep deliberating? The butterfly will be eaten in the meantime.
Quote.740: The last time I let you do my eyebrows it took you a month.
Quote.741: Childish ideals pale when placed before reality.
Quote.742: One more word Shigure and the entire publishing industry will know every embarrassing thing you've done since you were four.
Quote.743: However far I fall as long as there's so much as a thread left I will use it to climb. I'll take hold of it. I refuse to give up while I'm still human I can do that much. But every person must decide on his own whether to grab it.
Quote.744: Even now, she continues to burn away her life in order to bring about a beginning rather than an end... She just looks forward while dreaming of the outside world. But you know what I think? Isn't it a bad thing to just look forward? Sometimes looking to the side, or looking back... There just might be something important there. You may have lost something. There may be the smile of a loved one. Isn't it impotant to try looking around once in a while? That's how it was for me. I could only ever face forward, could only move my legs with reckless abandon. I never had any idea what sort of footprints I might be leaving behind me. No, in truth, I couldn't even look ahead. The fact that I've never seen anything was scary... so I went on a trip to find what I truly desired.
Quote.745: A world where everyone is equal and receives the same treatment. No such place exists. If there was a world of equality, where talent and aptitude didn’t matter, we would all be equally snubbed there.
Quote.746: Now you know what fear does to you. In the face of death you thought.
Quote.747: The opposite of love isn't hate, it’s apathy.
Quote.748: Say, how about we put an end to all of this? The two of us could become Witches and destroy everything! Everything in this world that has ever made us hate, everything that has ever made us cry, will turn to ashes until nothing is left, like it was all just a bad dream! We'd have no worries! Isn't that nice?
Quote.749: If a person could so ideally control their feelings... how carefree would life be?
Quote.750: This is just my opinion, but when it comes to teaching somebody discipline... I believe pain is the most effective way.
Quote.751: There is strength in words... Sometimes, they become words of power. I thought that if I said I'm fine, then I really would be fine. But it's no use... It doesn't work.
Quote.752: Anything edible is acceptable. Extravagance is our enemy.
Quote.753: Battle was a thing which was won by living and which was lost by dying.
Quote.754: Asking me for compassion is mistaken. After all I have no heart or time to spare.
Quote.755: You guys can’t even act without a group. The hell do you want?
Quote.756: Everyone's gonna die. It's a natural part of life. But if life has no purpose, you're dead already.
Quote.757: You need someone else to become more disciplined. No matter how hard you try by yourself, there´s a limit.
Quote.758: If you lose something, just build it again. And this time, with a greater care.
Quote.759: No one can justify life by linking happy moments into a rosary.
Quote.760: We ultimately fear what spawns from within us.
Quote.761: If you wanna stop this, then stand up Because I’ve got one thing to say to you. Never forget who you want to become! -Shoto Todoroki
Quote.762: From the moment a magus is born, he is someone that has "power". And some day, he will achieve a "greater power". This responsibility was already flowing in his "blood" before he realized this destiny. That is what it means to be born into this world as the child of a magus.
Quote.763: I'll tattle-tale to Yachiru if you keep that up, Ikkaku!
Quote.764: What is it, you? Bang bang banging on people's heads like that. Are you hoping to become a tambourine player? If you don't like Shin-chan, then how about Sen-chan from secret operation?
Quote.765: *talking about Gintoki* It's the same as always. He doesn't pursue those who leave, and ignores those who come.
Quote.766: I humbly call the Gods of Harvest. Follow my wishes, leave none unfulfilled!
Quote.767: You listen carefully, Sena. That's the one person you definitely do not want to associate with! That one called Hiruma, he's like a demon! Once he gets his eye on you, he'll drain all the life out of you until there's nothing left but skin and bones!
Quote.768: People can face tomorrow because they can see reality and accept it. By denying reality, you cloud up the present, and tomorrow will never come. No, you can cloud it up, but your tomorrow will be that much crueler.
Quote.769: You think you're the only ones who matter. You think you can put off death. But that peace made you foolish and thoughtless. If you kill someone, someone else will kill you... this hatred binds us together.
Quote.770: It was just a rebound! Don't make a big deal over one or two arms!
Quote.771: That is why I will keep running for now. If I aim for the distance, there should come a day when I would be able to reach out to what I have been aiming for.
Quote.772: You can't sit around envying other peoples worlds. You have to go out and change your own.
Quote.773: If you've forgotten death... then you've forgotten what it truly means to be alive.
Quote.774: I have no desire to kill you. In fact, you're not worth killing. Killing you, would only tarnish my blade.
Quote.775: The heart may be weak and sometimes it may even give in, but I've learned that deep down, there's a light that never goes out!
Quote.776: That's like what an evil organization in some anime would do.
Quote.777: Evil is when you use the weak for your own gain and crush them under your foot.
Quote.778: If you truly want to continue escaping from everyday life, you've no other choice but to keep evolving. No matter whether you're aiming higher or lower.
Quote.779: All the girls in Konoha are so hot these days.
Quote.780: Learn to make your own decisions, instead of relying on others to make them for you. Otherwise, those decisions will never really be made.
Quote.781: It's not a question of can or can't. There are some things in life you just do.
Quote.782: It doesn't matter who they are, I won't forgive anyone who tries to stand out more than me.
Quote.783: Treasure the experience. Dreams fade away after you wake up.
Quote.784: To you, life was just something you acted out and ended, all according to someone else's script. That's why you were always quoting Shakespeare. However, Aika, I say that you were wrong! You did what you shouldn't have, and didn't do as you should have. Because you relied on someone else's script, you were wrong. I won't live my life by another person's script. Not by Hamlet or The Tempest. I don't know how many years in the future it will be... but I'll write and act my own ending.
Quote.785: Misfortune… that is my symbol. Unluckiness… that is my identity. I am a woman who looks best dressed in solitude and misfortune. That is who I am.
Quote.786: Someone that really can't kill others, has no reason. It is unnatural when you are able to find a reason why you can't kill, and can tell others smoothly.
Quote.787: I… have nothing… to say… Ubuyashiki… cleverly… hid… himself.
Quote.788: Why is it that I'm anxious when I love him?.. No. I love him, that's why I'm anxious. It's because I love you that even if I take off the armor I've worn all my life, I'll still chase after you.
Quote.789: Man or Child, Strong or Weak, None of those matter once you are out at sea!
Quote.790: I don't want that kind of twisted love.
Quote.791: While many can pursue their dreams in solitude, other dreams are like great storms blowing hundreds, even thousands of dreams apart in their wake. Dreams breathe life into men and can cage them in suffering. Men live and die by their dreams. But long after they have been abandoned they still smolder deep in men's hearts. Some see nothing more than life and death. They are dead, for they have no dreams.
Quote.792: It sucks, but you can't reach a happy ending just by doing what's right all the time. Actually, the more people get stubborn and insist they're in the right, the further away happiness gets.
Quote.793: I’ll use my flames for a better purpose!
Quote.794: For as long as human history goes on, the past will continue to accumulate. History isn’t just records of the past. It’s also proof that civilization has continued to advance to the present. Our present civilization is the result of our past.
Quote.795: I picked up my first gun at the age of seven. And I shot. I remember how strangely easy it was to pull the trigger. Ha. I actually laughed. Because that one shot was all that was needed to silence that sickening piece of garbage who had the nerve to call himself my guardian. Ha. It was that simple. And so I was free. Yes, tomorrow would be different. Hm. Tomorrow. As much as I wanted to believe, it only went from bad to worse. A vicious cycle... I didn't want other kids to grow up like me, so I started my own orphanage. It was gratifying work, I was actually doing something for the good of others. It was my place of peace and happiness... yet sometimes, I still think to myself "there's no place worse than this planet. It's horrible here."
Quote.796: I've never been victimized for anything. I am just doing what I can for me and my comrades. And right now, you're in my way.
Quote.797: To kill the one you love... If someone else will do it anyway, I'd rather do it myself.
Quote.798: Come out! Nap times over zombie!
Quote.799: There are times we can't run away, no matter how bad the odds are. When the people we're supposed to protect are threatened, we have to enter the fray and shield them. And it doesn't matter who or what the enemy is. We need to master skills and get stronger, with artillery as well as hand-do-hand combat. I think that's our responsibility as strong soldiers.
Quote.800: It is impossible to not hurt someone. Humans unconsciously hurt others by simply existing. Whether you are alive or dead, you keep hurting people. Getting involved will hurt them, but trying not to get involved might hurt them too. But if it's someone you don't care about, you won't notice you've hurt them. What's important is your awareness of it. It's because you care about them, that you feel like you've hurt them. Caring about someone means being resolved to the fact that you'll hurt them. The more people care for each other, the farther out of reach certain things get. But that's not something to be sad about, I think it's probably something to be proud of.
Quote.801: I can stand not eating or sleeping, but I absolutely would not be able to live without my computer.
Quote.802: Thumbtacks in my shoes would stick into my feet whenever I tried to walk. It would hurt. I don't think I could deal with that really.
Quote.803: It's human nature not to realize the true value of something, unless they lose it.
Quote.804: Assassins Rule Number One - Silence: Dissolve in the darkness and erase your breath. Wait for an opening to attack your target.
Quote.805: The little man is having trouble holding his sword. *to Inuyasha*
Quote.806: Love is simply an electrical bug in the human neural circuit.
Quote.807: No one can predict the future, so it's pointless to fear the unknown.
Quote.808: I guess not knowing someone doesn't mean you don't understand them.
Quote.809: Uh, sorry... I forgot I'm supposed to airsit, I mean babybend, I-i mean babysit the kids.
Quote.810: I've seen enough of Ba Sing Sei. And I can't even see!
Quote.811: Life is never fair. I'm sure you're well aware of that.
Quote.812: I'm not defined by my abilities alone.
Quote.813: Trying to improve by learning from others that is what calls friendship.
Quote.814: Smile. Even if you're facing an enemy, people can't attack others with a smile.
Quote.815: Hotaru, do you think the day will come that I'll lose it (the ability to see spirits) as well?  A one-sided visit and troublesome days...is that freedom? or...At that time, a small firefly (Hotaru) passed by and whispered something to me.  But I could not understand the words of a bug.  Farewell, Hotaru.  I wonder if that person understood...just that person.
Quote.816: Your emotions have nothing to do with winning or losing,  but they're motivating us more than you might expect.
Quote.817: What does it feel like, having your own death right before your eyes? That grand kaleidoscope glimpsed in the moments before death... What could be flashing through that perfect mind of yours?
Quote.818: If an angelic being fell from the sky and tried to live in this world of ours, I think even they would commit many wrongs.
Quote.819: Near and the others told me that this woman was supposed to be the second Kira. But could it really be this unbelievably stupid girl?..
Quote.820: Whether you like it or not, time will leave you behind. In the same way that your beauty will wither away with time. In order to cling to the glorious past, people achieve peace by hurting others. People know it isn't the right thing to do, but they're unable to stop any of it. Wouldn't you agree that someone needs to teach them a lesson?
Quote.821: It's okay to make mistakes. In fact, you should. Making mistakes is how you learn to do it right. Getting a good result isn't the only thing. What matters is that you play your best during the game.
Quote.822: Inside your mouth, it's rat-ta-ta-ta-ta-ta-ta, wonderful.
Quote.823: The world consists of "choices", in other words, it consists of continual gamble. Other guys are not aware of this. Thus they moved about in confusion.
Quote.824: The past does not exist to remind us that the future cannot be changed. It exists to remind us what the future can be.
Quote.825: There is no such thing as truth in this world. That is our reality. Anyone can become a God or a Devil. All it takes is for someone to claim that to be the truth.
Quote.826: Wanting to do it and being suitable for it are different issues.
Quote.827: I don't think I'll learn anything if I don't try to do something about it on my own.
Quote.828: On that day, mankind received a grim reminder. We lived in fear of the titans, and were disgraced to live in these cages we called walls.
Quote.829: If someone went the wrong way, the other two would beat him up until he got back on track. That's how it always been. That's why we'll always stay on the right path!
Quote.830: I'm the one who's in the wrong, so if you really want to break someone's nose, break mine.
Quote.831: The school takes no responsibility of your future! You are fully responsible for your own future! That is why you have to find what you want to do! You are all free!
Quote.832: Songs are good. Singing brings us joy. It is the highest point in the culture that Lilims have created.
Quote.833: Whatever you lose, you'll find it again, but what you throw away you'll never get it back.
Quote.834: No matter how crazy it may be, or how dangerous it may be, even if it's something personal, it doesn't matter! Anything that you're worried about, I'll worry right along with you and think of a solution! Just like you did for me all those times!
Quote.835: If there's no eye to see, there's no difference between the darkness and the light.
Quote.836: Right now we’ve got no choice but to try. We gotta believe there’s a way to beat him!
Quote.838: Youmu or Spirit Warrior... In the end, none of that really matters. Nor does the question of who you are. All that matters is to be close to the ones you care about.
Quote.839: Although my heart may be weak, it’s not alone. It’s grom with each new experience. And it’s found a home with all the friends I’ve made. I’ve become a part of their heart, just as they’ve become part of mine. And if they think of me now and then, if they don’t forget me, then our hearts will be one. I don’t need a weapon. My friends are my power!
Quote.840: Those with talent who aren't aware of themselves cause pain for those who have none.
Quote.841: I was trying to take the easy way out by running away from everything. No matter the pain, I will keep living. So when I die, I'll feel I did the best I could.
Quote.842: Only those who have suffered long, can see the light within the shadows
Quote.843: You can't keep something without fighting for it.
Quote.844: We are but men, drawn to act in the name of revenge that we deem to be justice. But... if there is justice in revenge then that same justice will breed only more revenge... and trigger a cycle of hatred.
Quote.845: It takes an idiot to do cool things. That's why it's cool.
Quote.846: You can't extract a god out of a human. However, by kowtowing to the thing that is considered to be a god, it is possible to create a god and shove it down the throats of people.
Quote.847: I want to become weak and if that's not possible, then I at least want to make friends that are as strong as me.
Quote.848: I wouldn´t mind being eaten, as long as it was by a scorchingly hot lady titan.
Quote.849: Water is mysterious, isn't it?. It can become vapor. It can become snow. It may take various forms, but in reality - it's all water. Even if it's invisible to our eyes, it cannot disappear from this world.
Quote.850: The slight difference between those who always aim for the top and those who don't... It'll come to matter in a big way once you all emerge into society.
Quote.851: Those who hate themselves, cannot love or trust others.
Quote.852: But you're thinking on too large a scale there, kid... If we don't want to drive ourselves crazy, we can only deal with what's directly in front of us.
Quote.853: Why don't we drink to me and my reflection in your lovely eyes?
Quote.854: Adventurers are free. They are more free than we are. It's true that we may be weaker than they are. But that doesn't mean that, in our weakness, we can become aggressive. We don't have the right to take advantage of our weakness and use them as tools!
Quote.855: To force obedience by the sword now will only invite bloody rebellion later.
Quote.856: [about Ulquiorra Cifer, after he takes out Ichigo] I'll teach him what happens when you steal someone else's prey.
Quote.857: The Other Side of the Other Side of the Other Side would be the Other Side.
Quote.858: Maybe there are copies of me on countless world lines. Maybe all their minds are connected, forming a single me. That sounds wonderful, don’t you think? Being in all times and in all places.
Quote.859: All the people I saw from my cage...All the things I saw from my cage, that was the whole world to me. At first, all I could sense was the hostility of the people looking at me from outside...And their feelings of fear. Piercing gazes, hurled stones, whips, sticks...Everything outside the cage was frightening, a source of pain...But eventually I began to realize something. I began to see their other emotions, not just their hostility and fear of me. They were the emotions of families, lovers, and friends who came to the sideshow...Emotions meant for each other.
Quote.860: Not even your closest friends get to see your true blade.
Quote.861: Heroes and the police don't do their jobs because someone says "please". Right?
Quote.862: When you build something, you must be ready to spend time and money on failure. The best materials won't always yield the best results. However, if you build something by improving on failure, you'll end up with good results.
Quote.863: I thought I could just apologize tomorrow. But that tomorrow... never came.
Quote.864: Yeah, it might be totally stupid, but it's sad that you can't know yourself without being compared to others.
Quote.865: Meals are always better with lots of people at the table.
Quote.866: In the shinobi world, those that break the written and unwritten rules are deemed trash... but be that as it may... Those that would desregard their comrades so easily are even worse than trash. And those who don't have the decency to respect the memories of their comrades are the worst.
Quote.867: What is this place? Where am I? Wherever it is, it's completely dark. I can't even see my own body. It hurts... Which way is up? Which way is down? Where am I supposed to go? Someone help me.
Quote.868: If people want to, they can become angels or demons themselves.
Quote.869: Sometimes the truth can hurt others more than a lie.
Quote.870: Humans shouldn't just disregard something they cannot comprehend while also trying to define it.
Quote.871: I only have one chance to have my life, and it's right here. It's the only life I have. This is my life. I can't give it to anyone else, It can't be stolen, I can't force it on anyone, or forget it, or make it disappear, or trample on it, or laugh it away, or beautify it. I have no choice but to accept this one cruel, meaningless life! That's why I will fight, and why I will continue fighting.
Quote.872: It seems Saiyans have changed since the last time I saw them. They have become cowardly.
Quote.873: It's a simple formula. The greater the tragedy, the greater the emotional effect.
Quote.874: A great calligrapher doesn't blame the brush.
Quote.875: I'm not only allowing my comrade to continue to their deaths but I will also follow her footsteps. It's clearly a show of irresponsibility... But those that did not even intend to take the responsibility in the first place can only be called cowardly and despicable.
Quote.876: Luck of the draw isn’t about luck. Luck doesn’t decide a match!
Quote.877:
If you use your wish to grant someone else's, you should be careful you know exactly why you are doing it.
Are you really doing it for someone else's benefit?
Or the opposite, you're doing it for that person's everlasting gratitude.
Quote.878: [sounding like Marlon Brando] I'm the Godfather of Games. Capsice?
Quote.880: In this world with only despair, how do you live?
Quote.881: Humans don’t see what they don’t want to see. No one wants to be put down. That’s why people do nothing even when they do know something is happening.
Quote.882: I'll never forget that you wasted three minutes of my life.
Quote.883: If my own happiness will lead the misfortune of others then being unhappy is probably the wisest choice.
Quote.884: But am I... am I normal? I have strength. I can kill with my bare hands. I bleed red, but the pain always goes away quickly. Sometimes I see things in my head that never happened. I am a cyborg. I'll never be useful as anything else.
Quote.885: We're going to be moving forward! If we move forward, we'll get stronger, both physically and mentally.
Quote.886: The minute you think of giving up, think of the reason why you held on so long.
Quote.887: That sort of thing happens all the time. You get drunk on your own “correctness,” and the more stubborn you get, the further happiness flies away from you. It’s a bitter pill to swallow.
Quote.888: True detective work is beyond the general masses. After all, we're advocates for the dead. We dig up what was lost to the grave and hurt the living to defend the honor of the dead. And we humiliate the dead to comfort the living.
Quote.889: [upon arriving at Szayel Aporro Grantz's location] Arrancar, Arrancar, Arrancar... Espada! Hueco Mundo is quite the treasure trove.
Quote.890: Let me tell you about the difference between you and me. It's like the story of the monkey trying to capture the moon. However close he thinks he is to the moon, it's still just the reflection of the moon in the middle of the lake. No matter how he struggles to capture that "moon", he inevitably sinks to the bottom of that lake to no avail. You will never reach me.
Quote.891: It's never been "The one who becomes Hokage will be acknowledge by everyone", it's "The one who is acknowledge by everyone, becomes the Hokage".
Quote.892: Children, this is the only gift I can give you right now. A formless gift you call a memory. I don’t have any money and I can’t give you something tangible. But even so, even if it isn’t tangible, a memory is something that will continue to be with you. That is what I believe…
Quote.893: I am the God placed here to save the weak and create a perfect world.
Quote.894: Treecko! Use your Tail Slap attack!
Quote.896: The true evil is becoming apathetic about other people.
Quote.897: They'll use you as much as they want; then once they're done with you, they'll all disappear.
Quote.898: [Ty Lee unleashes a furry of jabs into the back of a Kyoshi warrior, dropping her, and unleashes a final taunt] You are not prettier than we are.
Quote.899: A low possibility means it's not zero.
Quote.900: The natural enemy of the strong is the weak, but the natural enemy of the weak is not the strong - it is the ones that are even weaker.
Quote.901: Once the thread of fate is tangled, it cannot be undone.
Quote.902: It is called the memories of the body. When the mind forgets, the body remembers for it.
Quote.903: Don't cry. It will make your face even uglier.
Quote.904: Even if they are locked in cage, as long as they have wings, birds can dream of the wide-open sky. But.. If their wings are plucked, they will cease to be birds...
Quote.905: (Zuko is standing before a huge portrait of Fire Lord Sozin)It's never too early for a sitting with the court painter, Zuko. (Sarcastically) Make sure he gets your good side.
Quote.906: Don't make yourself weigh your pride against your friends.
Quote.907: If you want to do damage to the other ship you have to ram them in the middle! Now do it again!
Quote.908: Step one foot outside, and with one pull of a trigger, you can inflict a fatal injury; with one push of a button, you can blow up a whole lot of people at once. The world truly is a cavalcade of efficiency in violence. Still... whether hacking each other with stone axes, cutting each other with swords, shooting each other with guns, cursing each other with magic, or taking aim at each other with missiles, for some reason, there's a craving that grips us, from which we can't evolve away.
Quote.909: I always thought that life was about standing your ground, no matter how strong the current was. But going with the flow isn’t so bad after all. As long as it takes you forward.
Quote.910: It is love that can make us strong, but it is also love that can make us weak.
Quote.911: If that treetop is school, and the ground is this place here... we all found our strength down on the ground. While looking up... and getting looked down on... we learned plenty about how scary heights were before we started climbing. That's why we can go our own way now. Still... Somewhere along the way we forgot our fear of heights, so we do still fall to the ground every now and then. So learn here. You can go on to school once you have a game plan. That's my secret lesson, from me to you.
Quote.912: What are you good at, what do you like… You need to show something that makes people understand who you are.
Quote.913: "If you close down the way to your own path, it will always open up. That's why this isn't a song of ending. It is a new encounter. A song of beginning."
Quote.914: Now that the rainy season has started, it rains quite a lot. I don't like the rainy season. As the humidity rises, so does the misery. And recently, more things that contribute to my misery have sprung up around me...
Quote.915: Life itself is a frightening image for every human being... being strong in life isn't easy.
Quote.916: A faint clap of thunder, clouded skies; perhaps rain comes. If so, will you stay here with me?
Quote.917: All day, I've had to sit in the stench of cigarettes and alcohol. Every single person I met today was drinking and smoking. If they weren't, they were doing drugs. Well, except for Wayne. I've... had enough of it.
Quote.918: Violence is never the right answer, unless used against heathens and monsters.
Quote.919: Kurama, do not make me come over there and remove that precious thing you call a voice box.
Quote.920: People who don't work hard don't have the right to be envious of the people with talent. People fail because they don't understand the hard work necessary to be successful.
Quote.921: (About Sakura) Was she having fun in her little make-believe fantasy of true love? As for me, I have absolutely no reason to love her and likewise, I can see no reason why she would love me.
Quote.922: You can lean on me, Tsubaki.
Quote.923: People change. And as the years go by, so do our environments. I think it’s alright for there not to be a "proper" way of living. But I do believe that instead of trying to be satisfied on just one answer and blocking out the rest, searching for more answers, despite the pain they may bring, is a much more honest way of living.
Quote.924: The night is in its darkest just before dawn. But keep your eyes open. If you avert your eyes from the dark, you'll be blinded by the rays of a new day. So keep your eyes open, no matter how dark the night ahead may be.
Quote.925: God, my face hurts from forcing smiles all night...
Quote.926: The difference between your decision and ours is experience. But you don’t have to rely on that.
Quote.927: Do you always want to live hiding behind the mask you put up for the sake of others? You’re you, and there’s nothing wrong with that.
Quote.928: They're part of who I am. No matter how much they hurt, they're important to me.
Quote.929: If I don't stand up here... If I don't reach higher here... When am I ever going to do it?
Quote.930: To turn someone down and to be turned down by someone... To be hurt by someone and to hurt someone... A love where no one gets hurt doesn't exist.
Quote.931: The scenery is so peaceful, you'd never think that wars were happening and people were dying around the world. If only this scenery could continue forever. But even if a time should come when I can no longer enjoy this scenery, as long as everyone is with me, I'll be fine. That's what I think today.
Quote.932: When you're upset, try making the intelligent decision. And then, you might actually get something you want for a change.
Quote.933: Just as water can overfill a container. Madness is all the same.
Quote.934: This isn’t a situation where you can stand on principle. If there’s something you want to protect, get your hands dirty.
Quote.935: When you can’t beat fate on your own, that’s when you rely on your friends and team.
Quote.936: Um well Miss Maka? Can you do me a favor and help me out with your father? I can't get him off my leg.
Quote.937: Such a shame. I overestimated you. As a vampire, you were just a pathetic piece of shit. And now you're nothing but dog shit!
Quote.938: I don't really want you to understand... I just don't want you to be like, 'Oh, is that all'? I don't need people to get it. These feelings... are important to me, and they're just for me.
Quote.939: What pride... are you saying that you are God's equal?
Quote.940: Learn to embrace the fear of feeling about what it's like to contemplate what it is to know true pain. Because when I had nothing and no one - I always had Pain.
Quote.941: So, how about you tell me right now whom you'd like me to kill, and how. I'll treat'cha to it.
Quote.942: Keep the past, for all intents and purposes, where it is.
Quote.943: Trying to change someone else's thinking is sheer arrogance.
Quote.944: I was, I am, and I remain a soldier, sworn to devote my heart and soul to the restoration of humankind. There is no greater glory than dying for that belief!
Quote.945: [To Chihiro as she's sleeping] Meet me at the bridge. Come alone.
Quote.946: Stop it! How dare you disrespect an opponent that fought you with all he had!?
Quote.947: Sometimes, no matter what kind of effort you put in, it just doesn't really pay off.
Quote.948: I always say what exactly what I'm feeling, and if they don't like me, that's fine! It doesn't change the fact that I was close to their hearts.
Quote.949: Any betrayal you can see is trivial,  what is truly frightening and much more lethal, is the betrayal you cannot see.
Quote.950: Ninjas are revolting, they stole my idea. I'll have to kill them now.
Quote.951: I'm a half-demon, more egotistical and greedy than any other living creature — that's what human beings are, right?.. But with human blood flowing through my veins, I never give up! Don't you understand? When you have someone to protect, your power increases multifold!
Quote.953: I want to defeat the me that's dragging this failure around. I don't want to forget my failure. But if I carry it with me as a bad memory and keep running away, I will never change.
Quote.954: Do you remember the first time you walked? No. So you weren't conscious of it. Then why did you walk? Everyone was born knowing how to walk. It's called instinct. That's what this boy reminds me of. He knows he can achieve bankai, so he continues.
Quote.955: He asked me to do what I could to help you guys become proper heroes as soon as possible. That’s why I can’t go home.
Quote.956: The things we can't obtain are the most beautiful ones.
Quote.957: Do you dislike that someone you once knew has become someone new without your knowing?
Quote.958: For all my life... I've wanted strength. I didn't want those things precious to me to be taken away from me anymore. But, to have strength means to invite disaster to come to you. And strength alone can't really protect you.
Quote.959: Anything I would never want to lose is always lost. It is a given that everything that is worth wanting will be lost the moment I obtain it. There's nothing worth pursuing at the cost of prolonging a life of suffering.
Quote.960: The moon pierced down on the diseased world. There is no cure for the disease. An entire race falls mindlessly into destruction. Not even a man of colossal power may be able to prevent the inevitable. Death no longer terrifies men. The smell of blood is as common as the smell of white plums, so he creates slavery and savagery which surpasses the horrors of dying. These can only be fought with more bloodshed and the cycle never ends. My sword is guided by the reasoning of Hiten Mitsurugi, but when all is said, a sword is a tool for destruction not salvation. The only way I can retain my humanity is to bury its victims.
Quote.961: A gatekeeper ain't supposed to open gates.
Quote.962: In this world, who knows who might kill who.
Quote.963: Really! How marvellous! You two are simply marvellous. Which one of you should I kill? Which one of you would be more fun to watch as you wail in agony?
Quote.964: Justice isn’t something that you can just proclaim. It’s a feeling you should keep near your heart.
Quote.965: Who a person hangs out with is their choice. And I couldn't care less about rumors. Until I tried talking to them myself, I wouldn't know...
Quote.966: No one can decide what someone else should do with their life.
Quote.967: The storyteller may fall silent, the music may cease, but the story will not end. Be it tragedy or comedy, as long as there is applause, the story will not end. It is just like the multitude of human lives. Warm blessings to we who were not rewarded, and we who are still on our way. Our travels continue on.
Quote.968: Even your gravest mistakes shouldn't stop you from moving forward.
Quote.969: What's the problem... to being different? Even if Vincent-sama is a Baskerville, as you say, even if he is completely different from me, it doesn't matter. I don't care if we're different! And if he really is that different, that's just one more reason to try to understand him!
Quote.970: If I have to win through underhanded means, I'd rather just stand right here until I die.
Quote.971: Daunting and mistrusting others forever won’t accomplish anything.
Quote.972: In essence, language accounts for a mere 30% of human communication. The other 70% is made up of information collected from eye movements and other body language. With that, even a loner who never takes part in conversation can pull off 70% of what we consider communication.
Quote.973: I know you're not supposed to cry over spilled tea, but (sniffs) it's just so sad!
Quote.974: What am I to you anyway? You get all teary eyed whenever it suits you but you never stop to think about my feelings and how you might be messing with my heart. You want some nice guy to be a part of your life but only if its on your terms. All this talk of just being friends with a guy... don't make me laugh!
Quote.975: I'll always be by your side, just like the wind that flows through your hair.
Quote.976: The individual exists because there is a point of reference to identify itself.
Quote.977: To be sure, love can kill, but always remember, hate can never save. Never!
Quote.978: Row, row, row your boat, gently down the stream. Merrily, merrily, merrily, merrily, life is but a dream.
Quote.979: But I want to play around before some noisy people come!
Quote.980: You can't do anything about what doesn't exist. In the end, humans have to settle for what's in front of them.
Quote.981: Having feelings for someone just brings sorrow to someone else. Someone always gets sacrificed and suffers. If this is what it means to fall in love, then falling in love is terrible.
Quote.982: Hey Nana, if Cinderella's glass slipper fits so perfectly, I wonder why it fell off along the way? I can't help but think that it was on purpose, to attract the prince's affections. No matter what I do, I'll still have the fate of a girl who just keeps getting hurt, wondering if she can be happy in this pointless, one man show?
Quote.983: I don’t like hurting others. But that doesn't mean I won’t bear arms to protect places and people dear to me.
Quote.984: I find myself hard to understand sometimes.
Quote.985: A sixth sense cannot make up for a total lack of common sense.
Quote.986: Under normal circumstances, humans should have continued to evolve as the greatest creatures upon this earth, but we were actually regressing. A rotten world. Politics, law, education... Was there anybody around who could correct this world? But someone had to do it.
Quote.987: Yeah, so I don’t appear to be the brightest crayon in the box but I still look down on the rest of the world.
Quote.988: By exchanging notes, you get to know one another, to understand one another. As if your souls were connected and your hearts were overlapping. It's a conversation through instruments. A miracle that creates harmony. In that moment, music transcends words.
Quote.989: I disposed of some dangerous beasts. Mere animals that just happened to resemble humans.
Quote.990: Blah, blah, blah, blah… quit your blabbering. Look at this. [holds up an empty glass] Thanks to you assholes, my chocolate parfait [hits one of the amanto with his bokuto] fell to the ground!
Quote.991: I wonder if it's the selfish people who get ahead in this world, after all.
Quote.992:
You can’t take back the answer you already gave out. There’s no use in crying over spilt milk. The egg you broke won’t come back. All the horses and soldiers of a king will never return to his side again.
It doesn’t matter what was said. You can never wipe away a bad impression.
Even though the opposite is so simple in comparison. Just one word will make someone appear hateful. Just doing one thing would make you seem hateful.
That’s why excuses are meaningless. Because even those excuses will make you look hateful.
Quote.993: A person can only murder another once. The act of murder is giving up the humanity that is within oneself. What is left is just emptiness. You can not lose humanity if it is already lost. The act of murder turns into the act of slaughter. They are two different things.
Quote.994: All humans are loved by another and build up emotions with them. That's nature's providence. There's no way around it. And it's pointless to question it. A bug with wings has no idea why, but it can't help but want to fly. When two people can't help but seek one another out, I think, in essence, it's exactly the same scenario.
Quote.995: Whether it's disappointing or not depends on the person. Things like uneasiness or indecision are in everyone's lives. What's important is to appreciate and grow from every kind of result. If you can grow from them, you can understand that all events are for the purpose of growing and you can appreciate them.
Quote.996: After you've gobbled him down you'd be left alone to regret it while covered in blood and guts. That's the hunger of a ghoul. That's our destiny.
Quote.997: Knocking others down to gain an advantage is a fruitless endeavor. It means they've given up on winning any other way.
Quote.998: Life is something that can never be lived twice. Even this pointless act will eventually end. And while thinking that one day, I'll surely regret its end...
Quote.999: I consider your class of demon very worthy, worthy to fight, and worthy to die.
Quote.1000: Sovereignty means absolutely nothing in front of me.
Quote.1001: My speciality is lacerating flesh. Anyone interested in experiencing my skill firsthand, step right up.
Quote.1002: Humans have always spent a lot of time on love. I’m not too interested in karuta, but I’m willing to work hard for love.
Quote.1003: Ah... what a beautiful sound. It doesn't get any better than that. I can feel it deep in my bones, like a part of me I never noticed before. That sound is an extension of my being. And this land - this land that's governed by death - I will paint it red with this shard of destruction.
Quote.1004: You need to learn how to make mistakes before you grow up. When you are young, you can recover quickly when hurt. When you get older it's harder to make mistakes. The more responsibilities, the less mistakes you are allowed to make.
Quote.1005: I'm ho-ome! Yuki-kun, Tohru-kun, I'm home! Oh, and let's not forget stupid-clumsy-Kyo-kun-who-lost-yet-another-fight!
Quote.1006: I don't care if it is fortunate or unfortunate that Light picked up the Death Note. However... It is generally bad luck for a person to be followed by a God of Death.
Quote.1007: You'll never know what's right or wrong until everything is over.
Quote.1009: I'm not a genuine idiot like you! I'm an idiot who accepts the fact that he's an idiot!
Quote.1010: Recklessness is the way of the young and tolerance is the beauty of adulthood.
Quote.1011: You cannot restrain me with logic.
Quote.1012: When you someday find a way of life that you can truly be proud of, you'll be forced into your own battle whether you like it or not.
Quote.1013: The thing called "justice" changes its shape... Depending on where you stand.
Quote.1014:
On that day twelve thousand years ago, on the summit of clouds reaching the stratosphere, remember that evening when we watched the prominence rise from the sunspot together…
Entrusting our bodies to the Earth’s love, we listened carefully to the memories of the sea etched in every droplet of the falling rain that morning. When we looked up at the ocean’s singers who had gathered at the swaying great temple, the voices of prayer…
That day, under the Tree of Life, we entrusted the beginning of the world to those reverberations… Remember that brilliance.
Quote.1015: I can’t even imagine a world without Light.
Quote.1016: When I was a child, whenever it snowed, I would play and make snowballs. When you start rolling a snowball, someone will always appear out of nowhere and help you make it bigger and in the end, everyone goes home satisfied. It was then that I suddenly thought “This is what I want to grow up to be like”.
Quote.1017: Are you going to keep staring at me because it's ticking me off. If you got something to say, say it.
Quote.1018: What If I didn't fold the toilet paper? Something like that could ruin my life forever. I can't be defeated by toilet paper, if I turn my back on this I shouldn't be allowed to live anymore.
Quote.1019: The right to use my friends as a weapon, that is the sinful crown I shall adorn.
Quote.1020: I never had anything this good before. I guess everything tastes good when I'm with you.
Quote.1021: The only one who should decide which path to follow is yourself.
Quote.1022: Even with the energy you took from me, my power is still far greater than your own.
Quote.1023: No one knows what the future holds. That’s why its potential is infinite.
Quote.1024: Even if you lose all memory in your head, the ones engraved in your heart and the ones that exist in your soul will never disappear, no matter what happens.
Quote.1026: Ice can even stop the time of life itself. So, you'll never be able to catch up, for eternity. You'll always be stuck there, staring at the fairy's tail.
Quote.1027: They call certain methods of fighting good and others evil, acting as if there were some nobility to the battlefield. Such illusions, perpetrated by heroes throughout history, have led countless young men to their bloody deaths, all for the sake of this valor and glory.
Quote.1028: We do not give a starving man a fish. We teach him how to fish and make him independent.
Quote.1029: Spilled water will never return to its container.
Quote.1030:
In the end, mustering the courage to confess is up to the people 

concerned.
Quote.1031: Ah, I'm sorry, I guess this is farewell. Let Tohru find happiness. Please by many people let her be loved. If you become perplexed or make errors, in the end have the kind of life that you can have pride in living. The kind where you can say, "I persevered". Repeating delightful things and sad things. And in that way keep getting older. I persevered. (Part of Kyoko's last words that were never said)
Quote.1032: Men select women based on emotion. Even if there's a reason, it's only secondary. However, women select men based on reason. Either by something like his class ranking or his standing in society.
Quote.1033: To me... This world is like a dark night that swallows everything.
Quote.1034: Looking back on the past is a dangerous thing. It's nothing more than an attachment.
Quote.1035: I am not going to take sides, I am neutral. I am talking about standpoints here, that is all. Miss Class Representative (Hanekawa Tsubasa) has her point of view and her parents have their own. There is no way for an outsider to know which of them is right. Actually, there is not a right one in the first place. It is just about who is easier to agree with.
Quote.1036: A Gun is Good. Unlike A sword or a knife, it doesn't leave the feeling of a person dying in your hands.
Quote.1037: The weak can never break out of their own mold. They cry piteously within their cells, while they try to kick down anyone who strives to break free.
Quote.1038: Go ahead! I'll just turn you into the police for assaulting a minor! (To Kyo)
Quote.1039: [to Iroh, while he's bathing] Enough. we need to leave now! Get out of the water.
Quote.1040: You’re not a strong person, so you can really understand how weak people feel. I mean… Most humans are weak, including me… But if I got an order from someone who saw things like I do, no matter how tough it was, I’d do my damnedest to carry it out.
Quote.1041: [to Katara] If you want to be a bender, you have to let go of fear.
Quote.1042: You men. All of you, you're horrible. Cheating on every woman. But you, you I actually decided to trust. I put my faith in you. I can't believe this. I wish that all of you would just die!
Quote.1043: Love is never without trials and tribulations--precisely because of that, there's bitterness. What do you think? The feelings from liking someone... cannot be satisfied by your own efforts alone. It's not the same as simple anger or sadness. One-sidedly declaring your feelings... this doesn't bring satisfaction. Only when the other person feels the same way... Only when two hearts love each other is fulfillment achieved.
Quote.1044: *referring to Winry* I didn't know she could be so cute.
Quote.1045: There are some people who are rich and stay in beautiful places but are still unhappy. There are some people who are poor, but happy. In the end, happiness or sadness, only the person can determine.
Quote.1046: Because the sight of your beautiful smile causes the fountain inside of me to start overflowing.
Quote.1047: You are too young to worry about failure. In a pinch, just muddle through. The outcome won't change, so that's best.
Quote.1048: True beauty lies in things that last forever, never rotting or fading.
Quote.1049: When I want to do something, I do it, regardless of the rest of the world. When I don't, I don't, and that's that.
Quote.1050: *to Near* Which of us will get Kira first... it's a race!
Quote.1051: I can't just quietly follow orders when it looks like all we're trying to do is wipe out every last Natural alive.
Quote.1052: It makes you sad when someone suddenly just up and disappears without a word. If you're just going to end up hurt in the end, you're better off not forming any bonds at all.
Quote.1053: We’re searching for a reason of existence. With our own strength, because maybe the truth is that there’s no reason for life from the very beginning. Everyone hopes and tries so hard to find a reason of existence. The reason of birth, of staying with someone, of existence, believing we have to find them all with our own hands. Like finding a place for ourselves in dreams, in jobs, in people. The reasons we conclude may be indefinite and fragile. We may lose it too, but even so, we want a reason. As long as I’m alive, I want it too. If possible, I want to find a reason of existence within a person, within someone.
Quote.1054: Too much curiosity kills both dreams and hopes...
Quote.1055: Hey, Shu, have you ever read a picture book called "The Kind King"? The king was really kind, he gave everyone money and land, until finally... the country was gone. The people were all mad at the king. But I really loved him. I think he was my first love. You're like that king, Shu. The way you lose because of your kindness. You know what? I think you're going to be a great king.
Quote.1056: "Every experience is a tool to clear your path." It was none other than those students who taught me that.
Quote.1057: Sorry I'm late. You wouldn't believe the traffic.
Quote.1058: You - Idiot! Go ahead and cry! When I'm with you, you don't have to hold back. *Usagi runs into his arms, sobbing*
Quote.1059: You can use whatever technique you like, but now that I said I will kill you... your death tonight has been assured.
Quote.1060: Ash to ashes, dust to dust, trash to trash can and useless people to uselessness box.
Quote.1061: Most of the winning results in war is caused by pursuit. Do you know why? Leaving aside modern times, it seems during the era of bayonet warfare, the worst losses always, arise from the moments when the losing side is being pursued.
Quote.1062: Time gives us happiness, but it can also take everything away from us.
Quote.1063: Enjoy your life today. Yesterday is gone, and the tomorrow might never come.
Quote.1064: You opened a path… to reach further heights… and you abandoned it… Very weak.
Quote.1065: Adoration never leads to a balanced relationship.
Quote.1066: A lot of the time, you’re going into a situation you know nothing about. So what you need is to be quick to act… and make tough decisions in worst-case scenarios.
Quote.1067: To cry because there is something you want to do and to cry because you can't find it. Which is more painful? The only thing I can say is even with all the words I have now, I can't stop her tears.
Quote.1068: Even if I did win, it was boring. How can it be interesting unless you win in an interesting way?
Quote.1069: In every world, once you die, you're gone.
Quote.1070: I won't give up, I will fight til the bitter end, cause there's no way I will back down after what you did to my friends. They are what made me the person I am today, that's why I'll keep fighting... For my friends!
Quote.1071: ...and even if you were to hate yourself as much as you want, you have no choice but to live with yourself forever. Other people just go by. Eventually what's left to you at the end is only yourself. Even if you can't seem to like yourself, shouldn't you at least compromise?
Quote.1072: In society, those who don't have many abilities, tend to complain more.
Quote.1073: My mother told me something long ago. She said “The world belongs to you just as much as you belong to the world”. For you were born and that gives you the right to exist.
Quote.1074: Cherry blossoms in Spring. Stars cover the sky on Summer. Full moon shines on Autumn and in Winter, the snow covers the ground. All these things make sake taste good. If it tastes bad, it's because there is something wrong in you.
Quote.1075: Obviously you are underestimating Kurama. Do you know why I chose him to be my partner? To avoid fighting him myself. Watch, he's more cut-throat then I am when it comes to battle, and unbelievably precise.
Quote.1076: Theories are nothing more than words. Accept what you've seen.
Quote.1077: A wedding is a man's grave.
Quote.1078: ...Without love, it cannot be seen? ...Hah. That's backwards... Because of love, you end up seeing things that don't even exist.
Quote.1079: Even if I can’t see you… Even if we are separated far apart from each other… I’ll always be watching after you. I’ll definitely watch over you forever…
Quote.1080: Life is all about challenges, There's no point in living if there's no one strong to play with, It's better if I can't win.
Quote.1081: You make a fine octopus, Pupil Aang.
Quote.1082: Stupid ocean!!! Ya want me to kill you? Huh??
Quote.1083: There's a limit to the strength of people who are isolated. If we do the best we can we should be fine. We don't grab a hold of the entire future. Let's just think about grabbing tomorrow. I think that's plenty for us, don't you?
Quote.1084: Goodbyes are only one side of the coin. You can't say goodbye until you've said hello.
Quote.1085: Whether you like me or not, the fact that you're precious to me won't change, no matter what.
Quote.1086: I haven't said anything about letting them commit murder...yet.
Quote.1087: I think you've got me all wrong. My motives aren't so sophisticated as "revenge" or "honor" or any of that... The reason I killed all of those men... was because I could. It's that simple.
Quote.1088: You know how they have parameters in games? Like, you're good at magic, but your combat skills blow, or you're a great fighter, but you lack in the brains department.
Quote.1089: Fear isn't evil, it only allows us to learn our own weaknesses. When we learn our weakness, people can grow stronger and kinder.
Quote.1090: Everytime Otani says or does something, I end up going to heaven, or hell.
Quote.1091: Does it hurt? Relish the taste, because it is going to be the last sensation you feel in this life.
Quote.1092: My mom always says, strangers are just friends you haven't met yet.
Quote.1093: Moving on doesn't mean you forget about things. It just means you have to accept what's happened and continue living.
Quote.1094: Tell me, what do you think is the ultimate fear? I really thought I'd already reached the darkest of the dark, but then, ahead of me, I beheld a darkness even greater still.
Quote.1095: Time will try to constantly try to catch up with you. And with a roar, it will overcome you. Do not look ahead. Hope only lies within the unforeseeable current that will close in from behind.
Quote.1096: You're wrong... You're wrong about that as well, Oz! We're just two people who met through someone called 'Elliot'. You're quite mistaken thinking we were friends through him. Because I don't know a thing about you!
Quote.1097: The smile of you, who flew through this window and died, I won't ever forget, not even tomorrow.
Quote.1098: Keep flying higher so that others are inspired to fly with you.
Quote.1099: Yeah, I get it. You couldn't see me since I'm so short, you couldn't distinguish me from all the grains of sand. VERY FUNNY!!
Quote.1100: I'll never show you my tears. These are the tears of those who died with regrets. If there's a way to take away these regrets, I'll make sure I'll find it.
Quote.1101: People are capable of creating another part of themselves inside themselves at any time. A part that they can truly like.
Quote.1102: I lost my pawns, my knight, my rook, my bishop, and even my queen. But, it's not checkmate, just yet.
Quote.1103: But there's something a little sad about them [fireworks], too. They're so flashy, pretty and exciting, but as they fade, you feel sort of lonely.
