Quote.1104: I think that sometimes things just won't go the way we want them to. And every day there's bound to be something that makes us mad when there's nothing we can do to change the state of affairs. But that's not entirely true, either. We have to give these kinds of things some real thought as well. If we're sitting back and waiting for the future to arrive - we don't have anything invested in tomorrow. I don't want a tomorrow like that.
Quote.1105: When there is evil in this world that justice cannot defeat, would you taint your hands with evil to defeat evil? Or would you remain steadfast and righteous even if it means surrendering to evil?
Quote.1106: The whale leaps. As high as he can imagine. Piercing the water from peak to peak. Is a yearning for the sky reflected in his eyes? What if this high point wasn't merely the sky, but something far higher? If he knew of the infinite glitter of the stars, would his dreams soar even higher? Even if one doesn't know why, to live is to constantly reach out. Not to a nervous restlessness, but to a constant motion of the heart.
Quote.1107: The weight of my sword is the weight of my pride. The wound from my battle with you is an honor, not a fetter.
Quote.1108: Are you saddened by your lack of power, young one?
Quote.1109: The human psyche goes out of whack so easily with minor elements, such as wall colors and staircase placement. Those who use them every day would be affected more dramatically.
Quote.1110: ...Have I... Stumbled upon a brand new shitty game again...?
Quote.1111: To me, the world is not only the shape on the map. On the battle field, all I see are the faces of the order and my friends... I am an awful person aren't I? Instead of the real world, all I care about is my friends. That's because they are my whole world... Even if just one of my friends dies, to me, it's the same thing as part of the world being destroyed.
Quote.1112: Tears are handy for washing away troubling and sad feelings. But when you grow up, you'll learn that there are things so sad, they can never be washed away by tears. That there are painful memories that should never be washed away. So people who are truly strong laugh when they want to cry. They endure all of the pain and sorrow while laughing with everybody else.
Quote.1113: I've always lived in a world of deceit. And amidst the lies, I was able to find my true treasure.
Quote.1114: Every power can be a poison or medicine depending on the user's intention.
Quote.1115: I am who I am now because of everything that's happened. If I try to deny my past, I'm denying the person I've become. I don't want to do that.
Quote.1116: People who call others stupid are usually more stupid. But I'm stupid, so I'll say it anyways...YOU'RE STUPID!
Quote.1117: Even if I was someone, people couldn't comprehend me. And even if they could, they wouldn't be able to communicate it to those around them. I do not belong to the world. That is the world's limit, the boundary between the world and the self.
Quote.1118: Did you not understand? All dreams eventually disappear when the dreamers wake.
Quote.1119: Is being silent and suppressing  your own feelings really being thoughtful of the other person?
Quote.1120: Don't be stupid. You're just a human. So back off, shut up, and butt out. *to Kagome*
Quote.1121: There are so many weapons scattered across my path that it makes me wonder if this world is made of little more than lead and gunpowder.
Quote.1122: "Hero of Justice? A world where no one is hurt?" Don't be absurd. "Humanity" is the name for an animal that cannot find joy in life without sacrifice. The pretty lie that is "equality" is nonsense spouted by weaklings who cannot look upon the darkness. Nothing but an excuse to cover up life's ugliness.
Quote.1123: When you're just starting out, put all your energy into surviving. No matter how pathetic you feel, or how people laugh at you, if you come back alive, you win.
Quote.1124: Welcome. Welcome to my cave young ones. Please forgive the belated salutations I am the holy sword Excalibur!
Quote.1125: I led me by the hand, as if to fill the niches in the memories in my oozing brain fluid. Without even a destination, we kept walking. Disgusting clouds were floating in the sky. I already know what will happen to me the next time I wake up.
Quote.1126: Fool! Next time you see the sun at night, know it's your last!
Quote.1127: In life, nothing good comes out of hurrying.
Quote.1128: No matter how you look, as long as your judgement is clouded you won't find the truth.
Quote.1129: You're just too busy comparing yourself to others to see. Those comparisons aren't the only measure. Don't say it's all pointless. You've work hard and made yourself better. That's what you got in return. So don't put yourself down like this.
Quote.1130: Apples taste so much better indoors.
Quote.1131: I think I finally understand... As long as there's someone who'll grieve, it's wrong to want to die.
Quote.1132: The truth is unattainable. It will always be shrouded in fog. Though you reach the murk and the gloom to grasp something, you have no means to know it is the truth. In which case, why...? What sense is there in yearning for the truth? Close your eyes. Lie to yourself. Live in blissful ignorance... it is a much smarter way to exist.
Quote.1133: Sometimes it's necessary to courageously retreat.
Quote.1134: The moment people come to know love, they run the risk of carrying hate.
Quote.1135: You know, Okabe, whether time is slow or fast, depends on perception. Theory of relativity is so romantic.
Quote.1136: This isn't divine jugdement. It's the work of some childish killer who's playing at divine retribution. That's all.
Quote.1137: Illegal contractees kill people to be able to change the past.
Quote.1138: I'm Hatake Kakashi. Things I like and things I hate? I don't feel like telling you that. My dreams for the future? Never really thought about that. As for my hobbies... I have lots of hobbies.
Quote.1139: 99% of perception that normal humans have are closed off. Those who don't think of themselves are quite foolish beings.
Quote.1140: It’s hard to forget someone who gave you so much to remember.
Quote.1141: If I'm going to disappear no matter what, I at least want to leave them having fun and smiling.
Quote.1142: I should use a cheerful joke to lighten the mood. Would you like a snack? Or, maybe I should snack on you instead?
Quote.1143: He is so twisted that if he sees someone wandering around lost, he's the kind of guy who will screw and toy around with the poor soul before he even bothers to help...IF he even bothers to help!
Quote.1144: Those who seek out the truth must not be arrogant. You must not laugh at miracles just because they cannot be explained scientifically. You must not turn away from the beauty of this world.
Quote.1145: Who can gaze into the mirror without becoming evil? The mirror does not reflect evil, but creates it.
Quote.1146: Ha ha! Eat my dust, rat-boy! (to Yuki)
Quote.1147: [Talking about Hueco Mundo] There isn't even water! Huh? Then how'd we have tea earlier?
Quote.1148: The brain is a microcosm, creating its own stories. People then live out these stories.
Quote.1149: Your unconditional trust is more than I'm willing to bear.
Quote.1150: This might come a little late but... you people make me sick.
Quote.1151: I'm afraid when something is truly lost, one can never get it back again.
Quote.1152: [telling Mustang about the investigation on Scar] His bloodstained clothes washed up further downstream. We don't know if that means that he's dead, or just naked.
Quote.1153: [after learning Guy Sensei's name. Might Guy] Yeah, mighty stupid looking guy!
Quote.1154: Once my stomach settles down... You better be prepared, 'cause we'll really give you something to cry about in the mat... ugh... ch... uughh...
Quote.1155: Real friends wouldn't use you for your money. I don't have any friends, so I'm no expert, but I'd rather have no friends than have friends like them.
Quote.1156: I don’t like someone who makes a fool out of earnest people.
Quote.1157: It is meaningless to distinguish between the beautiful and the ugly, or between the talented and the ordinary. Every human struggles to survive.
Quote.1158: Living has it own challenges. I'll give you just one piece of advice. Don't quit. Yes, when you die, you die. But if you give up, you're definitely going to die. That, I am sure of.
Quote.1159: I was younger then, I wasn't afraid of anything, I didn't think about dying for a second. I thought I was invincible. Then I met some girl. I wanted to live, I started to think like that; for the first time I was afraid of death. I had never felt like that before.
Quote.1160: Even with no magical powers… I’ll become the magic emperor.
Quote.1161: Stop being such a bitch, Sweden!
Quote.1162: Humming and the nightly news share a very tight connection indeed.
Quote.1163: And so... I have written down the lesson I've learned from this vital experience in form of a title suitable for a business reference book: "Never hold meetings. The outcome is determined before the meeting begins."
Quote.1164: Besides, it doesn't really matter, does it? Why should I care about appearances and labels anyway. It's what's on the inside that counts.
Quote.1165: Holding in your own feelings like that... ye think tha' no one's gonna get hurt since ye're not lettin' it show to anyone? Tha's just the same as goin' 'round hurting everyone anyway!! What ye're doin' isn't ye keepin' everyone dear to ye!! Ye're just protectin' yerself!!! Ye're just 'fraid of gettin' hurt! Losin' yer nerve! Ye're just scared!!
Quote.1166: Becoming an adult is such a sad thing. If you have something dear to protect, you may end up at odds with yourself.
Quote.1167: Many things can be achieved, as long as you believe in it.
Quote.1168: We have to find a way to face this scar.
Quote.1169: The most inflated egos are often the most fragile.
Quote.1170: Isn't using the net just like using knives for cooking or using paper to write things down? It has nothing to do with good or bad. It's like, it's there, so we accept and use it.
Quote.1171: Nice speech, Azula! It was pretty and poetic, but also scary in a good way!
Quote.1172: For murderers, there is no good or evil. I know that.
Quote.1173: To me, nothing is painful. There is no such thing as anguish. Even if some things seem like they hurt, deep down, everyone is a nice person. We can understand each other, or so I thought; or so I liked to think. I didn't want to wallow in misery. I didn't want to become spiteful. I just didn't want to be hurt. I didn't want to be hated.
Quote.1174: The impostor is an impostor because it can't be distinguished from the real thing. The proof of its falsity is in its resemblance to the real thing.
Quote.1175: In the first place, the logic that says "those who play games are kids" is itself an allusion, therefore one might say that shoehorning reality into your stubborn dualism is already a criticism of the self. In short, humans can only recognize reality through the filter called "me" and so they are unable to escape the constraints of their uncanny existence.
Quote.1176: "Are you prepared to die?". Most astronauts answer with a simple "yes", but you can say anything. It's just a weak yes. You shouldn't be prepared to die. Instead, you should have the resolve to live until the very end! If there's someone who replies "no", you can trust them.
Quote.1177: People tend to show off their act of kindness. It is not an act of good will, it is a demand because they are expecting a word of grace as a reward.
Quote.1178: Beautiful flowers, too, eventually wither and fall. That's the fate of all living beings.
Quote.1179: Being alone is more painful than getting hurt.
Quote.1180: To someone who bears responsibility, there's no greater treasure than experience.
Quote.1181: Our motto is to make use of our characteristics to answer customers' needs.
Quote.1182: That's human nature. We have regrets, and go on blaming ourselves forever.
Quote.1183: Even if you have your reasons and there are things you can’t tell me, no matter what, I’m on your side.
Quote.1185: What do I have to live for now that I know Cain won't come back? You tell me that, Ed!
Quote.1186: Who cares? Who cares if they're human or if they're something else? If they have boobs, what's the problem?
Quote.1187: Don't move. Oh, my bad. I mean, you can move if you want, but it'd be very dangerous.
Quote.1188: Sounds like a lot of work, I think I'll pass. I'd rather play and I'll ask for help when I get stuck.
Quote.1189: (thinking) Haru understood me. He cared for me. He loved me.
Quote.1190: You're happy enough, so don't take away the happiness of others. You should share it.
Quote.1191: There can be no going back once you come to love someone.
Quote.1192: Studying was fun. I enjoyed solving problems quickly, and I was rewarded for the effort I put in. Studying made me feel complete.
Quote.1193: Every society places the world in order, by the concept of opposites: inside and outside, religious and secular, celestial and worldly. The opposing concepts organize the world as it is today, but none of those can be distinctly separated. There is always a grey area where it is ambiguous.
Quote.1194: Could you settle for a smile, and a fond farewell?
Quote.1196: You have yet to see what form your soul has taken. That's what it actually means when you claim that you lack joy in your life.
Quote.1197: If you force me to pick one… It’d be black. It covers up the things inside of me that I don’t want to be known about. Well, for the same reason… Black is the color I hate too.
Quote.1198: When you confess your feelings, you should do a proper job.
Quote.1199: If you could see everything but couldn't change any of it, or if you could live in freedom in darkness... Which do you think is more fortunate? I think it might not be that bad living in the dark, remembering the light.
Quote.1200: People cannot change the past. All we can do, is accept our own actions. If you still wish to be burdened by your sins, let it show in your future actions. It is your choice how to perceive something that has already happened.
Quote.1201: Being weak is nothing to be ashamed of… Staying weak is!
Quote.1203: Nothing good can come by rejecting yourself.
Quote.1204: Children aren't sweet or innocent. The weird ones are left unchecked. It's rare to find anyone you can trust!
Quote.1205: What’s important is not losing sight of your path.
Quote.1206: Most non-NEET people in the world don't realize that human nature isn't scalar, but vectorial.
Quote.1207: People who kill too much, turn into dragons one day. Beasts that rule the land atop piles of money and fly the skies with authority. They become more and more violent, until they can no longer understand the language of men. We cannot allow dragons to remain in this world, even though we are the ones from which they are spawned. To slay a dragon is the greatest of honors.
Quote.1208: Oh, right, Senjougahara. I've got a great story to tell you. It's about that man who tried to rape you way back. He was hit by a car and died in a place with no connection to you, in an event with no connection to you. Without any drama at all. [...] That's the lesson for you here: You shouldn't expect your life to be like the theater.
Quote.1209: Hey, yo, check this out! It's a moonwalk, it's a moonwalk! Head spin!
Quote.1210: So you feel like you're being dishonest or something? That's not true. It's a great thing to come to like someone. If you ask me... The important thing here is, that you have to make a clear choice between the two of them.
Quote.1211: God's not at home. He's on vacation at Vegas.
Quote.1212: [thinking to self about her past, and when she first met Kenpachi] I had no name. I had no parents. I was from District 79, "Kusajishi", of the North Alley of Rukongai. I had never seen anything in colors other than the bloody red... Everyone was more beast than human. It wouldn't have been strange to have a baby get stepped on and die. But then you appeared. From District 80, "Zaraki", of the North Alley of Rukongai. You appeared to me from even deeper in the darkness. You demolished the chaotic world that was dyed in blood... And then, you gave me a name. If it wasn't for you...I wouldn't be alive today. Yes...Since that day...You've been everything to me in this world.
Quote.1213: If you pity my existence, please eat me.
Quote.1214: Everyday was the same. Deep down, I felt bored. But it wasn't the days that felt boring. It was being just like everyone else.
Quote.1215: Neither terrorism nor occultism have ever impacted history in any constructive way.
Quote.1216: Real GAY will not be swayed no matter how cute a girl is. Please remember this: out of a hundred men... five are GAY.
Quote.1217: I’m scared of hot and cold. In winter, I hide under the heating table and in summer, I lie in bed and do nothing.
Quote.1218: A person can work for their ideals. But if you lose sight of those ideals, when things don't work out as you hoped, you'll never accomplish anything! You won't be able to protect yourself or those dear to you.
Quote.1219: The probability of success was zero percent. But I've learned that probabilities are meaningless when it comes to you guys.
Quote.1220: No matter how many years it's been since they met, brothers are brothers, aren't they? Even without having seen, I can tell.
Quote.1221: What is eternal? ...Eternal life. Eternal love. Eternal flow of time. Instinctively, they all seem wonderful, but in reality, they are also cruel.
Quote.1222: Bitter crimson tears flow from lifeless eyes, and mingle with the endless sands... Bestowing ever greater power upon the demon god.
Quote.1223: Tell me, do you feel my presence? Do you sense it the same way that I sense yours? A rather unfortunate twist of fate, wouldn't you say... Mu La Flaga?
Quote.1224: There are all sorts of goodbyes. There are sad goodbyes, and sometimes goodbyes you're thankful for, that take a load off your mind. It often happens that someone you say goodbye to unexpectedly returns, all self-conscious. Then there are times when, anticipating that, you put on the front of a short goodbye, only to have them not return so soon. And then there are goodbyes that last forever, true goodbyes that only happen once in your life.
Quote.1225: I can't compete with Kikyo, because, after all, I'm still alive
Quote.1226: I now have things that I don't want to forget, and things that I shouldn't forget. And I don't plan to ever forget those things, as long as I live.
Quote.1227: I do intend to pay you for your services.
Quote.1228: People don't realize they aren't able to choose whether or not to believe something. If they subconsciously believe something, therein lies the potential for a curse.
Quote.1229: [To Ritsu Sohma] Sometimes living can be hard, but it's only because we're alive that we can make each other laugh, cry...be happy! [thinking] If that's not the reason for being born in this world...I don't know what is!
Quote.1230: The sorrows of life...To not be able to live like yourself. The joys of life...To be able to die like yourself.
Quote.1231: Unless I grip the sword, I cannot protect you. While gripping the sword, I cannot embrace you.
Quote.1232: The Santa that showed up at my Kindergarden Christmas festival? I knew he was fake. And I never saw Mommy kissing Santa Claus, either. But I have to say, even as a little kid I knew better to believe in some old man who worked only one day a year.
Quote.1233: Say please, before asking for favor.
Quote.1234: *points to Jet*Don't give me that art of war crap! And you!*points to the other man*You take too long to take a sh*t!
Quote.1235: We have a proud tradition of failure to uphold!
Quote.1236: That's when I realized! That I had become a child who would be found. So I broke into tears of happiness. No matter how far we're separated, you two would definitely find me. It's nice knowing someone will find you.
Quote.1237: The ones who do what they want and enjoy the most of their lives are the ones who win in the end.
Quote.1238: The difference between the novice and the master is that the master has failed more times than the novice has tried.
Quote.1239: It's not an issue of what you should do, it's an issue of what you want to do.
Quote.1240: Stop meddling in Team Rocket's affairs!
Quote.1241: It's a nice thought to believe in a "next time". If it was a real battlefield, there wouldn't be a "next time".
Quote.1242: You're not a good-for-nothing person. I think that being able to try your hardest to be something is a talent by itself.
Quote.1243: A lot of something is ugly in itself.
Quote.1244: Why does everything you say makes me wanna bash your face in?
Quote.1245: He turns the black-and-white landscape into brilliant colors. That's what George was to me. Even if our paths don't ever cross again, that will never change.
Quote.1246: You're as good as naked before my spear.
Quote.1247: I'm not smart enough to figure out answers no matter how much time I spend thinking. All I can do now is to empty my head and dash forward.
Quote.1248: Once you look up to someone, you can't overtake them.
Quote.1249: Only once every hundred years can a Firebender experience this kind of power.
Quote.1250: Yo... Are you ready for me to break your neck... Rat-boy?
Quote.1252: You know I think I understand now why you and I never had children…on some level we knew the world was ending, it may of seemed like we had found something else to obsess over but the truth is we’d given up on the future. That’s the real reason I was never able to get pregnant.
Quote.1253: If something gets in the way of your job, get rid of it. That includes your feelings, your beliefs, and visions of that guy. [referring to Soichiro Kurebayashi]
Quote.1254: If you do evil out of a hatred for evil, that rage and hate will merely birth new conflict.
Quote.1256: An oasis for my withered heart in this harsh reality.
Quote.1257: I was wrong. I wasn't eating ghouls. I'm the one who was being eaten.
Quote.1258: ...There's nothing to feel sorry for on my behalf. I've been a very selfish girl. For the first time, I was able to see that. Thank you for worrying about me, mama. (to her mother)
Quote.1259: Genius is 1% inspiration and 99% perspiration! In other words, believe in your inspiration and fight to the end! Perspiration without inspiration is worthless! No matter what others say ignore them! Trust your talent! Follow your own path!
Quote.1260: I know we can't immediately treat her as part of our group, but if we always think of her as an outsider, she'll never have a chance to become part of our group.
Quote.1261: If you don't like the hand that fate's dealt you with, fight for a new one!
Quote.1262: The ones who accomplish something are the fools who keep pressing onward. The ones who accomplish nothing are the wise who cease advancing.
Quote.1263: That's why Kagome sent me, so I can protect you from being protected by him.
Quote.1264: You have no enemies. No one...Has any enemies. There is no one...That you should hurt
Quote.1265: Look, all it means is that when I lose it, it's cause things make no sense.  If there was any logic to it, then I wouldn't get pissed even if I got shot or stabbed.
Quote.1266: This is a case of personal feelings: there's no way to force someone into saying that he or she loves someone. Besides, only the person knows whether the love truly exists. Even if it's said out with false feelings, it'll just cause damage on both sides.
Quote.1267: Traditions that don't benefit people today are worthless.
Quote.1268: You probably weren't wrong, but you went about it the wrong way.
Quote.1269: [after Zuko calls him a child] Well, you're just a teenager.
Quote.1270: You won't survive if you just let your boiling blood dictate your actions.
Quote.1271: No matter where I might have met you, I'm sure I'd come to love you.
Quote.1272: We once fought together for an ideal with our swords. It wasn't for power or for glory, but to create a peaceful world where people could live without fear. And if you should forget about that, then what did we fight the revolution for?
Quote.1273: "Believing in someone." That's a weird phrase, isn't it? After all, if you truly believed in a person, you wouldn't need to say, "I believe you." It's like saying, "I believe in air." I don't mean to say that "believing in something" is like a lie. "Believing" is really a term of hope of wanting to believe.
Quote.1274: Once I'm dead, I won't even be able to remember you. So I'll win, no matter what. I'll live, no matter what!
Quote.1275: Please tell me, if I could never have happiness in real life, can't I at least get to dream about it sometimes?
Quote.1276: Every human has another personality that they keep hidden from others.
Quote.1277: Water is the greatest enemy of games.
Quote.1278: People’s feelings are memories that transcend time.
Quote.1279: Do you think you could tell me what true strength is? I may be out of line, but hiding your true self and putting on airs doesn't seem any different than running away to me. I would think that embracing the things you truly like and being able to enjoy them is worth more than anything. To just be yourself… I believe that's what true strength really is.
Quote.1280: Even if I can't see you... No matter how far away you may be... I will always be watching you.
Quote.1281: Look straight at the people you kill; don't take your eyes off them for a second. And don't ever forget them because they won't forget you.
Quote.1282: I love flowers. They look so good... On me.
Quote.1283: Heroes always die due to unreasonable orders.
Quote.1284: Readiness and sincerity, qualities that are indispensible in order to accomplish anything. Qualities you are well provided with.
Quote.1285: I always believed that everyone in this world was far nicer and smarter than me. That no matter how unlikeable they seemed to be, they still had a good conscience and had justifiable circumstances for acting the way they did. That’s why I hated myself for being so timid and depressed when I didn’t even have any good reason for doing so. …But now I see that there actually are people who’re despicable in every way and don’t blink twice at ruining another’s life. Now that I think about it, it’s almost strange. Why don’t most people try to kill other people? How can they just stand by and let the scum have their way without the slightest indifference? Maybe my expectations were too high. I’m only disappointed because I expected something from them. But the answer was quite simple all along. There’s no such thing as a decent human being in this world. Not a single one. I did what I had to do. And I feel quite refreshed after doing it. That’s why I can say that this world could afford to be a little more chaotic.
Quote.1286: People are crazy for believing that these walls will protect us forever. Even though the walls have been intact for the past 100 years, there’s nothing that can guarantee they won’t be broken down today.
Quote.1287: It doesn't matter what you achieve in life. It's how you live that really matters. Countless men have lost their lives in war without fulfilling their life's ambitions. Shiba stood by his convictions, no matter how lonely he got. So I think that in the end, he must've been happier than anyone.
Quote.1288: We mock their desperate wishes, and trample them like insects! Cowardly, base - we're more demonic than demons are! I'm just like them. I'm full of the same ugliness they were. This is how humans are. It's how we are, Sebastian!
Quote.1289: Modern-day saints carry assault rifles, and spread the word of God with their bullets.
Quote.1290: To reach the top we must crush their dreams and climb atop their shattered hopes. The will to win at any cost, to obliterate the enemy if necessary, without ambition there is no way to move up.
Quote.1291: To reign over the kingdom of the world, to make its peace and write its laws; to be generous to the obedient and merciless to all who would stand against you. Nothing ever changes; two thousand years and you still act like the world is yours.
Quote.1292: The smell of blood, gunpowder and iron. This is what humanity's all about. Well then, the man in charge must always lead from the front. And yet be the last one to die.
Quote.1293: If I want your opinion I WILL GIVE IT TO YOU!!!
Quote.1294: If you meet Budha - kill him, If you meet the father - kill him. Never be captivated by anyone, just live for yourself.
Quote.1295:
In order to obtain something, there must be something of equal value. It is the Law of Conservation in Alchemy. Back then, we believed that it was the truth of the world. However, the real world isn’t perfect, so there is not just a single law that governs everything that happens within it. It is the same for the Law of Conservation in Alchemy. Even so, I believe that people cannot obtain something without paying a price. The pain we felt was surely enough of a price to pay. And anyone who pays the price known as hard work surely gains something. The Law of Conservation is not the law governing this 
world. Until the day I meet with him again, that is the promise… Ni-san and I made.
Quote.1296: Y-you actually used your head??? You're going to get a fever!
Quote.1297: With so much at stake... are you willing to take the one in 10,000 chance?
Quote.1298: Loneliness is a sickness that leads to death.
Quote.1299: They are those who come and go as they please. Even so, once you come to know them, even though there's no one else who notices them, it's a precious encounter that will keep your heart strong.
Quote.1300: People need to be told they're worthy of being alive by someone else or they can't go on.
Quote.1301: Clearly Gramps did smack me around a bit too much. But he never abandoned me.
Quote.1302: They say you never know when a bullet you fired in battle will find its way back to you.
Quote.1303: I hate deserts. It's nothing but sand. *collapses* If there was some grass, I could turn it into bread. I'm starving! Huh? Hey! Al, where'd you go? Al? Hey!
Quote.1304: Souls of the dead are like a bunch of leftover feelings from those who've died.
Quote.1305: Let me get this straight. You're going to defeat me with a creampuff and an elf?
Quote.1306: Humans can’t reverse the flow of time. If you try to twist it against its will… You’ll be punished.
Quote.1307: Winning a game is not dependent on surpassing your opponents with your strength or waiting for lucky breaks. Conquer the opponent, crushing them, and stepping over the fallen ones ruthlessly. Winning means dominating over countless dead bodies.
Quote.1308: I am ME. No matter, what I say or do, I'm still ME. The things I feel, the things I do, being a vampire, being a man, being betrayed by my mother. When all those things come together, they make up ME. But I'm none of these things taken separately.
Quote.1309: All heroes have established their thrones atop, not just their enemies. But a large quantity of allied corpses as well. There are no monarchs with clean hands.
Quote.1310: Let's show him...that the good guys always win.
Quote.1311: Instead of humans who lie and cheat each other to get richer, I prefer animals who hunt to survive.
Quote.1312: [To Yuuri Shibuya] Does your Majesty believe in Time? Time gives us happiness, but it can also take everything away from us. During the 15 years that I waited for your Majesty to grow up and for the day when you would come to this world, Time gave me happiness every day. And after you came to this world... This is my conclusion, made during all the time that I have been with you.
Quote.1313: You can run away, but that’ll just make it worse!
Quote.1315: I came to realize something. Parenthesis are amazing! No matter how negative something sounds, if you throw "LOL" in some parentheses behind it - it becomes positive!
Quote.1316: Among thousands of comrades and ten thousand enemies, only you... only you made me forget my dream. I see it!
Quote.1317: I've gained freedom...and yet... it's so lonesome... (after declaring he was leaving Akito's side)
Quote.1318: I want to believe that life isn't full of darkness. Even if storms come to pass, the sun will shine again. No matter how painful and hard the rain my beat down on me.
Quote.1319: You said she's smart, but it only means she got high marks, and she's actually a stupid woman.
Quote.1320: I don't need any calming tea! I need to capture the Avatar!
Quote.1321: The skull is one of the most eloquent bones in existence. If you just ask, it will tell you many things.
Quote.1322: You're a hero to other poor people, Fujioka. You've shown the world that even a poor person can excel at an elite private academy. It must be hard for you to constantly be looked down upon by others... Spurned, neglected, but that doesn't matter now. Long live the poor! We welcome you, poor man, to our world... of beauty!
Quote.1323: [yelling angrily toward the sky] You've always thrown everything you could at me! Well, I can take it, and now I can give it back! Come on! STRIKE ME! You've never held back before!
Quote.1324: The Present is ending. Here, countless versions of our past selves are always crying, laughing, falling in love, getting hurt, joking around, feeling happy and suffering. These feelings are born all the time and in the next moment, they became the past and die. It's over now. This is the end, but the truth is everyone's time is like that. Right after it's born, every moment becomes the past and dies.
Quote.1325: A miracle never comes to those who seek it.
Quote.1326: What I hate the most in the world is when I'm already trying hard and I'm told to try harder!
Quote.1327: Uh, my name... is... Ketchup! No, wait! My name is really Tom Ato!
Quote.1328: *to Kaiba* Yugi may have lost one lousy Duel Monsters game, but at least he hasn't lost his heart! Not like you - you've spent so much time with your machines, you've forgotten what being human is about! Yugi has a heart, Kaiba. Yugi has us. And what about you, Seto Kaiba? What do you have at the end of the day? Tell me. Tell me!
Quote.1329: You're right, all efforts are pointless... If you don't believe in yourself.
Quote.1330: When receiving an illogical favor from others, one should do the same to return the illogical favor.
Quote.1331: Wrong or not, I'll follow my own path!
Quote.1332: The prince's ice cream - it's an indirect kiss!
Quote.1333: A former teacher of mine, Okabe-sensei, was always saying this to me: 'To believe people is to doubt them.'... meaning if you keep doubting people and searching what's inside them, sooner or later you're bound to understand something about them. And when you do, you'll be able to entrust something to them. That is what it means to trust and believe.
Quote.1334: My name is Duck. Yes, like the bird. Take it up with my parents. They never loved me!
Quote.1335: There's no such thing as a coincidence in this world. What does exist is only the inevitable.
Quote.1336: Sit upon the frozen heavens! Hyōrinmaru!!
Quote.1337: You've got to enjoy life, or else you'll end up wasting it.
Quote.1338: Help can come from unexpected corners.
Quote.1339: People need fear to survive. We experience it so we can grow stronger.
Quote.1340: I realized why I was lost. It's not because I didn't have a map... It was because I didn't have a destination.
Quote.1341: You meet someone and then part ways. It’s a natural part of the human experience. No one can promise they’ll be together forever.
Quote.1342: I think I would like someone else to kill me. I want someone else to interfere with my life. Is that not what wanting to be loved means, Saikawa-sensei? No life is born of it's own volition. Isn't the instinctive desire of beings, born not of their own volition, for their lives to be taken in the same way?
Quote.1343: You can take control of my mind and my body, but there is one thing a Saiyan always keep... his PRIDE!
Quote.1344: Shut up. Quit shouting like you're king of the figgin' world. You're making my ears bleed you bastard. Now I've got some common sense for you... If I wore a tie, it wouldn't change who I am. If I had no piercings, it wouldn't mean I'm nice and if my hair wasn't black, it wouldn't stop me from kicking your ass! Who do you think you are anyway? You think you're God huh?! What's the matter?! Run out of things to say? No more advice?! You're not so hot anymore right now are you?! (Black Haru yelling at student council president for shouting at Momiji)
Quote.1345: I'll admit, Black Star makes some dumb calls from time to time, but the important thing is I'm here to back him up no matter how big a fool he is. If we're fools, we're fools together, that's the kind of team we are.
Quote.1346: The time when you're happy is also the time when you're afraid that the happiness will end.
Quote.1347: Nothing amazing happens here. Only the ordinary.
Quote.1348: I understand now. Even if I must take the devil's fruit, I must gain power. I am an avenger.
Quote.1349: For some time researchers have understood that moderate stress has beneficial effects. It boosts the immune system for example. Stress motivates and prepares us for action. It compels our body to survive. However, routine psycho pass checks take away the stress from us. There are patients whose stress reaction is so numb, they can’t even recognize the basic stimulation of their senses. Once that happens, it’s a neurological downward spiral, they become like living corpses. Eventually their autonomic nervous system stops working and their vital functions shut down.
Quote.1350: There ain't a single coward who'd turn tail and run from just that! Not among the men of the Shiba clan!
Quote.1351: There is a history to humans. Humans are shaped by the experience obtained from living as time continued to wind and wind. To be reborn meant being rid of that history; complete annihilation. However, that just wasn’t possible in reality. That’s why the only thing you could do was to continue living on, bearing the scars on your body and holding the weight of the sins on your back, without wishing for reincarnation.
Quote.1352: If that bullet could also kill a player in the real world, and if you didn't shoot them, you or someone you loved would be killed, could you still pull the trigger?
Quote.1353: I don't know what you're trying to pull, but I'm not into this kinky stuff, and you're WAY too old!
Quote.1354: Unfortunately... being a hero is a limited-time thing. When you grow up, it becomes harder to call yourself one. I wish it hadn't taken me so long to realize that.
Quote.1355: I lie all the time. Who cares if you know something, but you say you don't? Forcing something out of someone without permission is worse.
Quote.1356: Okay, I'll talk! Take the elevator to see my boss!
Quote.1357: There are reasons each of us are born. We have to find those reasons.
Quote.1358: And I'll be happy to vouch for his insanity!
Quote.1359: Do you think everyone can make their dreams come true through hard work? Hard work isn't always rewarded.
Quote.1360: No matter how beautiful a person may be, they will still age and ultimately - die. But even so, even if appearances change, don't you believe that we have, in us, things that don't change? Even as our bodies crumble, even as the months and years take their toll... don't you believe that we all have something that time can't spoil? Even if you cover us with wrinkles, we won't lose to you. That's because we know what beauty truly is.
Quote.1361: The reason we hurt others is because we don't understand their pain.
Quote.1362: I do want to be useful for something and to be of help to people, but I want to decide what that "something" is by myself.
Quote.1363: "To enjoy what one loves to do". Those words come easily from the mouth. But it's another thing to help them grow.
Quote.1364: In this world, there's no such thing as "failure" in the first place. The one who knows the "ways to win" more than anyone is also the one who's experienced the most "mistakes". In other words... You could say "failure" is equal to "success"... Couldn't you?
Quote.1365: We were born as weapons and we loved the power that came with it. Nothing could scare us. We walked around town like we owned the place, taking whatever we wanted whenever we wanted it. No one ever thought to ask what our lives were really like.
Quote.1366: Life and death are like light and shadow. They're both always there. But people don't like thinking about death, so subconsciously, they always look away from it.
Quote.1367: Real magic is the power to repair, to revive. To call back happiness which has disappeared, to call back love which has gotten cold. And it can call back a forgotten smile to a princess' face.
Quote.1369: Immortality is wasted on the young.
Quote.1370: If you realize you made a mistake with the way you've been living your life, you just have to take the next moment and start over.
Quote.1371: How could I forget? He's into dead girls.
Quote.1372: Death no longer terrifies man, the smell of blood is as common as the smell of white plums. So, he creates slavery and savagery... which surpasses the horror of dying.
Quote.1373: If you've decided that you can't do it even before you act, you have already made it into something impossible.
Quote.1374: But you're wrong, no one ever has the right to take the life of another person. No one, no one ever has the right to take the life of another. No one. And everyone, everyone deserves a future. Don't you think that's true? Please, please, it's time to stop the fighting now. It's up to us to end the cycle of hatred. If we don't work to end the sorrow this time, then the cycle of pain will just continue on. When we were all born, were any of us made to steal or cause others harm?
Quote.1375: I've told you before, he's not one to trust, Otae-san. No trustworthy man has eyes that look like a dead fish's eyes.
Quote.1376: It's not about doing what it takes to win. Sei-chan told me before "Winning is just like breathing". Victory isn't something that Sei-chan seeks. It's a natural part of his life. It's a basic bodily function.
Quote.1377: Trying to knock others down a peg just means lowering yourself. Don't go trampling all the hardwork and trust you've build up. It insults the effort you put in.
Quote.1378: Our contracts are completely dependent upon you agreeing to them first. I think that, in and of itself, is quite kind of us.
Quote.1379: The melody of logic always plays the notes of truth.
Quote.1380: L, do you know gods of death love apples?
Quote.1381: That hot dog must've fried your brain!
Quote.1382: *To the twins* We've had enough of this! You're both to blame for this fight! Hika-chan and Kao-chan, I want you to make up and go halfsies on this cake, okay? But, I want to have a piece too, so I guess we're gonna have to go thirdsies. We're not going to be able to split the strawberry on top though. What should we do? Maybe I should just take it. After all, strawberries are my favorite. Oh, I forgot to ask, Hika-chan, Kao-chan, do you like strawberries?
Quote.1383: The world lies! Thou shalt not commit murder, thou shalt not bear false witness, thou shalt not cheat, thou shalt not steal, thou shalt not covet thy neighbor's wife. All of these are lies! Mere illusions and nothing more! They don't want to be killed, they don't want to be robbed, using the twin lies of justice and morality, the weak are endeavoring to protect themselves. But the first truth is that the strong devour the weak, so let us feed upon people, upon wealth, upon riches and power! We, at Britannia, shall feast upon the raw flesh of the world itself! We will crush this deception and bring forth the truth! All Hail Britannia!
Quote.1384: People only find me interesting because they can't tell whether I'm serious or not.
Quote.1385: Can you not be something unless you're already somebody else's something?
Quote.1386: I'm the only one who can bear the full brunt of your hate! It's my job, no one else's! I'll bear the burden of your hatred... and we'll die together!
Quote.1387: Often times in memory, we have the tendency to overly romanticize the people we care about.
Quote.1388: It's not that I hate the person in front of me. If I had met him under different circumstances, this never would have happened. But I did meet him that day, and now there is no turning back. I must distinguish the difference between past and present. Everything must be left behind, and the man in front of me is the wall; the wall that I must break through. There is only one direction for me to go. I have to move forward. That's what I'm thinking...
Quote.1389: You play like you're jacking off. [about Ryuu playing piano]
Quote.1390: Life eventually ends. But that doesn't mean that the fact that we met, or the time we spent together will disappear.
Quote.1391: [to Athrun] What is it you believe in? What is it you're fighting for now? Is it for that medal you received? Or your father's orders?
Quote.1392: The reason the Yamadas get along fine is because all three adults are nuts. If one of you were normal it would unbalance the rest.
Quote.1393: I won't ask what you wish for. I only hope it comes true by your own two hands. (to Kyo)
Quote.1394: ...If Tohru-chan were to die, I...I wonder if I'd be able to smile again one year later? Or if I'd wish that I could forget ever having met her. ...Tohru-chan... has tried really hard...
Quote.1395: We all live under the same sky. If each of us learns to shine, it won't matter how far apart we are. We'll be able to see each other.
Quote.1396: You can't change anything unless you can discard part of yourself too. To surpass monsters, you must be willing to abandon your humanity.
Quote.1397: I shall cleanse away thy bitterness...
Quote.1398: It isn't just "others". Not "others". It's my Family. I'll force my ideals on my family. And since they're family, I'll lie to them. I'll deceive them. I'll cause them trouble. I'll make them worry. I'll owe them things, things I'll never be able to repay. However, I think that's okay. If you say that being an impostor is evil, then I will shoulder the burden of that evil. If lying is a bad thing, then I'm fine being the bad person. I don't need them to like me. I'm fine with being the worst kind of person.
Quote.1399: And the TV show ended by saying how young people are becoming increasingly illiterate, but doesn't browsing the Internet and blogging actually improve your literacy?
Quote.1400: When you love someone, sometimes your head hurts. And it's so agonizing that you want to burst into tears. But even the smallest thing can bring you happiness. It's complicated, but simple. Perhaps all these emotions are irreplaceable and precious.
Quote.1401: Emotions? Nope, I've got nothin' like that. I told you when we first met, didn't I? I'm a snake. With cold skin, no emotions, that slithers around searching for prey with its tongue, swallowing down whatever looks tasty.
Quote.1402: No matter how cold and distant people may become, on the inside something warm and precious always remains, something that never changes. To me, that’s what family is like.
Quote.1403: The‘present is a leaf floating on top of the river. It moves along with the flow from past to future.
Quote.1404: After all.. love is all about timing. If you don't say the right thing at the right moment, no matter how much fate was involved in the relationship, everything will be ruined. Even if you regret it, it'll be too late.
Quote.1405: There isn't just one truth out there, everyone carries their own form of it
Quote.1406: Between dreams and reality is the vault of your soul. No one could see the “Dream World” without this path.
Quote.1407: I just think we're missing out if we're not trying different things and having fun. Life's too short.
Quote.1408: A lump of steel, like a shooting star. Just seeing the same sky as you makes familiar scenery look different. I swing between hope and despair at your slightest gesture, and my heart starts to play a melody. What kind of feeling is this again? What do they call this kind of feeling? I think it's probably... Called Love. I'm sure this is what they call love.
Quote.1409: Is it wrong to do stuff by yourself? If someone worked hard on their own until now, why do they have to face rejection here?
Quote.1410: The world doesn't get to decide whether my life is boring, fun, or ordinary, because that's my decision to make. As long as I have the will, nothing is impossible!
Quote.1411: I want to hear who you are, not what you have.
Quote.1412: I don't want others to hear the words that I've been waiting anxiously for... I want to be the only one to hear them.
Quote.1413: Everything you've been taught is based on theories and logic. Soon you will likely come to realize how pointless they are in the world we live in.
Quote.1414: Like God, you mean? That might be pleasurable in its own way, but unfortunately I'm not into being an umpire or a referee, as I can't genuinely enjoy the game unless I'm part of it. And I love this game that people call "life" from the bottom of my heart. That's why I'd like to continue to participate in it as a player, forever and ever.
Quote.1415: Revenge never does anyone any good. Killing the person you hate will never ease the pain. Always look forward! Follow the path of light!
Quote.1416: Sebastian, you know what to do.
Quote.1417: How could I let this happen to my son? He has sacrificed everything for me! And I have done nothing but ignore him!
Quote.1418: You should use your strength to help others.
Quote.1419: Maybe worrying about the future partings so much that you miss out on happiness in the present is a waste.
Quote.1420: Just as no matter how hard you try to keep it away, despair will attack you again and again. In the same manner, hope will return to you. Again and again.
Quote.1421: Celebrating Mr. Jesus's birthday (Christmas) was fun, why don't we celebrate Buddha's and Muhammad's birthday next time?
Quote.1422: There was no reason for me to stay in the real world any longer. In the real world, it didn't matter if I was there or not. When I realized that, I was no longer afraid of losing my body.
Quote.1423: Listen up, brats! Today’s defeat is the seed for tomorrow’s victory! We’ll rise up and show them! We don’t know the meaning of giving up!
Quote.1424: Don't kid yourself, Mustang. You know how humans love to watch other people suffer while making fools of themselves. I mean, why else would you constantly be at war with each other?
Quote.1425: Destiny? What would a boy know of destiny? If a fish lives its whole life in this river, does he know the river's destiny? No! Only that it runs on and on out of his control. He may follow where it flows, but he cannot see the end. He cannot imagine the ocean.
Quote.1426: I don't have much power and I'm trying to get stronger. But I'm not afraid of sharing my heart...
Quote.1427: Just how many times must I strain my voice before it will reach you? And yet, nowhere in this world can there be anyone who knows me better than you.
Quote.1428: I'm scared. Or should I borrow your words and say this is exciting?
Quote.1430: It's not like I had aspirations to be a hero or anything. However, I'm positive we followed a code of justice that all of us believed in without condition or compromise.
Quote.1431: “Your hard work will be rewarded.” What kind of idiot came up with that nonsense?
Quote.1432: Those who come to the Abyss are all the same. They're all desperate to get something back. But everyone goes mad partway. It seems being with the dear dollies - the Chains - is no good for them... Fu fu.. but you were different. You didn't lose yourself, not even at the end.
Quote.1433: I can’t shake the feeling that I’ve met you before, but I can’t remember where.
Quote.1434: I can only say that the human curiosity is something completely irrational.
Quote.1435: If we only believe when the odds are with us, then that's not believing at all.
Quote.1436: Even if the parts of me inside you die, there are eighteen other fragments of my soul.
Quote.1437: Yes, I saw it over and over... Meaningless massacres. Meaningless suffering. Meaningless happiness! I was forced to watch it all. Even when I refused to look, it surrounded me. That isn't what I wished for! I didn't become a Guardian for this!
Quote.1438: Don’t make decisions on your own without saying what’s important.
Quote.1439: I'm gonna slit your stomach, take out your guts, and put them in a bowl. By the time I'm through with you, you're going to wish it was you who was dead.
Quote.1440: Anybody want to take the sexy kitty home? She's free.
Quote.1441: I'd rather die with someone than let that person die before my eyes. More so if she's a girl like you.
Quote.1442: I finally remembered why I'm here to begin with. I'll kill you, you shitbag! I won't let you play your trump card! I'll blow you away and get a happy ending.
Quote.1443: Change is never easy in this world. I can't even change one friend, let alone a whole country.
Quote.1444: We are both merchants, and I'll promise you one thing. We will not laugh until we get the money, and we will not cry until we go bankrupt. And guess what? We are going to laugh.
Quote.1445: [To Kira] You are the dream of humanity, the Ultimate Coordinator. It was in pursuit of that dream that Dr. Hibiki created the artificial womb. And you are the only viable child it ever produced. For that result, a very large number of your siblings were sacrificed.
Quote.1446: A very small degree of hope is sufficient to cause the birth of love.
Quote.1447: No matter the reason, I don't think anyone who loses consciousness in the battlefield has any right to survive!
Quote.1448: Accepting something is easier said than done.
Quote.1449: I refuse to let my fear control me anymore.
Quote.1450: I've been through so many meetings and partings. They were like a heavy secret, but when I started to talk about them, they seemed to sparkle... I couldn't put them into words.
Quote.1451: [Onizuka's p*nis is bit by a snake]Someone. Suck the poison out! ...Fuyutsuki-chan! I beg you! Suck it out quickly!
Quote.1452: If I can’t save one little girl right in front of me… Then how can I ever hope to be a hero who saves everyone?
Quote.1453: Every moment hesitated is a moment gone from life.
Quote.1454: Power isn't determined by your size, but the size of your heart and dreams!
Quote.1455: I have no fear of watching you grow old while I remain young. I'll even watch you on your death bed. I am no stranger to death. But your heart is like that of an innocent child. It has always accepted everything about me, without hesitation. Because of that I am very afraid.
Quote.1456: You try to sound like you think things through, when in fact, you're not thinking at all.
Quote.1457: Unfortunately, I don't have a nice eyeball like you, that can see this and that. All I can do to pursue one thing in front of me. So whether it's the abyss of death or an empty void, I won't fight for the manju offered to my grave. I'll fight for tomorrow's breakfast. That's all.
Quote.1459: I will fight for my friends than watching them get hurt, I will fight for those I love.
Quote.1460: The inexperienced draw attention by acting differently.
Quote.1462: You've always seen yourself as just a normal kid, and you're right, that's exactly what you are. You're normally caring, normally cheerful, and you're normally nosy. You've a strong moral compass, concern for your friends, and honor. I know you don't see this, but what's normal to you, well it's far from it. Everyone else would call it courageous and noble. It's because of the person you are that you don't think twice about your own safety when it comes to helping your friends. 'Cause that's just normal to you.
Quote.1463: People like us aren't qualified to be involved in a dramatic incident such as a suicide. No matter how depressed you are or how much pain you're in, you have to return to your routine, daily life. Even if you don't come back, you'll just end up dying in vain. A dramatic death isn't befitting of us.
Quote.1464: When faced with a decision... At such times, we must choose only one option and it can be very confusing. When that happens, simply using your head and charging straight into the obstacle is a fine option.
Quote.1465: Alright already, you had me at shut up.
Quote.1466: Can you understand? Not having a dream... not being needed by anyone... The pain of merely being alive.
Quote.1467: To be loved out of sympathy is more devastating than to be rejected.
Quote.1468: This frustrating happiness... Days so warm it almost makes you dizzy. By this time next year... It may be time for me to stop looking away and know for real. Since I've decided to protect the Book of Friends... Since I decided to accept what I hear and see.
Quote.1469: You don’t waste your time following someone around unless you like him. Stalking is a sign of love.
Quote.1470: You shouldn’t stop like that. If you can move forward, then you should.
Quote.1471: *to Haruhi* I'm begging you. Establish the context before you start talking.
Quote.1472: There's nothing happy about having your fate decided for you! You have to grab your own happiness!
Quote.1473: Our hearts beat in the same rhythm, so why does time flow differently for the two of us?
Quote.1474: Any time one isn't familiar with something, it all looks the same. Knowledge and education are required to properly judge a thing.
Quote.1475: Well, I like to look at myself in my spare time.
Quote.1476: You guys sure are a worthless bunch. If you wanna wallow in your tears, save it for after you've done everything you can!
Quote.1477: However, I can't be happy. I feel I can't have that experience, I can't assume I will have that experience. I'm free, but feeling lonely and disheartened. I hope there's happiness out there. Besides, the future is approaching and waiting for me. In the future, I will be a part of the world. I will finally live my life.
Quote.1479: The rain, the wind, the sun... you bring them all with you. Every time our eyes meet. You bring the world to me.
Quote.1480: Give a kid a smoke and he'll be happy for a day. Teach him how to smoke... he'll be happy for his whole shortened life.
Quote.1481: I am a scientist, I have to act on my own theory. I can't let my emotions get in the way. But it's impossible to forget everything... because I've known you for longer than we've lived. This is reality. This is the world.
Quote.1482: I won't say you'll definitely be able to do it if you don't give up. But if you do give up, then there'll definitely be nothing.
Quote.1483: I don't trust anyone, so no one trusts me
Quote.1484: I’d rather die than become a burden.
Quote.1485: If anyone does not love the Lord Jesus Christ, let them be accursed at His coming. God save you from your fate. Amen!
Quote.1486: It's too bad I don't think of you as anything. If you get in my way... I'll kill you.
Quote.1487: What a lovely voice! But I have to wonder though... is that voice a result of fiddling around with her genes?
Quote.1488: Every brilliant day should be lived for those who passed away.
Quote.1489: I don't let anyone in my sight get away, and my bullets never miss their mark. Especially if it's the heart of a beautiful lady... BANG.
Quote.1490: Give a man a break, and you'll end up broken.
Quote.1491: You may be able to get stronger with simply the right attitude. In other words, train your spirit before worrying about strength through power and technology.
Quote.1492: Life and death are the very basis of all things. They intensify every emotion. Or, to put it in a rather different way, there is nothing quite so dull as "life".
Quote.1493: Have you ever realized how insignificant your existence is on the planet?
Quote.1494: I might seem to be on the losing side to you, but I'm still fighting... Not all battles happen in the brightest, flashiest spots.
Quote.1495: When we die, our bodies disintegrate and become part of the reishi that make up Soul Society. And when that time comes...where does your heart go? It gets passed on to your nakama (comrades). If you pass it on to them, then your heart will always live on within them. Kuchiki, that's why...you must never, ever, ever die alone. Got it, Kuchiki?
Quote.1496: A guy who likes someone else shouldn't be taking care of the girl he just dumped.
Quote.1497: If it's a wish that can be fulfilled, then fulfill it. If there's hesitation and worries, then remove the sources of worries altogether.
Quote.1498: Whether I win or lose is up to me.
Quote.1499: Gohan, you showed me that power is nothing without being guided without love.
Quote.1500: If fate were real, then I would say meeting someone new would constitute such a thing.
Quote.1501: And what's the real lesson? Don't leave things in the fridge.
Quote.1502: Never beg and earn by winning or else you won't get anything.
Quote.1503:
Look, look around carefully. Strain your eyes. At the darkness around us... At the darkness... around me. You said, "anywhere but here". This is where. Here at the border. Gathered by the winds. Those who've met their final destiny hanging between jealousy and regret. Those who failed, swept together here. You say "It doesn't matter where". If you follow me, this is where you'll go! This is your Eden!

You run from it. It is no Eden.
If you follow me... to this place... the entire world... is a battlefield.
Quote.1504: People's feelings sometimes go astray and lead to irreversible consequences.
Quote.1505: [thinking after Soifon asks why she didn't take her with her] You've gotten stronger since the last time we were together, Soifon.
Quote.1506: If it's going to be a relationship of hardship and mental agony, you should put an end to it.
Quote.1507: Farewell, warrior of the sky. I pray... you don't forgive me.
Quote.1508: It was the only way the world had to be fixed! A purpose, given to me!
Quote.1509: If this is all it takes to tear us apart, then maybe we weren't all that close to begin with.
Quote.1510: I thought that I was, to a certain degree, an intelligent person. When I realized I was an idiot, I was really shocked!
Quote.1511: This is a world where people’s hearts are filled with hatred... where fingers have no purpose other than to pull triggers.
Quote.1512: True happiness only lasts for a brief time, so you better enjoy it while you can, right?
Quote.1513: I'd be lying if I said things are going according to my plan... but beggars can't be choosers, right?
Quote.1514: Destiny is what you create with your own will.
Quote.1515: Live, Clare! Your staying alive is the only proof that Teresa ever existed.
Quote.1516: There's a lot of products that you can buy with money...but my love is the only limited product that only you can have.
Quote.1517: Dreams. Each man longs to pursue his dream. Each man is tortured by this dream, but the dream gives meaning to his life. Even if the dream ruins his life, man cannot allow himself to leave it behind. In this world, is man ever able to possess anything more solid, than a dream?
Quote.1518: Sometimes people put up walls, not to keep others out, but to see who cares enough to break them down.
Quote.1519: Your high school life will be over before you know it. There are things you can only do now. You should do as many of them as you can.
Quote.1520: Are you a coward...OR ARE YOU A MAN OF AMERICA?!
Quote.1521: What took a very long time to build up takes mere moments to destroy. But you can always start over. Next time around, you'll do a better job.
Quote.1522: I'm gonna take my place as a true member of this family!
Quote.1523: The chickens have earned their right to live, while the humans will go hungry.
Quote.1524: With Roku gone and the Great Comet returning, the timing was perfect to change the world. I knew the next Avatar would be born an Air Nomad so I wiped out the Air Temples, but somehow the new Avatar eluded me. I wasted the remainder of my life searching in vain. I know he's hiding out there somewhere: the Fire Nation's greatest threat, the last Airbender.
Quote.1525: Come down here and face me, you third-rate fraud. I'll show you there's no comparison between us!
Quote.1526: You're not as slow as you look, monk.
Quote.1527: The strong don't win. The winners are the strong ones.
Quote.1528: You should try persuasion when people are mentally defenseless. The fascist who proposed that was a demonic genius.
Quote.1529: Don't you want to hang out and waste your life with us?
Quote.1530: It doesn't matter who I am. You can just think of me as the talking air.
Quote.1531: Sometimes, forgetting is a type of happiness.
Quote.1532: Another story of Fruits Basket manga has begun. I have something very important to tell everyone. Yuki is actually...A GIRL!
Quote.1533: You want me to roll over like a dog? Give up, and accept defeat.. Ha! That seems to be the sort of language that your kind is used to using. Language for cowards who forfeited their humanity, because they were too weak to survive as such. Don’t look down on humans, you monsters. Come on. I’ll send you all to hell.
Quote.1534: There is no way to train your heart to be invulnerable.
Quote.1535: No matter how colossal a power you obtain, no matter how gigantic an army you bring with you, I ain't scared. While you've abandoned a hundred, I've connected with a thousand. While you've destroyed a thousand, I've been helped by ten thousand. So what's an army of a few thousand? We have protected everything as just three people. We're the Yorozuya.
Quote.1536: Why are people born? If people are born only to suffer the hard life, is it meant as some kind of punishment? Or a cynical joke? If that's the case, animals that adhere to the survival strategies programmed in their DNA are far more elegant and simple. If there really is an existence worthy of being called a God, I want to ask him just one thing: Is there really fate in the universe? If a man ignored fate, and ignored his instincts and DNA to love someone else... Dear God, is he really human? Just wondering. I hate the word "fate".
Quote.1537: You mongrels. By our next meeting see that you've culled your numbers. Only a true hero is worthy to look upon my glorious presence.
Quote.1538: What do you know of death?!! Have you ever died?!! You think death will preserve your cause forever?!! Ridiculous!! Death leaves nothing behind!! Once a person passes on, nothing remains but dead bones!! If there is one thing I can’t stand, it is a person with no respect for life!!
Quote.1539: If one really wants to change the world...they have to do it by their own hands!
Quote.1540: A path not chosen is the same as a path that never existed.
Quote.1541: Between being eternally unable to wake from a dream, and being eternally unable to dream, which do you think would be more unfortunate? Still, both the dream that we deemed eternal, and this very reality, are destined to end someday.
Quote.1542: If I don't understand how a friend feels, am I not allowed to worry about them? If I don't experience what you do, am I not allowed to worry about you, my friend?
Quote.1543: All the while we've been thinking you were a brilliant strategist when really, you're just a lucky fool.
Quote.1544: It only took a moment for everything to click. In that instant, I understood. A leader is somebody who can bring a sense of calm and excitement at the same time.
Quote.1545: The ideal tool for controlling people is fear. And nothing overwhelms people more than an unseen fear.
Quote.1546: Your friend thinks he can win the prize crown, but he has no hope whatsoever. He is a mere shadow of a true shaman and he will be the first in a long line to perish in my hands.
Quote.1547: Is it so strange to do something for someone else? If the people I love can stay smiling tomorrow... then you can call me foolish or whatever you want.
Quote.1548: You can't pick up water once it's spilled, so handle it carefully.
Quote.1549: This is the first and last time I bring a dude to my bed.
Quote.1550: *to Aang* Protection and power are overrated. I think you are very wise to choose happiness and love.
Quote.1551: As long as I exist, I don't care if there's hell, or if only suffering exists there.
Quote.1552: I don’t want to regret anything because of the way I lived.
Quote.1553: What kind of king makes his men fight at the front line while he sits behind them relaxing?
Quote.1554: Kyon-kun. If I become ruined for marriage will you take me?
Quote.1555: But even if I acted sad over it, nothing would change. Even if I cry, nothing would change.
Quote.1556: No matter what changes, I'll still be me. And I can be whoever I want to be.
Quote.1557: A real man never goes back on his words!
Quote.1558: Well, there's this one hopeless idiot... who'll probably end up crying if I see you again.
Quote.1559: It's not bad to dream. But you also have to consider what's realistic.
Quote.1560: I'm no man's burden! I want to be of use!
Quote.1561: If I were to compare a human’s heart with the ocean, the water would be stagnant. If I were to name the ripples on the water surface….Would it be happiness? Or anger? No. For this ocean, such a description is too shallow. If I want to know what lies upon the deep ocean floors… I would have to open my eyes in the stagnant water. Then swim downwards while enduring the icy deep kicking through the cold and heavy ocean waters. If I truly want to know the human known as myself….even if.. there is nothing there.
Quote.1562:
Waiting for you. Waiting for your knock. The only thing that stands between us is a single door. Shining
my shoes and placing a piece of eternally fresh bread in my pocket, I prepare for my journey.
When you're ready, just look up at me.  Right now, I'm just waiting for you...Waiting for your knock.
Quote.1563: What are you, some tantrum throwing brat who forgot to buy his Jump? Having no money is like having a sinus infection. You just have to ignore it and not pick at it, and it'll go away.
Quote.1564: There are times like that music can convey more than words.
Quote.1565: Listen to your seniors once in a while or I will kill you.
Quote.1566: I won't live my life by another person's script.
Quote.1567: Truth can change its form depending on the observer.
Quote.1568: Well, I give up. Can't win against fools.
Quote.1569: All I ever gained from abandoning something and running away were regrets I couldn't do anything about, and a version of myself that could only resent others. If I come to hate myself, even living becomes a sin. Remorse alone will become my punishment. That's why I've decided to take action of my own free will, so I'll never have the same regrets again.
Quote.1570: Lies are like colours. The more you pile up, the blacker things get.
Quote.1571: Get a hold of yourself, you’re an adult aren’t you?
Quote.1572: People aren't born social. Sure it comes easier to some people... but most people, like you, need to work at it. Some more than others. You're just inexperienced. For example, as a martial artist, you have the strength to break the table with your fist. But you also have the self-control to stop your fist right before it hits the table. You weren't born with that control, were you? You had to refine it. It's the same as interacting with people. But training for that isn't in the mountains - it has to be in town where people live. Mingling with people, hurting them, getting hurt by them. That's how you learn about people and about yourself. If you don't, you'll never care about anyone but yourself. You may be a black belt fighter, but you're still a white belt in dealing with people. For the sake of the girl who will one day tell you she loves you... Don't turn away. Keep training.
Quote.1573: I'm not sure what you're talking about, but to atone for that you got mad and decided to do this alone? Rem... Super slap! For starters, are you dumb? No, you are dumb! Listen, where I'm from there's a saying, "3 heads are better than 1." Wait, is it 2 heads? Whatever, the point is, 3 heads, thinking together are harder to break than only 1 arrow. It means you should rely on those around you instead of thinking about stuff alone!
Quote.1574: If you could calculate feelings, then we'd be in a digital age by now... The remaining answer that you couldn't calculate is what they call the feelings of people.
Quote.1575: Shinpachi, just remember this... We aren't friends with justice or even your sister. We're YOUR friends.
Quote.1576: I won't ever be the best at anything. Or rather, you might say that I've stopped trying to be.
Quote.1577: The world you can see isn't all out there. In the world there are a lot of fascinating things that no living soul has ever seen! And just in knowing that is one cause for happiness. I'm sure you can find happiness meant for you! It might be something you might not quite understand yet. But you'll find it, that much is certain!
Quote.1578: I have told you before, I'm an avenger. I don't care about this test, Chunin or whatever. 'Am I strong?' that's the answer I want.
Quote.1579: True power is forged from the desire smoldering in the heart, it fans into a flame and begins to burn with an intensity one scarcely imagines to be possible...
Quote.1580: Never forget who you are, for surely the world won't.
Quote.1581: His soul was as pure as snow.
Quote.1582: When we hit our lowest point, we are open to the greatest change.
Quote.1583: FOOL! As someone who is unaware of the vital role that singing has played in the cultural history of mankind you are in no position to question me. Remember that the next time you stop to consider your place in this world. You do not possess the power to deny a singer his song. Do you understand what I'm telling you?
Quote.1584: Chakras, chakras, everybody loves chakras! Chakras, chakras! Chakra sandwich tastes good! Yum!
Quote.1585: Don’t underestimate me! Besides, even if you’re just acting, even if you’re an upperclassman
Quote.1586: Everybody loves somebody. In time, everybody falls in love with somebody. Just as I found you.
Quote.1587: This is how culture spreads. When someone has a new idea, it is immediately copied.
Quote.1588: It is the path you have chosen. Take pride in it.
Quote.1589: Don't you know that fans only make flames stronger?
Quote.1590: Against the power of will I posses... The capability of my body is nothing.
Quote.1591: There's only one world for us, and things in it are set up so that we can find happiness in it.
Quote.1592: This is your world. As an outsider it may be out of place to say this... But I want to make one thing clear: Mere observers have no right to decide the future!
Quote.1594: In this world, nobody is free. Even the flying birds are chained to the sky.
Quote.1595: I still can't control my wish to see her. I never thought of how important she was to me. (about Rin)
Quote.1596: I'm sure that things that are truly fun can't be compared. Back then, now, and from now on, in the time you spend with others, lots of small fun things are born and disappear. If you are able to capture each of them, you'll never run out of fun things. Forever and ever. And here's one point of advice. Thinking that now is fun is what makes it the most fun.
Quote.1597: I can't let myself not like the person I like.
Quote.1598: The stray dog in me is dyed into my bones... All I do is howl at the moon, but I don't have the guts to bite...
Quote.1599: You couldn't save your mom because you... weren't strong enough. I didn't face the Titan... because I wasn't brave enough.
Quote.1600: Fighting without hope is no way to live. It's just a way to die.
Quote.1601: Sometimes, it's necessary to look back at the past in order to move on to the future.
Quote.1602: Once you meet someone, you never really forget them. It just takes a while for your memory to come back to you.
Quote.1603: *To himself, while fighting Temari* Oh man... those clouds are so lucky. so free. More to the point, I didn't feel like doing this in the first place. And I only became a ninja because I thought life would've been more interesting as one... I suppose things aren't gonna be that simple.
Quote.1604: If you feel yourself hitting up against your limit, remember for what cause you clench your fists! Remember why you started down this path, and let that memory carry you beyond your limit.
Quote.1605: Do you think it's possible to send Flame Alchemy through the phone and burn someones ears off?
Quote.1606: I don't know how to give up!!
Quote.1607: They say when you fall, it's best to fall straight to the bottom, and the farther you have to crawl back up, the stronger and greater you'll be as a result.
Quote.1608: Tohru, you must always be yourself and do things at your own pace. Someday... you'll catch up.
Quote.1610: This area feels weird, it's been throbbing hard since that time. When you told me not to go. When you held me so tight. It won't go away. Your voice is still in my ear. What happened to me? Is this... love?
Quote.1611: I wanted to tell you that… Wherever you may end up in this world, I will be searching for you.
Quote.1612: If there are things you learn with friends, there must also be things you learn without friends. They must be of equal worth, two sides of the same coin.
Quote.1613: There is a meaning for wings that cannot fly! It's a precious memory of when you once flew in the sky.
Quote.1614: If you can't understand the darkness in your opponent's heart, you will never comprehend the pain and suffering of others.
Quote.1615: 99% of perception that normal humans have are closed off. Those who don’t think of themselves are quite foolish beings.
Quote.1616: Stake your lives on this fight! Our survival demands that we stake our lives on this fight! And to survive, is to be victorious!
Quote.1617: Good evening, Espada. There has been an enemy attack. But first...Let us brew some tea.
Quote.1618: Leave her out of this... who we let in this house is really none of your concern. You're the one who doesn't belong here. (to Kyo)
Quote.1619: We will never laugh at ourselves. Just as earthworms do not fear darkness and penguins are not ashamed of their inability to fly. That's the meaning of life, is it not?
Quote.1620: So I'll search for my real ''wings'', because if I stay in the comfort of my nest, I'll never be able to use my own strength to fly.
Quote.1621: The idea that you can't die yet because you still have something to protect... that is the foolish illusion of the weak.
Quote.1622: If you use him, you’ll get rid of all the curses nearby in a flash.
Quote.1623: This is the end of my dream. My wings forgot how to fly, since I only kept pretending to flap them. Is there a meaning to wings that can't fly?
Quote.1624: A place where someone still thinks about you is a place you can call home.
Quote.1625: [Fuu passed out after one drink and is asleep] Sleeping so carelessly. I could do something to you so easily.
Quote.1626: Fortunately, I do not have any pride. But what about it? Will the name of the hero be disgraced? Hah, don't make me laugh, Lancer. You can wash away disgrace with results. You can feed your meaningless pride to the dogs.
Quote.1627:
As they say about the vulgar masses, the more people flock to a group, the more foolish they become. No matter how prominent an individual is, no, it’s because he is prominent that he would be blotted out by the sheer force of numbers when thrown into that lump of people. Individual will, qualifications, and personality, let alone emotions aren’t considered at all.
