Quote.2621: The key is to be like the leaf, flow... with the movement of the gates. Airbending is all about spiral movements. When you meet resistance, you must be able to switch directions at a moments notice.
Quote.2622: A flower raised in a greenhouse is still beautiful, even though it knows no adversity. But a flower growing in the field that has braved wind, rain, cold, and heat possesses something more than just beauty.
Quote.2623: Sunday, May 14th at 14:15:30--the moment I got Senjōgahara's phone number.
Quote.2624: I would come up there and finish you off. If you didn't look half dead already.
Quote.2625: Something that's supposed to die and doesn't will eventually rot away, whether it's a man or a nation.
Quote.2626: Sometimes the things that matter the most are right in front of you.
Quote.2627: If comrades that you trust gather around you, hope can take physical form and become visible. That`s what I believe...
Quote.2628: Not killing people is really hard. Clean living is tough.
Quote.2629: Everyone wants to think like this: "It can't be helped if I lose against someone with talent". Like that, be it consciously or unconsciously... People put a lid on their hearts. They want to protect their pride, self-esteem... or whatever.
Quote.2630: Team isn't just something to be protected. A team also protects you. We don't support each because we are a team. We are a team because we support each other.
Quote.2631: What do you suppose the most irrational thing is? - It's humanity.
Quote.2632: At times the life of a single man is worth more than that of a million, I thought that'd be common sense to a soldier.
Quote.2633: [to Chad and Orihime] Your transformation is not a disease. You were just given the key to the door in front of you. There's no need to know the cause. No need for sorrow or sadness. What comes next is up to you. You can use your keys to open the door...or lock it tight. And if you do choose to open it... You can still decide not to pass through.
Quote.2634: You can believe in anything. But it's your heart...That ultimately decides.
Quote.2635: Fail to strike the enemy once you know their location, and it'll be too late to even regret having missed the chance.
Quote.2636: Apparently Goku hasn't eaten in 500 years, his body's making up for lost time.
Quote.2637: Kagura... Regardless of what your reason was, when you played with me...I was happy. Thanks. (To Kagura)
Quote.2638: At what speed must I live...to be able to see you again..?
Quote.2639: So, you would question me, you filthy mongrel? Me, the one true king? If you cannot now discern my identity in the presence of my magnificent glory, then you’re ignorant blindness will serve to seal your doom!
Quote.2640: That's pretty bad when you can even give a half demon the creeps. *to Kagome*
Quote.2641: Bakugo, you said you wanted to learn what you couldn’t do right? your ability is top notch, well for a rookie at least. But as you are, you will never be able to surpass me. This winter might just be training, but if you’re too slow, you won’t be able to use your normal excuse anymore. This is not a classroom, if you’re ever too slow, you won’t be losing points, but rather human lives.
Quote.2642: If I suddenly showed up, would I bother him? Surprise him? There’s no way we could meet. But what if we did? What should I do? Would I annoy him? Would it be awkward? Or maybe… He’d be a bit glad to see me?
Quote.2643: There're too many people who worry about the things I don't worry about.
Quote.2645: If there's a miracle that can be reached by fighting to the end, then I want to see it.
Quote.2646: So everyone just pretends to understand... and pretends to be understood.
Quote.2647: Dictatorship itself isn't absolutely evil, it's just another form of government. The point is how you can run it for the benefit of society.
Quote.2648: The lesson you need to learn right now can’t be taught with words, only with action.
Quote.2649: Whenever people see birds flying through the sky, it's said that they get the urge to go on a journey.
Quote.2650: Up until now, have you not faced the same enemies as I? That means you are my friend! So hold your chest high, and consider yourself my equal.
Quote.2651: I don't have anywhere to go back to. All we can do is keep moving forward.
Quote.2652: We're not Demons or Gods. We're just humans.
Quote.2654:
The universe has a beginning, but no end. — Infinity.
Stars, too, have their own beginnings, but their own power results in their destruction. — Finite.
It is those who possess wisdom who are the greatest fools. History has shown us this.
You could say that this is the final warning from God to those who resist.
Quote.2655: I hope it's a cool morning. That's how cool days always start out. And a cool guy like me deserves the coolest morning possible.
Quote.2656: Love is like a mirror that reflects your bad side. Especially when it’s unrequited, you get envious, jealous, prejudiced, and resentful. You have to face all sorts of emotions, but there’s no reason to find that shameful. It shows how serious you are. Oh yeah, do you want me to tell you how to break that mirror? It’s not anything hard, understand the other person. That’s all. Don’t make any quick judgment and let them do the same.
Quote.2657: Life is basically like a soap bubble. It rides on the wind, flying here and there... and before you realize it - pop! It's gone. When it's about to disappear, you think that you could've flown a little higher. But by the time, it's already too late.
Quote.2658: Are you afraid? You don’t want to die, do you? Not just Abarai, if anyone… acts upon the thought of not wanting you to die, you will suddenly begin to fear your impending death, right?
Quote.2659: You can't just wait. You need to make things happen yourself.
Quote.2660: Before I am a Servant, I am a knight. I can only serve but one lord.
Quote.2661: When you point a sword at someone, either you kill them or they kill you, there ain't no in between. So quit talkin' like a fuckin' pussy. Anyone who can't handle that should just SHUT THE FUCK UP and GET OVER IT!
Quote.2662: [About Omashu] There really is no fathoming the depths of my hatred for this place.
Quote.2663: You, who've taken on his name, have managed – well, nothing.
Quote.2664: You don't understand death at all. That's why you can't kill me, and why you're only able to kill a weakened woman. If you could see death, you couldn't maintain your sanity. All you can perceive is the part which keeps things alive. If you could see death, you wouldn't be able to even stand... It's like the world on the moon, a desolate wasteland. Being able to see the "death" of things means you are forced to see the world's uncertainty and fragility. The ground is like it's not there, and the sky seems about to fall at any moment. You don't know of the illusion that the whole world could perish in an instant. That is what it means to see death. These eyes, this power isn't something you can boast about like you did. Do you see your mistake, now, vampire? Life and death may be back to back, but they will never face each other. I'll show you. This is what it means to kill something.
Quote.2665: Playing is more important. You can work any time.
Quote.2666: Maybe I was lonely. Maybe I've just... always... been lonely.
Quote.2667: You must be prepared to face the worst possible scenarios. Because harsh reality strikes without warning.
Quote.2668: Even if we walk on different paths, one must always live on as you are able! You must never treat your own life as something insignificant! You must never forget the friends you love for as long as you live! Let bloom the flowers of light within your hearts.
Quote.2669: Snowdrop. I also don't know what I'm looking for. What does the future hold? Will I be able to not forget what I have found?
Quote.2670: I'm sorry. I couldn't keep my promise. I wanted to go into a line of work where I could protect people. That's why I became a detective. But Makishima changed everything. That man will continue to kill people. And yet, the law can't judge him. As long as I'm a detective, I can't touch him. This case made me aware... that the law can't protect people.
Quote.2671: That's right! I admired his desire to save people because it was beautiful! But none of that feeling is my own! What else can you call it but hypocrisy?! I was driven by my obsessive need to help someone. I kept running, neither noticing the pain nor how wrong I was! But it's all a fake. Such hypocrisy can not save anything. No, first of all, I didn't even know what I wanted to save!
Quote.2672: [Referring to Tosen] He's such a boy scout, wouldn't you agree?
Quote.2673: Not bad, for an early prototype.
Quote.2674: There is no match that you know that "you can't win". Even if a match like that exists, the thing that decides the defeat is your heart. That makes you think you've "lost".
Quote.2675: Yeah I lied; so what is the truth? Underneath the band-aid?
Quote.2676: I am who I am because I learned your ideals and took your prayers to the heart. You've guided me. You've given me a life a mere puppet wouldn't have. You need not to pity me. I am a part of you.
Quote.2677: You've fought a valiant duel, my friend, and this is the hardest move I've ever had to make. But this ends now!
Quote.2678: I’ve always been wondering, even though you’ve been treating me carefully like a princess, are you just trying to keep your distance away from me? You praise me so much and belittle yourself, so I feel that you’re trying to keep your distance away from me...
Quote.2679: It's amazing how every time you open your mouth, you manage to prove you're an idiot.
Quote.2680: When life changes to be harder, change yourself to be stronger.
Quote.2681: Unnecessary thoughts will only interfere with your plays.
Quote.2682: It's okay to feel depressed. It takes time to overcome things. And then, by taking that time, you just start moving forward again. That's just what humans do.
Quote.2683: You may be unfortunate, but that doesn't mean you have to suffer. You may not be blessed, but that doesn't mean you have to throw a fit over it. Even if bad things happen to you, just be strong!
Quote.2684: You may be able to save us. If you stay and protect us. But what's good is that everyone else dies! Please go!! Captain Komamura!!!
Quote.2685: How is this possible? I must be the first person in history who was flushed down the toilet!
Quote.2686: The reader will be me. I have no love, maybe I'll end up interpreting some things in a weird way. However, the reader is free to decide how to read things and with which intonation.
Quote.2687: C'mon, there is no such thing as gross stuff in this world...  Except for GROSSLY CUTE things.
Quote.2688: There are two ways to escape: escape without a purpose, and escape with a purpose. I call the former "floating", and the latter "flight". You are the only one that decides which of the two your view of the world from on high was. But you don't choose these paths because of the weight on your soul. We don't choose the path we take because of the sins we carry. But we carry our sins on the path we choose.
Quote.2689: Even since the industrial revolution, humanity has used its technological knowledge for conflict and repeatedly risked its own extinction. Though great leaders appeared at times, they’d reach the end of their lives in a few decades... and the world would return to a state of chaos.
Quote.2690: I too used to believe that the world would be a better place if I hadn’t been born. I was hated merely for the fact that I existed, and I died for the happiness of many people. But there was one thing I wished for with all my heart… If I’m ever given a second chance in life, I want to live for only myself. That is my sincere wish.
Quote.2691: As long as the kindness received from others... is returned back, it's fine even if it takes time.
Quote.2692: I won't come to hate you! Never! Regardless of what happens in the future!
Quote.2693: "If I do this, I can stop the rebellion”, “if I do that, I can stop the rebellion”... Open your eyes, princess! Your zealous idealism disgusts me! Ideals can only be spoken by those powerful enough to carry them out. And that excludes you!
Quote.2694: In the end the shape and form don't matter at all, it's only the soul that matters, right? Nothing else.
Quote.2695: Do you know what the most primitive emotion people have is? It’s fear.
Quote.2696: When going on an adventure it's hard to stay calm. As humans, even if we know the adventure will be full of pain and sorrow, we still choose to go on it. Real adventures are not like the ones depicted in games or comic books - they're neither easy nor quick and they can break a person's heart. Real adventures can torment people. They can make you regret ever going on them. But still, that's the true meaning of an adventure. If that's so, then why do we, as people, choose to go on them? Why is that? Because we want to be heroes. Real heroes don't give up, even in front of pain or sorrow or regret! Rather, they want to live a full life. That's what real heroes are!
Quote.2697: There comes a time when we can no longer tell the invaders from the invaded. That is what we call “War”.
Quote.2698: Don't put me on their level. I don't care about looking interesting. I'm just self-conscious.
Quote.2699: [Sees Yoruichi in cat form] Yes! It's Yoruichi! You've come back! Ha ha ha!! [Picks her up] Come here you little devil, let me take a look at you! You're my fuzzy little troublemaker, yes you are! Now who's your daddy? Hmm?
Quote.2700: I have no parents, and I'm not a product of love. Therefore, I can't understand what a 'good wife' is. Even so... the love he gave me is my entire world. No one can humiliate that.
Quote.2701: I find it fascinating how we can see something with our eyes, hear with our ears and speak from our mouths. Although science tells us how they work, I just really can't grasp it. I don't know how everyday items like phones work. I can't even explain why a bicycle is fast. When I think like this, I wonder how many things I really understand. Yet I can live on. Because all these mysteries have joined together to keep me alive. Sometimes I admire that before I go to bed.
Quote.2702: Mom, you're embarrassing me! In front of all these people? Don't you know I'm a big kid now?
Quote.2703: No matter how much he wants it, he can't be a normal human anymore. *about Rin*
Quote.2704: How should I put this... There are times when you begin to hate everything around you.
Quote.2705: Run until you can't run anymore, and then run again. Constant effort is life's greatest shortcut.
Quote.2706: I never once thought that the world was fair, but some things will never change. If you want things to change, don't wait for someone to do it for you, go change it yourself.
Quote.2707: The bonds we have with those close to us, keep us connected always.
Quote.2708: I never ask them to trust me at all. I told them to come with me but I never told them to trust me. And I always tell them not to trust anyone, including myself. But sadly, there are not many strong enough to do that.
Quote.2709: Don't let yourself be blinded by fear or anger.  Everything is only as it is.
Quote.2710: Neutral Jing is the key to earthbending. It involves listening and waiting for the right moment to strike.
Quote.2711: Human beings are dangerous. If we're seen, we have to leave. My parents said so.
Quote.2712: Saying that people's personalities are products of their pasts isn't totally wrong. The way people live depends on their experiences.
Quote.2713: There isn't anything that's evil to everyone. Even the worst evil saves something. On the other hand, even the greatest good hurts someone. The phrase "There are no absolutes in this world" means there isn't any absolute good or absolute evil.
Quote.2714: You've trapped yourself in a body you hated hiding in the pain, and now you want to torture yourself again for eternity...haven't we both paid enough?
Quote.2715: Every story has an ending. One day, we won’t be able to stay together.
Quote.2716: I decided to stop calling out for someone who would never call back.
Quote.2718: We humans can indeed lose again something we've lost already.
Quote.2719: Memories - they can sometimes become vague and foggy and there are times when they disappear altogether. Therefore, because there are many things I don't want to lose track of, I will record everything in here (his diary) for the sake of those moments that should not be forgotten.
Quote.2720: I don't think I'm cut out for manual labor. I need to get a more creative job, like saving the whales.
Quote.2721: If there's someone you wish to see, then you are no longer alone.
Quote.2722: Once you see a guy ignore the light in order to cross the street, you just can't stand still.
Quote.2723: Do you know what's the most important thing about climbing mountains is? It's not about having the courage to challenge it, It's about having the courage to back down.
Quote.2724: Even if you're trying to protect someone, you must never use your power to hurt others.
Quote.2725: You don't know anything. What the hell is up with you? Trying to be the hero? Feel like some all-powerful main character? So annoying! Why? When? Where? What? How will you do and just who will you become? You're just pretending by spouting your ideals! You have nothing! You won't become someone.
Quote.2726: We should be driven by things like our desires, instincts, and impulses. That's how it should be.
Quote.2727: There's no lack of painful things in this world, but hunger and loneliness must surely be two of the worst. Thanks to you, I didn't know a moment of either of them.
Quote.2728: This blank space represents infinite potential. One day, it may become anything.
Quote.2729: Don’t judge a book by its cover. You don’t know her circumstances, do you!
Quote.2730: Luxury means something with no meaning at all
Quote.2731: If you don't take risks, you can't create a future.
Quote.2732: If we're going to regret it either way, then let's regret doing something fun that we wanted to do.
Quote.2733: Even now, twenty centuries after the death of Christ, the world is a long way from peace.
Quote.2734: Become strong not just for your own sake, but for your friends.
Quote.2735: Money can buy companionship, but not its quality.
Quote.2736: Our souls, together till the end!
Quote.2737: Assassins Rule Number Three - Speed: Take out the target before the target notices your presence.
Quote.2738: When people focus on what they want to do, they’ll show off an inexplicable charm.
Quote.2739: A beautiful speech, I can see it now, you truly are a prince with the royal blood of a Saiyan.
Quote.2740: My name is Krad. But you do not have to remember it, because here you will die.
Quote.2741: If I die here, then I'm a man that could only make it this far.
Quote.2742: Dammit, is that how you greet your son who went out of his way to help a ghost on the way home?!
Quote.2743: We do not stop playing games because we grow old, we grow old because we stop playing.
Quote.2744: Do you understand the sorrow of a star that cannot return to the heavens?
Quote.2745: Ugly?! Who you callin' ugly?! C'mere you mouse!
Quote.2746: Humans aren't made perfectly. Everyone lies. Even so... I've been careful not to tell lies that hurt others.
Quote.2747: Relax, Sokka. Where we're going, you won't need any pants!
Quote.2748: Crying when you need to cry is another way to show strength.
Quote.2749: Skipping school for one day might not be a problem, but if you skip for three days in a row, it'd be really hard to convince yourself to go back.
Quote.2750: This is exactly why I detest adults! You always have such a parochial approach, always trying to force the rules of your petty world onto others!
Quote.2751: You have already fulfilled my expectations. It appears that you’re still hiding a wealth of potential. I was watching you while your Guardians struggled to overcome their trials, and I could tell from your behavior and actions that you were always putting them first. And that didn’t change when Daemon set his trap. I witnessed your resolve to protect your Family, and I was impressed. Your Guardians also responded similarly. Sawada Tsunayoshi, I deem you worthy as boss of the tenth-generation Vongola Family
Quote.2752: Reaper Combat Art: Mortal Sin Stance.
Quote.2753: Everyone makes mistakes. What's important is how to make up for it.
Quote.2754: The world... is a very small place, but... for those who know it, it is very, very large. And the world... when it is viewed by those who know... is far larger than just one world can hold.
Quote.2755: Fear is necessary for evolution. The fear that could be destroyed at any moment.
Quote.2757: What if, and this is strictly hypothetical, what if you could reload your save data to change your previous choice, like in a game? Would it change your life? The answer is a resounding no.
Quote.2758: (Her dad) He'd always tell me that family isn't about being related by blood. Living under the same roof and caring for each other is what family is all about.
Quote.2759: I've liked him for so long. So long. But Mayama likes someone else. But I wanna hear his voice. I want to hold his hand. I feel like this.
Quote.2760: Knowing more means having more shit to deal with, you know.
Quote.2761: Humans cannot create anything out of nothingness. Humans cannot accomplish anything without holding onto something. After all, humans are not gods.
Quote.2762: The past and the future are not the same, but they're not completely separate either.
Quote.2763: People like you disgust me. You can't even face your own weakness.
Quote.2764: If we understood how other people felt, then nobody would ever start wars!
Quote.2765: That's people for you. Trusting one another, helping one another- it's all a fantasy. Humans are creatures that will always betray.
Quote.2766: Life is short so it will be appreciated. We live to our fullest due to that.
Quote.2767: [thinking as Nel tells her to cheer for Ichigo] That's right. To begin with, I came here just thinking I wanted to protect everyone. But when I heard they had come to save me, I couldn't help but feel a little glad, just a bit in my heart. When I look at Kurosaki-kun in that mask, I think that he might not have come here to save me at all. Even though it's wrong, they shouldn't be going that far for me.
Quote.2768: Remember how you're supposed to let go right away when you fall off a horse and hit the ground? You don't need to hurt yourself for no reason. If you don't let go, you'll get dragged by the horse and get hurt.
Quote.2769: People like you... are the reason why people like me need medication.
Quote.2770: Exactly when did I say that I do this because I am a shinigami? My killing you is no other reason than the fact that you... Pointed your blade [view shifts to Rukia] at my pride.
Quote.2771: When saying good-bye to this world, our great father split his blood into four: the eldest inherited only his sense of responsibility, the second eldest inherited only his easygoing personality, the youngest inherited only his innocence, and me, well, I inherited only his idiocy.  What held us diverse brothers together was the love of our mother, deeper than the sea, and the farewell we bid our great father.  Sometimes, one profound separation can unite the ones left behind.
Quote.2772: When a dog soils the carpet, its master is responsible.
Quote.2773: You know, it'd really be embarrassing to get eaten by something that came out of an egg this tiny.
Quote.2774: Fine then, in exchange, you can roam around looking like a cosplayer, violate weapon laws, get arrested by the police, and get interviewed on television.
Quote.2775: You were wrong on two counts. Even the hardest substance can be broken, when crashed into itself. And the ability to feel pain is not a weakness. It’s a strength. Pain tells a creature its vulnerabilities, and not you expose them to attack. Your robot is dead. And so, I’m afraid, are you.
Quote.2776: We are weak Mumei. But, that doesn't mean we just roll over and accept our fate.
Quote.2777: When you're in a town like this, all covered with smoke - you forget that there's a world outside. Nothing amazing happens here. And you get used to that. Used to a world where everything is ordinary. Every day we spend here is like a whole lifetime of dying slowly. But now Haruko is here. That's how I know there really is a world outside.
Quote.2778: Look at the sky, it's so far away. But right here, right now, it seems so close.
Quote.2779: Even if you're not interested, just read my recommendation. Putting aside disliking the food before trying it, I won't forgive you if you dismiss manga without giving it a chance.
Quote.2780: I never rely on luck. It's all my own choice. It leads me to the future.
Quote.2781: I woke up feeling refreshed, after dreaming about a long shower. But of course, it was an illusion.
Quote.2782: Rather than leaving someone to die, I'd much rather die together with them.
Quote.2783: Even if you can forget, you can't erase the past.
Quote.2784: I am who I am now because of my past. Calling any choice I made a mistake would be calling who I am now a mistake.
Quote.2785: You said I should have forgotten everything and lived as a human, but... there's no way I could do that. At that time, Teresa was everything to me. Everything I lost... my life, my voice, even my joy in living... Teresa gave those back to me. Teresa gave me everything. So I had no choice but to move forward. I wasn't strong enough to forget all that and continue living.
Quote.2786: That dog is neither man nor monster. Only a man can truly hope to kill a monster.
Quote.2787: Oh, well. No matter what path they take, people without guts have nothing ahead of them.
Quote.2788: Don’t tell me he wants to conquer the world? Can’t he come up with something more original?
Quote.2789: We've got no light of hope in our future! Nothing is going to happen! Our lives will be as dull as rocks! Maybe it's a life of boring happiness! But I don't want to be an adult who pretends to be satisfied with it!
Quote.2790: With so much time left, I thought I’d park myself at the gate… but, well, taking that approach is just no fun at all… Because watching you run and shriek like a baby… makes the sadist in me ache for a chance to play.
Quote.2791: The world is full of choices unseen. With the willingness to notice, anyone can choose a world of their very own, from an infinity of choices.
Quote.2792: I still don't know where to find happiness. But I'll continue to think about whether it's good to be here... whether it was good to have been born. But in the end, it's just realizing the obvious over and over again. Because I am myself.
Quote.2793: Yeah, it's still a nameless sniper. It's become quite a topic among us. She's still a cadet from the military academy, but at any rate she's got a good arm. It seems she's been brought all the way out here. Hah... to think they have to pull out even a little chick like that... this must be the end.
Quote.2794: There's always something one can't explain even if one has experience with it.
Quote.2795: We could drive them off the entire earth if we had your strength, Gintoki!
Quote.2796: Do you have something you want from me? You’re in quite a panic.
Quote.2797: Ayuzawa, you are the first person ever to appear in my life and able to make me a mess.
Quote.2798: I was the only one who got an A ranking for the Public Safety Bureau. There were more than 500 students and I was the only one. So I thought that there must have been something that only I could do at the Bureau. If I went there, I thought I could find my purpose in life... I thought I'd be able to find out why I was born here and now!
Quote.2799: You see, I'm sure we can change, because we're weak. And because we die. We have to fight in order to live, and that is what will make us strong.
Quote.2800: Don't mistake borrowed power for your own ability!
Quote.2801: Cast aside the illusion that there is a beginning and end to the story. The story has no beginning. And it has no end. All there is, is a performance of people connecting, living, influencing each other, and departing.
Quote.2802: I always lied to you telling you to forgive me. I used these hands to keep you at distance... I did not want you to get involved. But now... I think you could have changed father and mother. Perhaps even the entire Uchiha. If I would have stood in front of you and looked you in the eyes from the very beginning... talked to you instead of down to you... and been open about everything. But I failed, and speaking to you now, like this, isn't going to undo the permanent damage that's already been done to you. That's why I wanted to show you the truth. Even if it's just a little. And no matter what you decide to do from here on out, you never have to forgive me - I will always love you.
Quote.2803: You should enjoy the little detours. To the fullest. Because that's where you'll find the things more important than what you want.
Quote.2804: You see, I really hate the word "responsibility" saying something or doing something "it's your responsibility" "take responsibility" making a "selection" always comes with "responsibility." That's why I abandoned "selection" therefore, I don't have to bear any responsibility anymore.
Quote.2805: They say that we should love ourselves first, before other people learn to love us, but it's not as easy as it seems. Sometimes, we need someone to accept us and love us first, then we would learn to see ourselves through that person's eyes and learn to love our-self.
Quote.2806: All I need is the power to be able to protect my comrades. So long as I can have the strength to do that, I don't care if I'm weaker than everyone else in the world.
Quote.2807: Even though I've lost my way, I will save you.
Quote.2808: Even if a question has a proper answer, sometimes one cannot simply give it away.
Quote.2809: In this world, there are very few people who actually trust each other.
Quote.2810: My soul wave length just got taken away. I'm gonna miss it.
Quote.2811: I kinda like that about you. If only everyone had the guts to fight for each other like you do, the world might have been a better place.
Quote.2812: I would be nothing without you.
Quote.2813: Stay the fuck back, you freak!
Quote.2815: Those who underestimate their enemies will not last long in this world.
Quote.2816: The disturbance in the stitch, is a disturbance in the heart.
Quote.2817: If all the villains attacking tonight are on his level… everyone’s in trouble. And they might be after us students. I need to tell Mr. Aizawa and the Wild, Wild Pussycats what I know. If my actions can save any of them… Then I’ve gotta do something.
Quote.2818: No matter what happens, you are still you...our family.
Quote.2819: I just want to keep looking at her.
Quote.2820: The road of life is never without trials and tribulations.
Quote.2821: Even if doesn't alter or change the end result in the slightest, making decisions based on convictions that you believe in and walking your own path has its own merit and worth. There's something to be said for not having... even one regret.
Quote.2822: All they saw in me was another little ghetto rat with no power and no God. What's left for a poor little Chinese bitch to rely on? It's money of course. And guns. Fuckin' A, with these two things, the world is a great place.
Quote.2823: What does it mean to be reborn? That isn't the life I had anymore. It's someone else's life. Everyone only gets to live life one time [Yuri places her hand on her chest.], and it's right here. I only get it once. This is my life. I can't entrust it to someone, I can't steal a new one, I can't force it on others, I can't forget it or erase it. I can't stomp over it, laugh at it, or beautify it! I can't anything! I'd have to accept my one shot at life no matter how cruel, merciless, or unfair I thought it was! Sir, don't you understand? That is why I must fight. I must keep on fighting! Because... because I can never [slams her desk with her hands] accept that kind of life!
Quote.2824: Damn, at least one of us should've died!
Quote.2826: Gravel may be gravel, but me? I’m gravel that shatters diamonds!
Quote.2827: I've got nowhere to go back to. So all I can do is move forward.
Quote.2828: Being able to forget things you want to forget, and being able to remember things you want to remember, is such a great thing, you know?
Quote.2829: Even if it's a rule... whether or not I follow it is up to me. Whether I obey the rule or break it and get killed by my comrades... is my choice.
Quote.2830: In their own way, fights are also a valid form of communication.
Quote.2831: What is "Courage"? Courage is owning your fear!
Quote.2832: If you follow your rage into battle, I have a feeling that terrible things can happen.
Quote.2833:
Question: The world will not change, but you can change yourself. So then, how will you change? 
Answer: You become the god of a new world.
Quote.2834: The world will always be filled with injustice. If you have time to give up or hold a grudge against that injustice, then use that time to enjoy battling those injustices instead.
Quote.2835: Mages of Fairy Tail... specialize in property damage!
Quote.2836: No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day, eventually.
Quote.2837: It doesn't matter where I look, it's always idiots as far as the eye can see.
Quote.2838: If you're alone... if it's just your life, you can use it however you please/ Wear yourself out, get cut to ribbons, doesn't matter. But when there's two, the blade grows heavy. Fighting like death doesn't concern you becomes a thing of the past. It's no longer just you. I threw away my way of life, relied on the strength of others, and somehow pushed on.
Quote.2839: *to Alucard* Demons do not cry... You became a demon, because you couldn't cry anymore, right? Humans cry, and when their tears finally run dry, there is nothing left, but a demon, nor a monster, and one finally prayer for death...
Quote.2840: If this is the path you choose to walk... I will not interfere. But if you turn the people against you... Will you be able to function as a hero? This worries me. But if you ever get in a tight spot... I will be there.
Quote.2841: Forget what hurt you in the past, but never forget what it taught you.
Quote.2842: Take advantage of what you have, while you have it.
Quote.2843: We're not going to sneak in, we're gonna bust in. To bust in means to go in from the front, guns blazing.
Quote.2845: That’s right. I’m nice. After everything that has happened in my life, I still haven’t gone after anyone or anything in revenge. If I were normal I would have destroyed the world by now. In a sense it makes me a savior of sorts.
Quote.2846: Make a contract with me, and become a magical girl!
Quote.2847: The only thing you can change about the past is how you feel about it in the present.
Quote.2848: Falling is just another way of flying.
Quote.2849: Smile. Not for anyone else, but for yourself. Show yourself your own smile. You'll feel better then.
Quote.2850: Bruises and fractures heal with time, but the wounds in people's hearts do not heal as easily.
Quote.2851: You know, I discovered something. Everyone has something... Something deep inside their hearts. For some, it might have been enmity. For others, admiration. Wishes, a craving for the spotlight, feelings that one wants to deliver, feelings for one's mother. Everyone was supported by their own feelings. I realize now that, perhaps, no one can stand alone on stage.
Quote.2852: To become Hokage is my dream!
Quote.2853: Dressing up on the outside won’t change what’s on the inside.
Quote.2854: You can't just run away, especially from the things you want to forget!
Quote.2855: The envy of a man runs deeper than a woman's, surprisingly.
Quote.2856: My heart is a cold cage where lies a person far more than my self, with an eye that can see the truth but reflects nothing, a cold stare from a distant person that use to know how to smile.
Quote.2857: The main reason I got stronger was so I’d be able to survive.
Quote.2858: I wouldn't call myself a saint, but I think I do alright. My mind's about as sharp as the average person. When it comes to an iron will or noble spirit, well... I might have to ask you to turn a blind eye there...
Quote.2859: You want to walk into a Fire Nation town when they're all fired up with their, you know, fire?
Quote.2861: He feared sleep. He'd say that his soul would slip down into nothing. They say that man never dreamt after the day he cut his pillow.
Quote.2862: Aside from the fact that I don't have any friends or girlfriends, I'm still a high quality product!
Quote.2863: Hatred will never be erased! The only thing you can do... is erase the ones you hate!
Quote.2864: Where in this world can a sane man be found? We're the same. We're all the same. None of us understands what it means to love all. Or the meaning of life...Or the meaning of death...Or the meaning of our own battles.
Quote.2865: Even if you have regrets, even if you have remorse, you must fight. If you have made the decision for yourself to fight, to struggle, then fight with all you have. Do not give up for one second, one moment, or one instant. Cling greedily to the victory you have within your sight. If you can still stand, if your fingers still move, if all your teeth have not broken, stand and fight. You must fight!
Quote.2866: Kurosaki Ichigo, you have no chance of defeating me. Even if you somehow manage to defeat me, there will be three more powerful than myself for you to fight. It doesn't matter if you stand up again a thousand times. The road to victory does not exist.
Quote.2867: The same melody repeats itself as the song grows richer and more beautiful. Wouldn't it be wonderful if we could live seemingly constant lives while experiencing changes bit by bit?
Quote.2868: Self-sacrifice... A nameless shinobi who protects peace within its shadow. That is a true shinobi.
Quote.2869: What do you think people are made of? I'm not talking about blood or flesh. We do care about what's on the exterior, but we want to focus more on what people even now still call the "inside." You can also call it "nature". I guess you are either born this way or raised to act this way. Are people born like this or do they become like this? The answer is...
Quote.2870: Every individual human affects the surrounding environment. But humans do not exist for the things and people around them. Often, they mistakenly think that they wish to exist for the sake of others, or to help everyone. They can not accept that they don't know why they exist, yes? They always want an answer. That is the nature of the animals called "humans".
Quote.2871: Humans will wither away if they're always alone. The only remedy would be to seek out other people.

Quote.2873: A little bit of trouble keeps life from being boring.
Quote.2874: Making a fuss won't fix anything.
Quote.2875: Because we can’t understand each other, it makes us want to make things clear even more.
Quote.2876: I want Dr. Verde's intellect. In all honesty I wish he were just a brain and nothing more.
Quote.2877: I think that loving someone is utterly useless. The more you want to be loved the more it will make you miserable
Quote.2878: Hey, Tsubaki, come out of there already. You haven't lost to him, have you? You can put on a better show than that, come back out on stage. Encore, encore. Tsubaki encore, give us an encore!
Quote.2879:
Kabuto: Isn't acknowledging what you can't do the same as giving up?

Itachi: No, it means to forgive yourself for what you aren't able to do. Your comrades are there to make up for what you cannot do and to prevent you from ignoring things that you actually might have been able to do.
Quote.2880: Killing you now will be as easy as strangling a baby.
Quote.2881: Now you're suddenly in a big rush to go? What's the point in hurrying, we're already three hours late.
Quote.2882: They say that the best blaze burns brightest, when circumstances are at their worst.
Quote.2883: That's interesting. Don't do it again.

Quote.2886: Trying without the winning intent is meaningless.

Quote.2891: I dislike things. When a person dies, their things are left behind. I`d like to take care of mine ahead of time.
Quote.2892: I can't develop feelings. That's how most idiots screw up.

Quote.2895: The "tsun" personality is an armor that protects purity. An iron virgin.
Quote.2896: Let me teach you a thing. Normally the weak person's weakness is the strong person, but the strong person's weakness is also the weak person.

Quote.2899: In the darkness, hope is something you give yourself.
Quote.2900: I'm not interested in fighting. What I'm interested in is living.
Quote.2901: The doors here only open one way. They open inward.
Quote.2902: While we are talking of peace, people are dying.
Quote.2903: It's natural for a person to deny he's a failure as a human being. That's why he searches for somebody who is more miserable than himself. That's why so much animosity exists on the internet. Those who aren't able to find a more miserable person, turn to the internet and call other people losers, even though they've never met. Just to make themselves feel superior. Isn't that pathetic? There's a sense of security that comes from speaking badly of someone else. But that isn't true salvation.
Quote.2904: Repeat. I'll repeat it for however many times I have to. Until I find the only way out.

And people won't help those who run away and do nothing. As long as you don't give up, there will always be salvation.
Quote.2906: Don't think, Natsu! It's not like you!
Quote.2907: If you endure too much, it'll be your loss.
Quote.2908: Anyone who hurts my sister… Hashira or not, I won’t let you get away with it.
Quote.2909: Even in the darkness, I’m sure it’s reassuring to have someone there to walk with you.
Quote.2910: Sometimes I do feel like I’m a failure. Like there’s no hope for me. But even so, I’m not gonna give up. Ever!
Quote.2911: You can look high or low but you wont find a bigger guy than me!
Quote.2913: And so it all begins. This boy's name is Yusuke. He's 14 years old and is supposed to be the hero of the story... but oddly enough, he's dead.
Quote.2914: Who’ll give up when it comes to such a mere setback? We haven’t lost yet! We’ll kneel on the floor and regret only after all possibilities are exhausted!
Quote.2915: Everyone Makes Mistakes. But people's feelings can manifest through the most subtle of expressions.
Quote.2916: You are calm and composed. You are able to see through things clearly at this age. You are outstanding. And... Always being able to make the correct judgments, not falling into darkness. Outstanding. "That won't do", "This is wrong". You reject any number of paths... Choosing your path with cynicism. What do you want to do? How are you going to do it? What is your motive? Where do you want to move forward to? Say it. Hmm? Fine. Then stick to the ground forever to move forward, you creep. You little coward who can only move forward by using the method of elimination. Until you found something to reject... You shall just lie on the ground helplessly.
Quote.2917: Isn't chasing our dream our job right now?
Quote.2918: Aw, man. You're such a friggin' disgrace. I can't believe I spent so much time trying to defeat such a coward. Now get up and fight!
Quote.2919: [to Szayel Aporro Grantz] Immaculate being... Was it? In this secular existence, perfection is an illusion, regardless of those who utter the contrary. This is the reality. Common man seeks it out, they strive to achieve it, as if it were some tangible thing... But... The fact of the matter is, perfection is a hollow shell. It is devoid of any substance. I spit on perfection. Perfection, after all, implies you've reached the summit. No trial and error, no ability to conceptualize. An omniscient being would have no need for such superfluous things... Am I making myself clear? For people who dabble in the sciences, such as ourselves, perfection would make us obsolete. Many magnificent things have been, and will continue to come into existence... And yet every last one of them will fall short of perfection's finish. Our function as men of science relies on their many shortcomings. Then, and only then, can we apply the fruits of our labor. To put it simply... As soon as you began spouting that nonsense about being an immaculate being... your fate was sealed. How dare you call yourself a man of science?
Quote.2920: I am not so noble that I would stake my life for someone else. Nor am I so forgiving that I would sit by and allow someone to trample me. I am selfish... and self righteous human being! That's why! I... to clear my own shame... I used your power. Not for anyone else! But for myself!
Quote.2921: You think something like that would hurt, after all I've been through?
Quote.2922: Hey, Oz. what are you lazing around for?
Quote.2923: Where's the fun in it if everything is going just as planned?
Quote.2925: Maybe the future is bad. But there's a future beyond that, right?
Quote.2926: I have a confession. I love special things.
Quote.2927: Does he really believe we would turn around after all that we've been through?
Quote.2928: The more you want something, the harder it is to wait for it.
Quote.2929: Tests are a good thing. The knowledge gained from a night of cramming will be all but forgotten once you hit adulthood. And that's fine. Quote.2930: You've set fire to my frozen heart, I shall engrave this anger and sadness that's running through my blood onto you.
Quote.2931: The fact that you consider yourself as an equal to me, is being arrogant in itself.
Quote.2932: Bury the pain of losing your loved ones... into the arms of your friends.
Quote.2933: Living should mean no do-overs. This is for the best.
Quote.2934: Resignation is what kills people. Once they've rejected resignation, humans gain the privilege of making humanity their footpath.
Quote.2935: We're pulling a big job here! Get lost, kid!
Quote.2936: Once you get everything back, you'll be down to having nothing but loads of fun left.
Quote.2937: Tomorrow's promise will never come. I wonder how many of tomorrow's promises have disappeared as though they have never existed.
Quote.2938: You will not touch these innocent people with even one inch of your dirty blades, if you require an opponent, I will fight you. If you wanna taste the ground, feel free to attack me.

Regardless of how well-thought it is, armchair strategizing only works in the realm of theory. Unexpected troubles, or uncontrollable factors such as weather. Operations face those sorts of troubles. They are the cause of strife on the battlefield.
Quote.2940: My legend dates back to the 12th Century you see. My legend is quite old. The 12th Century was a long time ago.

I suppose that’s why humans are so interesting.
Quote.2945: Humanity will never stop fighting itself.. until it shrinks to a size of one or fewer.

Quote.2947: To hate something that you used to love is such a painful feeling.
Quote.2948: One day, we will vanish. New senshi and new stars will be born. But you, Sailor Moon, you will forever be immortal. You will be the most beautiful star shining in the sky for eternity.
Quote.2949: Having someone to lean on is an amazing thing. Some things that can't be done alone can be achieved with the courage of two. The smallest words of support can save you.
Quote.2950: Next time I really am going to kill you Medusa ribbit!
Quote.2951: Often people have it wrong, mistakenly believing...that showing mercy to an enemy is kindness. They spare the foe whose life is in their hands... But don't you see? It's an empty existence... to go on living... alone and unloved... when defeat's already cost you your dream!
Quote.2952: Someday you'll let go of my hand. When you finally look to the far, far sky, I'll kick you from behind and laugh at you to hurry.

Quote.2954: If you don’t interact with the people around you, it’d be hard for anyone to approach you.

You were the king of sexual harassment. You never paid the rent. You paid your people late. Still, you were brighter than the fake glint of gold plating. When you were angry, your entire soul was enraged. When you laughed, you laughed with all your heart. Your silver was much more beautiful.
Quote.2956: Human emotions are just black or white sometimes there and consistent and can even be contradictory, but that's all right.
Quote.2957: My mind is being eaten away... Kaji-san, it's unravelling my mind! What do I do? It's defiling my mind!

Quote.2959: Everyone makes mistakes the first time around.

Quote.2965: I don't like lectures from someone who plays fixed matches.
Quote.2966: I’m gonna beat you all. Enjoy your win. It’ll never happen again, Dammit!

Quote.2970: There is a difference in the look of the ordinary vagabond and that of a determined man.

I think photography is like borrowing someone else's eyes. So even if your eyes are closed... you can borrow someone else's.
Quote.2972: I'm sure it's not wrong for people to want to understand each other. And even if it is, I want us to understand each other.
Quote.2973: Forget about revenge, and live on.

Quote.2976: Oh, please. This world is so entertaining because it doesn't do anyone's bidding!
Quote.2977: Accept that your life will be painful, bite back your grief and find the power to stand again.
Quote.2978: What's the point of worrying about the past? A real star keeps moving forward.

Quote.2985: In this world, guns are always within arm's reach, and sadly they are more trustworthy than kindness.
Quote.2986: Going against the flow… takes a lot of courage. I respect that. Maybe people who can do it are just stupid, but… Well… What I’m sure of is that people like that are rare.
Quote.2988: If you know pain and hardship, it's easier to be kind to others.
Quote.2989: Maybe I failed this time, but I’m not giving up. I’ll show them I’ve got what it takes to make it to the hero course, and I’ll become a greater hero than all of you.
Quote.2990: If you trust in the possibilities within and try with all your might, the path will show itself to you!
Quote.2991: Religion, ideology, resources, land, spite, love or just because. No matter how pathetic the reason, it's enough to start a war.
Quote.2992: You know about it, don't you, Witch Medusa? About the Kishin beneath the DWMA.
Quote.2993: People say that if you fight, it means you're close to someone; but in the end, a fight is just a collision of egos. People don't learn to understand each other just by laying bare their feelings.
Quote.2994: One's true worth shows as hardship increases.
Quote.2995: This world revolves around two views on the same thing. In addition, it's about laughable miseries.
Quote.2996: Courage is a word of justice. It means the quality of mind that enables one to face apprehension with confidence and resolution. It is not right to use it as an excuse to kill someone.
Quote.2997: If you follow the rules, there's no way you can outdo them.
Quote.2998: But that's why I can't let myself be weighed down by fuckin' regrets. A bitch lives as free as a bird that can never be caught.
Quote.2999: I am a god with a heart, but there’s one thing I cannot tolerate… people who don’t pay their proper respect to others.
Quote.3000: Even in moments of the deepest despair... I guess we can still find hope, huh?
Quote.3001: All humans die the same, the place they go after death isn't decided upon by a god it is Mu (nothingness).
Quote.3002: If you forget your fear you become reckless.

Quote.3004: Shut it! Do you know the pain of having a permanent perm?!
Quote.3005: Even if mistaken, even if cruel, even if stupid, if many people acknowledge it, I found out that it can become the right thing. Quote.3008: If you don't risk your life, you can't create a future. Right?
Quote.3009: Until just recently, the stars were something I only saw by myself.

Quote.3014: I've only lived 18 years, but I don't want to change any of them. They're all part of my life, even the failures.

Quote.3018: I'm going to become the best manga editor anyone's ever seen! And then you can kiss your job goodbye!
Quote.3019: When a person’s backed into a corner or when they’re truly free… that’s when they show their true nature. That’s why I think Bubaigawara was a decent guy… who was just desperate to be help and I feel… the same way.
Quote.3021: Unwavering Faith and Resilient Bonds will bring even miracles to your side.
Quote.3022: No matter what troubles you shoulder, remember that in time, things will change. You shouldn't blame yourself when things don't go your way.
Quote.3023: Be as swift as the wind. Be as quiet as the forest. Attack as fiercely as the fire. Be immovable like a mountain. Move like the lightning. Be as impenetrable as a shadow.
Quote.3024: Why don't you stop forcing yourself on him and calling it love? It's painful to watch (to Kagura about Kyo)
Quote.3025: I'm a coward. But I wanted to stay by your side. The truth is I was so happy to hear that you needed me, I took advantage of your words. But you're crying again, because of me. I'm no blessed vessel. I'm just a piece of junk. I was supposed to guide you, but this was the only way I knew how.
Quote.3026: I don't care what normal people do anymore. I'm going to live my life the way that I want to.
Quote.3027: Death is not the end of life, it's the completion of life.
Quote.3028: I thought that when I grew up, I could reach more and more. The delicious looking fruit beckoning from the highest branch.The beautiful shell hidden in the sand. If I could only stretch out my hand a little more…. But…. As everyone passes through the junctures of their life, they no longer stretch their hand to the sky, or crouch to the earth. Embarrassed, they ignore what they’d desired for so long. Will you reach out and grab me, grown up as I am?
Quote.3029: (thinking) I can't stand up...on my own. I can't go...any further. Not...all by myself.
Quote.3030: You are a fool who creates slaves to do your dirty work. A coward and an incompetent, incapable of doing anything on your own. You are not worthy of the lowest pits of Hell!
Quote.3031: If I can protect, I want to protect.
Quote.3032: Even if the clothes are too large in the beginning, they’ll fill out as you grow. The same goes for courage… The secret of not getting killed by the enemy is to underestimate life’s difficulties.
Quote.3033: I've been under too much stress lately. Killing you should be a good remedy.
Quote.3034: It's called a miracle because it doesn't happen.
Quote.3035: If I may suggest, I recommend my waking you up every morning wearing nothing but an apron. Then I can cook you breakfast. Isn't it a man's fantasy to watch that from behind?
Quote.3036: You can train a dog with food. You can buy a person with money. But there isn't a man alive able to influence the wolves of Mibu! Some things will never change. A wolf will always be a wolf.
Quote.3038: I felt like I was watching a dream I'd never wake up from. Before I knew it, the dream was all over.
Quote.3039: If you look away and just turn your back on those you don't understand, you'll regret it someday. Accept what's happening before your eyes as a fact. That's a shortcut to becoming an adult.
Quote.3040: Ichigo...I know this is shameful, but I'm begging you -- Rukia...Please save Rukia!!
Quote.3042: Isn’t it fine as long as you find it? Isn’t it fine as long as you find the next fun and happy moments again?
Quote.3043: People... need to be needed by someone in order to live. If a person isn't needed, they're worthless!
Quote.3044: Nobody can take anybody's place. There isn't a person in this world that could take your place. It doesn't matter if you were based on me or have the same face.
Quote.3045: Do you know what a scientist fears most in this world above all else? It's oblivion, my friend. I have done the worst thing one scientist can do to another: I have altered your thought process. When my drug takes effect, you will find your mind has lost the ability to think.
Quote.3046: Little Hellsing chicky, I'm coming to find you. Come out and play, little Hellsing. It's going to be a lot of fun. We just want to torture you, kill you, maybe skullfuck your corpse a couple of times, burn your house to the ground, go home, and masturbate, okay?
Quote.3047: You clearly have nerves of steel. But, I'd say you still have much to learn about the world.
Quote.3048: If you feel the ends justify the means, how does that make you different from us demons, exactly?
Quote.3049: An angel? So Whis is an angel? But he’s got no wings, and his butt’s not hanging out.
Quote.3050: It’s us who gives meaning to our comrades lives.
Quote.3051: We're hunting after a legendary sword. Finding a fairy or two shouldn't be surprising.
Quote.3052: This has got to be a joke! I'm being sucked into a black hole inside a toilet! Either that or there's one gigantic vacuum cleaner down here.
Quote.3053: Do they love you, or the mask you put every day?
Quote.3054: Your so-called "self-sacrifice" only satisfies yourself. Do you think you can save people with it? You're only protecting yourself! You don't know the suffering endured by those left alive. With your childish actions, you're only pushing the pain onto other people!
Quote.3055: If you cling to life, you live in fear of death. And that fear will cloud your judgment.
Quote.3056: All people are nothing but tools. It doesn't matter how it's done. It doesn't matter what needs to be sacrificed. In this world, winning is everything. As long as I win in the end...That's all that matters.
Quote.3057: If there's an ugly truth, a beautiful truth must exist too. Stories aren't purely ugly. They're not purely tragic or sad either. There are tender things and beautiful things in there.
Quote.3058: This is your life right? Then decide for yourself! If you want to protect everything with your hands then do so, if you want to abandon everything then do so. Quote.3059: Even if you have two of the exact same person, they could change enormously depending on their upbringing.
Quote.3060: Hey hun! I’ve got a great idea, let’s trade! Yo take my spot and I’ll fight Hercule!
Quote.3061: Just help them, Just do it, That way when you die, you won’t die alone.
Quote.3062: Levels are just numbers. In this world, strength is just an illusion. There are more important things.
Quote.3063: I'm Faust VIII, your opponent. Please be gentle.
Quote.3064: I want to find a path that no one else had taken into consideration.
Quote.3065: You can worry about things all you want, but it doesn't mean you'll always get an answer. What's important to remember, is that when it's all said and done and you got through it all somehow, are you the person you wanted to be?
Quote.3067: The universe has a beginning, but no end. — Infinity. Stars, too, have their own beginnings, but their own power results in their destruction. — Finite.
Quote.3068: Humans are so voracious, though. They eat everything from plants to animals... almost as if they think they are the top living creature to roam the earth. No being is more full of themselves as the humans.
Quote.3069: Is there truly any human who is not arrogant?
Quote.3070: If you feel like crying you should not hold back your tears. You should let it all out while you still can - because when you get bigger sometimes you can't cry even if you have something to cry about.
Quote.3071: I am Light's girlfriend from university.
Quote.3072: You want to keep everyone from dying? That's naive. It's war. People die.
Quote.3073: If you trip while running down a hallway, you'll get a nosebleed. If you trip in life, you'll cry.
Quote.3074: A soul naturally seeks pleasure, consciously or not.
Quote.3075: If Tayuya comes back, I'll kill her.
Quote.3076: I realized that back then, the reason I wanted to become human, was that I really just wanted to have friends. Now, I just want to be a monster that can help Luffy.

That may be true, but Matsu, even if it's only for a moment, I want you to bloom by my side and when you fade away... do so at my side. In return, I will... make beautiful flowers bloom by your side again and again.
Quote.3078: I wonder why illegal contractees try to kill people?
Quote.3079: Everyone here is the same. They don't notice anything. They don't say anything. And they don't think anything. They are merely a shell of their former selves and soon they will disappear like the melting snow. This epidemic leads innocent people to their deaths, and yet, its pathogen will never be eradicated. This is a disease called serenity - a form of death that people have wished for.
Quote.3080: The meaning to our existence... is to live. To remember those who have died and face the world. God doesn't exist. I will. Through my own will.
Quote.3081: *to Zuko* You know, father blames uncle for the loss of north pole... and he considers YOU a miserable failure for not finding the avatar.
Quote.3082: [To Ritsu Sohma] I'm sure that inside your heart...you're trying with all your might to find it on your own...the reason you were born. Because...because really...there might not be anyone who was born with a reason. I think that everyone might have to find one on their own. [in her head] A reason for being born... A reason that it's okay to be alive... A reason to exist. [aloud] I think everyone might have to find it themselves...and decide for themselves. It could be your dreams...your job...or a person. ...The reason you're looking for...might be vague, unclear...and uncertain. [in her head] And you might lose it. [aloud] But as long as you're alive...you have to keep searching for that reason.
Quote.3083: Forgetting is like a wound. The wound may heal but it has already left a scar.
Quote.3084: You are fighting out of obligation, not out of hatred. You will never reach me like that. Battle without hatred is like a bird without wings. You’ll never defeat anyone like that. You powerless friends are just weights that will break your legs.
Quote.3085: Where is your honor!? Like all pure-blooded Saiyans, Kakarot would rather die fighting than win with one of those disgraceful senzu beans as his crutch! Kakarot trained in the hyperbolic time chamber just as we did! Now let’s see what he can do!
Quote.3086: You're useless, Lucy. You can't understand a woman's heart.
Quote.3088: *to Kikyo* I swear... I will never let Naraku harm you.
Quote.3089: {TO NARUTO} Oh, by the way... I'm a boy
Quote.3090: The bond between Nezuko and me, can’t be severed by anyone!
Quote.3091: If I can, I'd like to bring back what she has lost, what she threw away.
Quote.3092: You don't abuse and use people for your own convenience.
Quote.3093: My grandmother used to tell me stories about the old days, a time of peace when the Avatar kept balance between the Water Tribes, Earth Kingdom, Fire Nation, and Air Nomads. But that all changed when the Fire Nation attacked. Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, only he could stop the ruthless firebenders. But when the world needed him most, he vanished. A hundred years have passed and the Fire Nation is nearing victory in the war. Two years ago, my father and the men of my tribe journeyed to the Earth Kingdom to help fight against the Fire Nation, leaving me and my brother to look after our tribe. Some people believe that the Avatar was never reborn into the Air Nomads and that the cycle is broken, but I haven't lost hope. I still believe that somehow...the Avatar will return to save the world.
Quote.3094: Please don’t apologize. If you did, and I forgave you, then it’d be like it was all a lie. I want to hold those memories we had dear. The fun times… The painful times… All of it. So please, don’t apologize.
Quote.3095: My life after losing her... Is it over as well? The days I spent satisfied with the happiness I never noticed... Those times had passed away. For me... There's nothing left at all.
Quote.3096: What's your wish? Peace? Money? Or the world? Whatever you wish for, it's something you have to get with your own strength!
Quote.3097: All right! Team Avatar is back! Air, water, earth, fire- (grabs a bunch of leaves) fan, and sword! (his leaf limps)
Quote.3098: Being awesome is being nothing but yourself~
Quote.3099: People like you walk your paths, believing that something you desire is waiting for you. I walk it to confirm that there is nothing there.
Quote.3101: An illusion is darkness. Those who cannot see the darkness cannot resist its sweet temptation and are stained black. Eventually the darkness envelops the light controlling everything.
Quote.3103: I am a complete opposite of Ryuk.
Quote.3104: You're your own worst enemy. If your worries and doubts torment you, then just stop thinking about them.
Quote.3105: People can have lovers. They can have friends. They can be together. But when you think about it, you'll see that originally, we're alone.
Quote.3106: Only someone that's prepared to devote oneself to others' happiness, without caring about his own, is allowed to become a king.
Quote.3107: Such shallow emotions evoked by simple and cheerful stories won't solve anything! What people need is a more tangible sense of values with which to resolve the conflicts of everyday life! Even if that causes others to think of you as warped, as long as you can remain true to yourself until the moment you die; that is what I believe true dignity is!
Quote.3108: When a man bleeds freely for the sake of other people, it's only proper to pretend that you never saw it.
Quote.3109: Even if it's small, take a step forward.
Quote.3110: Even if we're not confident that we'll win, even if others tell us we don't stand a chance, we must never tell ourselves that.
Quote.3111: Any man who has the brains to think and the nerve to act for the benefit of the people of the country, is considered a radical, by those who are content with stagnation and willing to endure disaster.
Quote.3113: About Whitebeard "Even in death, his body did not fall. His figure, taking down enemies while losing half of his head, was truly monstrous. The total number of sword wounds he received in this battle was 267. He was shot by 152 bullets. And was hit by 46 cannonballs. And despite all this, his proud back, over the course of his entire life as a pirate, never received a single scar from running away!"
Quote.3114: It's quite easy for humans to become adults, but to always have a child-like heart that makes everything joyful isn't such an easy task.
Quote.3115: As long as humans are not virtuous beings, desire will always win over the fear of punishment. What’s necessary is not punishment, but to deal with that desire.
Quote.3116: Don't you ever worry about it? Wonder if there's something wrong with you? When you're always alone... you start comparing yourself with others. You want to make sure you're normal. But... when you're around lots of people, you don't compare yourself with them. You want to be yourself. It's okay to be weird... You want to be special. That's how it balances out.
Quote.3117: Afterall, the fate of the world rests on my pitching. The world sure isn't worth much these days.
Quote.3118: It's only obvious that the world is a cruel place. If you can't change the world, then you have to change yourself!
Quote.3119: There's no such thing as a perfect person in this world.
Quote.3120: [Vegeta's last thought before he dies fighting Majin Buu] Bulma, Trunks. This is for you.
Quote.3121: You have the strongest armour, because you are the weakest!
Quote.3122: Gin-san, aren't you gonna make fun of me? Are you just gonna ignore me?!
Quote.3123: I think there are some things that you have to do, even if they're a crime. Someone has to do them, even if it means taking the blame.
Quote.3124: When captured birds grow wiser, they try to open the cage with their beaks. They don't give up, because they want to fly again.
Quote.3125: Well, if I had to give a reason for my actions, I guess it's because I love people. I guess I wanted to see the faces that mankind has to offer.
Quote.3126: When you're going to kill a god, let someone else do your dirty work.
Quote.3127: *To Temari* It really doesn't matter to me if I ever become a chūnin or not, but I guess I shouldn't let myself be beaten by a female, so let's do it.
Quote.3128: But the big difference is who I work for. I'd rather die than be a yes-man to someone I don't even like.
Quote.3129: If you don't like your destiny, don't accept it. Instead, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be!
Quote.3130: This device paints the illusion of fairy tales for those with naive wishes in their hearts, who say they wish something eternal existed, who say they wish the power of miracles existed. But, there's no place higher than this room. This room is the summit of Ohtori Academy, and of the world.
Quote.3131: Kings do not become kings by themselves. If the poor raise up together, declaring that they don't want any money, kings will be overthrown. However, poor seek money so that they can become kings themselves. Which in turn only strengthens the position of the current king.
Quote.3132: It's not like I'm desperate to have friends, anyway. I just don't like being looked down on as that sad person with no friends.
Quote.3133: Don't beg for it, earn it. Do it, and you'll be rewarded.
Quote.3134: Nothing beats a cup of herbal tea in the morning.
Quote.3135: It may seem like we're all playing the same game, but in our minds, it is totally different.
Quote.3136: We have no choice but to accept the one and only life we're given, no matter how cruel and heartless it might be.
Quote.3137: I've always gone to any lengths to avoid facing danger and risk, hiding myself within  a safe cage, where no one could hurt me. I hated myself for it.. But I couldn't change myself.. Friends and teachers encouraged me, but I never truly listened, considering it the logic of the strong. Yet somehow... A boy with less than half my strength managed to break my cage!
Quote.3138: I know love. The convenience store was selling it. For 298 yen.
Quote.3139: Someday, my memories of her will fade. Her voice, her actions – I might forget them as well. But even then, I will always remember that I loved her.
Quote.3140: It's my own business what I decide to do and where I decide to do it.
Quote.3141: One face is given to us by God. The other - we make ourselves.
Quote.3142: I'm not going to let myself get beaten by a jar!
Quote.3143: If you stay hidden like this, you'll be able to get away from the police, however, you will never escape your crime... Madam, are you trying... Are you trying to force your son to carry this burden for the rest of his life?
Quote.3144: Sometimes living can be hard! But it's only because we're alive that we can make each other laugh, cry, and be happy!
Quote.3145: *referring to Sokka* He's just upset because a bunch of girls kicked his butt yesterday.
Quote.3146: [to Ichigo] Try to stay alive, okay? That way, you and Kenny can play again some day!
Quote.3147: If you smile once when you’re feeling down, you begin to feel better and become more cheerful.
Quote.3148: Quiet down or I'll shoot you bastards!
Quote.3149: Life isn't that sweet. That's why everyone wants sweet things.
Quote.3150: I just wanna love, live and die my way. My normal way. I wanna be even more like the people I love.
Quote.3151: If someone didn't have any pride, wouldn't they also be lacking in self-confidence? If someone was free of greed, wouldn't they have trouble supporting their family? And if people didn't envy one another, wouldn't they stop inventing new things?
Quote.3152: There's nothing more repulsive than being touched by a guy you don't like.
Quote.3153: A symphony can not be created using common sense and probabilities. It is already written in the fate of the composer. No... that's not it. A symphony is the inevitable result of a bad childhood, deafness, and too many beans eaten after a certain time of day.
Quote.3154: If you want to stand with your own will, you don't have any other choice than to let the illusions you have lost remain in the ideals you were following in the past.
Quote.3155: There's no such thing as a limit on being the best. You can always go for more. That's what it means to be human. No... That's what it means to be me.
Quote.3156: Don't act because something is interesting, but act because you want to find something more interesting! In this world, there are so much interesting things. Do something that you don't want to do, you don't have even a second for it.
Quote.3157: Once in a while when I wake up, I find myself crying. The dream I must’ve had, I can never seem to recall...But the sensation that I’ve lost something lingers for a long time after I wake up.
Quote.3158: A wandering soul in isolation, has no need for a place to belong.
Quote.3159: [to an unconscious Aang] I finally have you. But I can't get you home because of this blizzard. There's always something. Not that you would understand. You're like my sister. Everything always came easy to her. She's a firebending prodigy and everyone adores her. My father says she was born lucky. He says I was lucky to be born. I don't need luck, though. I don't want it. I've always had to struggle and fight, and that's made me strong. It's made me who I am.
Quote.3160: The only one who can decide your worth.. is you. If you want to earn something, you need to reach out for it. Pro-athletes give up their teenage years to train. Business owners put up collateral to borrow money. That's how it always works. To make your ambitions come true, you have to take risks. The larger the ambition the greater the risk. That might involve time or enough work to affect your lifespan... So make your choice. Live in peace as a wannabe or risk losing it all to reach the very top. You're the one who needs to decide.
Quote.3161: If you believe in it, it is real. If you do not - it is fiction.
Quote.3162: Little man! Don't talk small , and say your goal is to become like me. You should become a master of your own game.
Quote.3163: It's Valentine's day, silly! It's the day when lovers are together!
Quote.3164: I could give you baseless hope through empty encouragement, but you'd just make the same mistake again. You won't live long if you don't own up to your failures.
Quote.3165: I was born alone in this world and alone I will die. If this is my fate, why are tears coming out of my eyes?
Quote.3166: Every human being thinks different things are right, and different things are wrong. Whether something is normal or not, it is still different for every person. Happiness is the same – everyone has their own definition of it.
Quote.3167: [Last words] Well done. You win. As promised, I entrust you with everything. After all I can't do any more at this point anyways. Man, this really annoys me. I really hate people, who put their life on the line like you. Now quickly, finish me off. If you don't hurry, I'll regenerate again. Since you will be fighting in my stead, I won't stand for it if you lose, understand?
Quote.3168: Love is a delusion. If both have the same delusion, that love becomes real. However... if the feelings of each one is different, that is nothing more than a joke...
Quote.3169: Even if I lose my "voice". Even if everyone else doesn't turn up to hear me sing — as long as you're there, then, that's enough. If it comes to that… I will sing, just for you.
Quote.3170: Victory isn't determined solely by who has the superior physical abilities.
Quote.3171: Everyone's reality is freight with some degree of pain. What's wrong with seeing what makes you happy in your dreams?
Quote.3172: Do you want to kill me? It's only natural that you do. But I cannot die right now. Because there is something I must do.
Quote.3173: You know what they say! When in Rome eat lots of pasta!
Quote.3174: Gin-chan told me to pay people back double for revenge!
Quote.3175: I would think that he's already seen through your heart, and is simply playing the fool to use you. He yanks on the strings of your cheap pride and you dance like a little marionette.
Quote.3176: Pray not for the future. Rely not on the future or the past. Just stay in the Now.
Quote.3177: Shadow and light are two sides of the same coin... One cannot exist without another.
Quote.3178: I just like those who try their best, even when they're afraid.
Quote.3179: You came into my life as a story, you left as a legend.
Quote.3180: To defeat evil, I shall become an even GREATER evil.
Quote.3181: It is only through the eyes of others that our lives have any meaning.
Quote.3182: It would be enough for the depressing things in life to only exist in reality. It is because that I think the birth of a story is from people dreaming of a happy ending.
Quote.3183: As a rule, they say humans haunted by a shinigami have nothing but misfortune.
Quote.3184: Girls' hearts are reflected by their underwear's color...!!
Quote.3186: Watching messy troubles from the sidelines is a hobby of mine.
Quote.3187: O anger, turn to heat, dry up my brains! This mad thirst for vengeance must be quenched… no matter how cruel and merciless I must become!
Quote.3188: [referring to Tohru] If anyone can find a way to choke on rice, it's her.
Quote.3189: Let us talk about the brain. The brain is said to be the place where our consciousness resides. As we speak, each of us possesses our own distinct consciousness. We are all experiencing reality through our own point of view. To each of us, reality unfolds as a unique story as a result of our consciousness. However, looking to the outside from this box called the self, reality is subjective.
Quote.3190: People should be doubted. Many people misunderstand this concept. Doubting people is just a part of getting to know them. What many people call "trust" is really just giving up on trying to understand others, and that very act is far worse than doubting. It is actually "apathy".
Quote.3191: What's the point of something that disappears as soon as it's born?
Quote.3193: Light is radiant because there is darkness. And darkness is sublime because there is light.
Quote.3194: The longer you keep a secret, the harder it becomes to say it.
Quote.3195: Love is the best way to fill a gap in the heart.
Quote.3196: You’ll stumble many times in the future, but when you do, each time you’ll have more strength to bounce back.
Quote.3197: Suna, maybe people all have a hot, molten core inside their hearts, but they just live their lives, never showing it to the world, as if nothing is really going on.
Quote.3198: I’m fine with being a monster. I’m fine with having fake emotions. But I’ll protect Shu. Because I am me! Even if I’m just a fake… To me, I’m the only… real one!
Quote.3199: We found ourselves in conflict with each other many times. There were hard times when we wanted to run away or give up. But it was only because that rain fell, that the seeds of our emotions could sprout. And the flowers of deeper friendship could bloom.
Quote.3200: Love is not necessary, power is the only true necessity.
Quote.3201: There was no reason for me to get attacked by you. And therefore, there was no reason to dodge.
Quote.3202: I wonder if there really is a God... If such an entity really existed, wouldn't all honest, hard-working people be happy?
Quote.3203: If you only face forward, there is something you will miss seeing.
Quote.3204: Whether a fish lives in a clear stream or a water ditch, so long as it continues swimming forward, it will grow up beautifully.
