Quote.3205: Police girl… Enjoy this. Enjoy the massacre. This alone will make you strong.
Quote.3206: When you give up, your dreams and everything else, they're gone.
Quote.3207: It's because I've experienced pain in the past, that I can even consider what would be best for the future!
Quote.3208: Without a body, I can't even cry. Why am I here? I can't go anywhere. I'm neither here nor there. Who am I here for? What am I here for?
Quote.3209: There is nothing less amusing than destroying those who have no will to live.
Quote.3210: *commenting on Haruhi's naming of the SOS brigade* Haruhi's incomprehensible words settled the matter. Oh, joy. Just do whatever you want.
Quote.3211: Even if armed with hundreds of weapons... there are times when you just can't beat a man with a spear of conviction in his gut.
Quote.3212: I won't be defeated because I know how awful it feels to lose after doing my very best!
Quote.3213: Let me tell you something... Real sin is something you can never atone for.
Quote.3214: By looking at what's blocking our way, with an open mind, a wall can be turned into a wide-open door.
Quote.3215: It is not society that determines people's futures.  It is people who determine society's future.
Quote.3216: Cutting down a man who's done nothing wrong. Is that what you spent all that time honing those skills for? In my opinion, you're worthless.
Quote.3217: Regret... It's a heavy burden. You can't help wondering if maybe you chose the wrong path. Because once you've chosen, you can't change your mind.
Quote.3218: He who forgives and acknowledges himself... that is what it truly means to be strong!
Quote.3219: People who perish in other’s battles are worms… If one can’t live their life the way they want, they might as well die.
Quote.3220: A farewell is like the other side of a coin. It will only happen when there is an encounter. Rather than dreading the day we have to part, shouldn't we be happy that we had the chance to meet today instead?
Quote.3221:
On a Monday, God created the world. 
On Tuesday, God drew the line between Order and Chaos. 
On Wednesday, God arranged each and every number. 
On Thursday, God permitted the ebb and flow of Time. 
On Friday, God explored every nook and cranny of the world. 

On Saturday, God rested. 
And on Sunday, God... 
forsook the world.
Quote.3222: A lie is truth, until you recognize it as a lie. To see the truth behind those lies is probably the right thing to do. However, it may not necessarily bring happiness. Lies are Happiness.
Quote.3223: If I sit like a normal person my investigative abilities are only working at 50% efficiency.
Quote.3224: You see, for as long as we draw breath into our lungs, we shall keep hope alive inside our hearts.
Quote.3225: If you can't move with your hands then play with your feet! If you don't have enough fingers, then use your nose as well! Whether you're sad, you're a mess, or you've hit rock bottom, you still have to play! That's how people like us survive.
Quote.3226: There are people in this world who don't understand that what they consider a harmless prank can deeply hurt someone else.
Quote.3227: Entire civilizations were built and destroyed between now and the last time you said "we'll go soon"! I'll have rotted and turned to ash by the time this "soon" of yours comes!!
Quote.3229: That’s something you can’t know until you've tried it, and you still won’t understand after you play. I've been playing for 45 years and I still don’t understand. I've never been able to figure it out. That’s why I keep playing.
Quote.3231: We should work towards world peace. Like giving everyone in the world an Upa cushion...
Quote.3232: No one's more aware of discrimination than the ones being discriminated against, huh?
Quote.3233: I won’t lose to my own decisions, no matter what. That’s the proof that I’m me.
Quote.3234: People aren't as complex as you think they are. They're simple, and they get sad or angry over simple things. That's how they are. They're quickly affected by the littlest things, and live without knowing where they're going to fall down. That's who people are!
Quote.3235: It was my fault. It was my carelessness that led to Mitsukuni's cavity. I forgot to tell him to brush his teeth before napping... twice.
Quote.3236: Come on let's dance... aw yeah don't be afraid.
Quote.3237: I think people should try to ignore their race, and just treat each other as equals.
Quote.3238: Will you stay by my side? Will you watch as we uncover a harsh truth that was meant to remain buried, and share in the pain that comes with the act?
Quote.3239: If you guys weren't here, I don't know what would have happened to me. You can't live in this world alone, no matter how you look at it.
Quote.3240: Love, passion, why do we get caught up by such troublesome feelings? The mind couldn't ever get things straight, and you lose control to know what is sensible. Deep down it's all so vexing.
Quote.3241: If I really liked him I should hope for his happiness. But like you said in the car, I actually hoped they would break up.
Quote.3242: A wound of a heart is different from a flesh wound. Unlike a flesh wound, there are no ointments to heal it, and there are times when they never heal.
Quote.3243: Hold on. Don't go! Let's argue again. I'll bribe you with a canelé. I'll call you to kill time. I don't mind being Friend A. Please don't go. Please don't go. Please don't go...please don't leave me behind.
Quote.3244: If you're going to hide a tree, put it in the forest.
Quote.3245: People live in order to be satisfied. And they hope to die while still satisfied. So, not knowing how to make yourself become satisfied is very tough.
Quote.3246: The souls that God has given us, our spirits. Our spirits, which found a way to swim through the immense network and live in the infinity of space. Is not the human body a mere shell? A form of existence all too small and weak for consciousness with such vast reach and potential.
Quote.3247: The Commander-General's rather violent today, wouldn't you say?
Quote.3248: Sorry, I saw an opening that just screamed 'ATTACK,' so I did, ha!
Quote.3249: Necessary murder. Man must kill to live. That hasn't changed, even with humanity's decline. The situation has reached the point in which escape and refusal are no longer options, so I must act.
Quote.3250: Our bodies get bigger, but our hearts get torn up.
Quote.3251: Well, dying for honor isn't such a bad thing. Because it's hard to survive and live in misery.
Quote.3252: If someone lives, they will surely die. That is the absolute rule of this world.
Quote.3253: The people who have the ability to change something in this world, all, without exception, have guts to abandon things important to them if they have to.
Quote.3255: I make my own decisions, and see them to the very end. I had to find my resolve, so I could remain true to myself.
Quote.3256: Only two kinds of people exist in this world, those who steal and those who are stolen from.
Quote.3257: Emiya Shirou! Listen, you are not "one who fights". You are nothing more than "one who creates". Don't think of irrelevant things. There is only one thing you can do, master that one thing. Do not forget. The thing you image is always "your strongest self." You don't need any other enemies. The opponent you have to fight is none other than "your own image".
Quote.3258: Are you telling me to go back and put a corpse on trial?
Quote.3259: I always hated the fact that I was never blessed with any magic. But in place of that, I was blessed with wonderful teammates.
Quote.3260: Forgive my rudeness, but to hide your true self and make a vain display... I think that's just running away from reality. To know what you are really like, and acknowledge it... A positive thinking of enjoying yourself... isn't that what true strength is?
Quote.3261: (To Sensui) Here's a one way ticket straight to Hell! YOU BASTAARD!
Quote.3262: You know, when I was in high school, I was a troublemaker. I hardly went to school. Before I knew it, I was expelled. When I couldn't go anymore, was when I first realized, that school was a great thing. There's a lot of friends and lots of fun things. When I got this old, I wanted even more to go to school. That's why I became a teacher. Because, if I become a teacher, I could stay in school until I die, right? That's why I'm really happy now. I want you to be like that too. I want you to like school. Once it's over, it's too late.
Quote.3263: Is he living his dreams in death? Or.. is death the end of dreams?
Quote.3264: Power rules the Heavens just as Power rules in the Lower world.
Quote.3265: A lot of the times, you're going into a situation you know nothing about. So what you need is to be quick to act... and make tough decisions in worst-case scenarios.
Quote.3266: Sometimes you have to fight for the things that are worth fighting for.
Quote.3267: [to Hisagi after stabbing him] I am afraid. Then and now, my fear has always been that I would die a shinigami like you.
Quote.3268: Don't you think forcing people to help with something pointless is far more cruel?
Quote.3269: Everyone has an ability. And it means that everyone should use that ability to the fullest.
Quote.3270: Reflecting upon death, one appreciates life. If that’s the case, does it take a mistake for people to choose the right path? Behold the brilliance of the heavens burdened with sin.
Quote.3271: Sasuke, I always knew you were alone. In the beginning I was glad because I thought you were like me - I wanted to talk to you! But you... didn't speak. You always had everyone watching you. You could do everything and we were too different. So I decided that you would become my rival. I didn't want to lose because I was called a loser all the time. Even when we became Team 7, I still thought this way. I always tried to lie but... but the truth is... I always wanted to be like you. I aspired to be like you. Because of that... I was glad that you wanted to fight me.
Quote.3272: A prison, you say? You think you'll be free if you go to the world above? A girl like you can never be free no matter where you go. After all, we humans are apes put in a cage called Earth. There is no difference between the world above and the world below. The only difference is which is bigger or smaller. People who pout about how confining the cage is can never be happy. They live their lives only seeing the iron bars. A true lack of freedom is when you cage your soul.
Quote.3273: Never once did I say it.  But just as he knew my feelings and couldn't return them. She will probably realize his and probably his heart wouldn't have a chance either? When I think about things like that, my tears won't stop.
Quote.3274: The difference in ability... What about it? Do you think I should give up just because you're stronger than me?
Quote.3275: After everything I've faced.... Having a future with you snatched away from me ...is definitely the most terrifying thing I've ever had to endure....
Quote.3276: A person can change, at the moment when the person wishes to change.
Quote.3277: Even if all the confidence and pride you've built over the years is blown to pieces by a major failure, even if you've had a soul-crushing experience, you still have to open the shop the next day. That's who chefs are.
Quote.3278: I don't have have much time. It's not that I'm busy, but I'm only willing to give you about two and a half more minutes of my life!
Quote.3279: I just really don't wanna meet a disappointing end, with someone burning my bones without even knowing who they belonged to.
Quote.3280: No matter how many people, you may lose, you have no choice but to go on living. No matter how devastating, the blows maybe.
Quote.3281: Seeing them as the same is wrong. It's a touchy subject, but the weight of something you bear with your own power and with someone else's are different.
Quote.3282: It feels like time is passing so quickly. Damn you, Einstein! Your science is crowding in on our kiss! He was right. The passage of time depends entirely on where you're standing. Relativity Theory... it's so romantic. But it's just so tragic too.
Quote.3283: Is dying that scary to you?
Quote.3284: Shining brightly even for a split second is better than living a dull-grey life for eternity.
Quote.3285: I might be the ugly duckling of the group, but I'll make sure that I'll protect all of you with all my might.
Quote.3286: It's my belief that powers aren't meant to hurt people. Nor are they meant to make others happy.
Quote.3287: The human heart is the source of all our power... We fight with the power of our hearts.
Quote.3289: No matter how much this world may change, I shall always remain myself.
Quote.3290: Even if the truth is as one suspects, it may still be worthless.
Quote.3291: Kakarot… please… destroy Frieza… He made me what I am. Don’t… let him… do it… to anyone else. Whatever it take… Stop him… Please.
Quote.3292: I don't want to be anyone's burden. I don't want you to be my dad if it's going to hurt you. (thinking about Kazuma)
Quote.3293: You do them one favor and they think you're their best friend. This is why I could care less if their entire species was swallowed up.
Quote.3294: No one would intentionally set an easily accessible place as their goal. It's a challenge, because it's difficult. It is a dream because it can't be achieved easily.
Quote.3295: Humility is a virtue, but do not insult yourself.
Quote.3296: My legend dates back to the 12th Century thank you very much.
Quote.3297: I knew this was a losing battle. Even though the outcome was obvious, I still wanted to bet on that one millimeter of a possibility.
Quote.3298: Justice cannot save the world. It is useless.
Quote.3299: Even if no one in the world believes you, stick out your chest and scream in defiance.
Quote.3300: People who neglect to make efforts or who don't take any actions at all are always the ones who dream that someday they will suddenly become wildly successful.
Quote.3301: If you don't get accepted by anyone, does that mean there's no significance for you to live on?
Quote.3302: I called you an idiot, idiot!
Quote.3303: *referring to Haruhi* She must have been born dumb.
Quote.3304: Everyone has their own talents, and strong wills that won't lose to anyone else.
Quote.3305: Without strength, you won't be able to save anyone.
Quote.3306: My eyes can see the death of everything. I can cut the lines as long as I understand the death behind it. This means I can kill anything, even if that thing is God.
Quote.3307: Why do you have to pay money to eat?! Can't we all just share?! Where is freedom in the world?! All are slaves to labor!! The rich grow fat... While the poor die!!
Quote.3308: If you love someone, they could make you sad. They could even make you feel lonely sometimes. But, that someone can also make you happier than you'll ever be.
Quote.3309: A man who cannot play by himself, cannot improve by himself.
Quote.3310: It's okay to live, even if there's no greater point to living.
Quote.3311: It doesn't seem right to let a girl choose me. I would rather choose the girl I devote myself to.
Quote.3312: If you throw your life away, you won't even have the capacity to feel regret.
Quote.3313: Without what you call absolute power, we'll be able to live free and strong... That's why I have to end this. Humans often betray, fight and do terrible things to each other, but if I can feel this heat and this pain in my heart, a future where everyone will be kind to each other will definitely come some day. I can believe in it now!
Quote.3314: One can evoke "extraordinary" abilities if one focuses all energy on just one point.
Quote.3315: The right to choose life or death lies with the victor. And the victor of this battle is me.
Quote.3316: Life comes at a cost. Wouldn’t it be arrogant to die before you’ve repaid that debt?
Quote.3317: I can always tell when you’re lying. I also know that you cannot tell me why you do so. So there is no need to convince me, or wrap everything in lies, or try to take the blame on yourself like that. Because I have complete faith in you, Subaru-kun.
Quote.3318: You should quake in fear of your impending death.
Quote.3319: I hate the fox, but the boy - I don't hate the boy.
Quote.3321: For me, apples are like cigarettes and liquor for humans. If I'm deprived, I go into withdrawals.
Quote.3322: The sea’s blue reflects because of the sky’s blue. Just like detectives and thieves. We’re all toying with the human mind. But the one who pries for others’ secrets is the one who’s truly impolite.
Quote.3323: Hey, I'll have you know that I almost really did kick the bucket during that training, so don't you dare sum it all up in one word, even if it is a nice one like "potential".
Quote.3324: You can make a rain of 1,000 needles. I will make it rain blood.
Quote.3325: How long are you gonna sit in front of me sobbing your little eyes out?! It's depressing! (To Tohru)
Quote.3326: People who can see get to choose... if you want them to know you can see. To pretend to be able to see, even when you can't... Or to pretend that you can't see even when you can.
Quote.3327: Live on and endure the shadows! There is no light for those who do not know darkness.
Quote.3328: You can play any character and yet in the end, you yourself are nobody. Your core personality is null. It's empty. That's how you could wear any mask all over your smooth, featureless face and have it fit perfectly.
Quote.3329: I have to be her place to belong. I need to be a steady, reliable man whom she can trust.
Quote.3330: The reason doesn't matter. As long as tiny bit of hope exists, that's all that matters.
Quote.3332: When I look up, I see a gloomy, cloudy sky. Today is another tiring uphill climb. I get sick of it all. Then... I think of the girl I love, and I put back on those worn down shoes. Her smile is like a ray of light that shines down from in between the clouds and warms up my heart. My girl has the smile of an angel.
Quote.3333: [about Verde] His head is a bit off and he's a pervert scientist.
Quote.3334: We're all born with selfish desires so we can relate to those feelings in others. But kindness is created individually by each person... So it's easy to misunderstand when someone is trying to be kind to you... But, Tohru, people's differences are something to celebrate.
Quote.3335: Living is anxiety and pain. It's continuing to think, continuing to choose.
Quote.3336: Every time you hurt others, you're the one who end up being hurt.
Quote.3337: What good is this cursed hand if I can't protect the woman I love?
Quote.3338: There's no use in just creating "Love". Empty hearts filled with "Love" tend to be unstable.
Quote.3339: If you have no money, I believe all you can do is work.
Quote.3340: Heroes might be lonely, but they aren't fighting alone.
Quote.3341: Sometimes life is like jazz, and goes in an unexpected direction...
Quote.3342: Hey sis, I've been wondering. How come everyone always closes their eyes when they sneeze? Is it to keep their eyes from popping out of their heads?
Quote.3343: No one knows what the right decision, to make in life, is, and that is not why I made this choice.
Quote.3344: I love this game that people call "life" from the bottom of my heart.
Quote.3345: Never look at your life as something insignificant. Never forget those friends of yours that you loved.
Quote.3346: Shut up you! What's with that TV drama attitude?!
Quote.3347: Sorry. I don't believe in fate. I explore my future with my own strength. Good or bad, it's my own choice.
Quote.3348: AHA-HA-HA! Alchemists are scientists. We don't believe in unprovable concepts like "God". *Rose looks angry* We strive to uncover the principles of creation in the matter of the world, to pursue truth... *gazes at Leto statue* it's ironic that we scientists... who don't believe in God... are in a sense the closest things to him.
Quote.3349: What the hell was that? All my punches were solid, but he brushed them aside like broccoli he didn't order! Didn't even give me a chance to kick his ass!
Quote.3350: Life is like a pencil that will surely run out, but will leave the beautiful writing of life.
Quote.3351: Forcing their interest on someone else, that's a legitimate previlege of an otaku.
Quote.3352: There is no right answer for getting along. Different people require different answers.
Quote.3353: When things change, isn't it better to get used to the new situation quickly? If that's the case, it's better to know what you have to do. Rejecting everything and doing things half-heartedly won't make it any easier. Hanging onto your pride will only weigh you down. So, to make life easier, sometimes it's best to go along with what other people want. As I said, it's just like the old saying: "When in Rome, do as the Romans do". Instead of others forcing it upon you, it's easier for you to want to do it yourself, right? You should try it, Mikoto. You'll be happier.
Quote.3354: I want you to please understand the scales of my heart will always be swaying back and forth. But there is something you should know. I will never lean to one side or the other due to the weight of gold coins.
Quote.3356: Remember this... no matter where you go, the strength of your mind and spirit is the most powerful magic of all.
Quote.3357: I know, someone like me can't just go out and change the world on a whim.
Quote.3358: My abusive language is alchemized through 40 kg copper, 25 kg of zinc, 15 kg of nickel, 5 kg of ice that keeps my cool, and 97 kg of spite.
Quote.3359: As it turns out, living was a punishment. I've been punished in small doses, living as a Takakura. But, still, we were together. We took all the punishments, no matter how small and trivial. They're all precious memories. Because the only reason I felt alive was because you two were there.
Quote.3360: You should cry while you still can. When you get bigger, sometimes, you can't cry even if you have something you wanna cry about.
Quote.3361: When you talk properly, you get your feelings across properly, right?
Quote.3362: Sooo... Korra. There they go, here we are, all alone in the gym... just you and me... TWO, alone people. Together. Alone.
Quote.3363: I wonder how long... How long will I remain anchored at this harbor known as battle?
Quote.3364: Don’t ever give up. Even if it’s painful, even if it’s agonizing, don’t try to take the easy way out.
Quote.3365: Pain, suffering, sadness... We all accept it, and that's why we can move forward!
Quote.3366: You've just gained the privilege to kill.
Quote.3367: Kurama, there is no person who does not carry scars upon their heart, and if there were such a man, they would be a shallow soul.
Quote.3368: Those who make mistakes blame themselves and close their hearts. It's impossible to fix the mistake. Men can't return to the past. That's why they drink. Lushes, drunks, sliding alcohol down their throats to try to dilute the memories that can't be forgotten. Frank Marlon, the gunsmith, does nothing but drink, and questions the glass after it's empty. "Am I wrong? Was I wrong?"
Quote.3369: Human potential for evolution is limitless.
Quote.3370: Your sudden smiles always surprise me. But are dangerous enough to make my heart race.
Quote.3371: Still I've never thought of myself as an unfortunate person. Of course I am not a fortunate person either. In the first place a fortunate person could never write plays or novels. I write while loving my misfortune almost as if I'm tasting it.
Quote.3372: This world is mine. I think this world may even just be a long, long dream I'm watching. You guys may just be illusions, and it can't be proven whether or not you really exist either. In other words, this world was created with me at the center. So what will happen if I die? I don't know. My imagination isn't very creative; I just can't imagine myself dying. In other words, there is no way this world can completely disappear. But if I die, then everyone will disappear. I am the only one in this world who won't disappear. The rest are just people I see as if in a dream.
Quote.3373: If you have the will to follow through with your beliefs, the results will follow naturally.
Quote.3374: The trees cry out as they die, but you cannot hear them. I lie here. I listen to the pain of the forest and feel the ache of the bullet in my chest and dream of the day when I will finally crunch that gun woman's head in my jaws... She is my daughter. One of the wolf tribe. When the forest dies, so does she. I caught her human parents defiling my forest. They threw their baby at my feet as they ran away. Instead of eating her, I raised her as my own. Now my poor, ugly, beautiful daughter is neither human nor wolf.
Quote.3375: Maybe I'm not perfect. Maybe I have a long way to go. But someday... someday I'll be able to stand and walk on my own. Without hurting anyone... and without being a burden. (to Kazuma)
Quote.3376: There're a lot of people who want to be in despair just so they can pity themselves... But I think it's a waste of time, that's all. After all, you're the one who wishes to be left alone and refuses to share your pain with anyone else.
Quote.3377: There are times when you can’t give up.
Quote.3378: The curtain that falls down at the end, shall be pulled down by the blade of my sword.
Quote.3379: Re-explaining my memories through words made good memories easier to savor, and bad memories easier to accept.
Quote.3380: Then let me ask you, if your God would allow my madness to flourish across the globe, then wouldn't it seem to you that any god like that would be just as mad as I?
Quote.3381: Let me ask you. Does a machine like yourself ever experience fear?
Quote.3382: A politician in the past once said: "My secretaries did it all."
Quote.3383: I just want to relieve my sexual frustrations. All I feel towards a cat eared high school girl in her underwear... is lust.
Quote.3384: The crowd of people looks just like pixels in a picture to me. A single pixel is meaningless. But add two, three and four... They pile up rapidly until they ultimately form a picture. But I've never seen that picture.
Quote.3385: Sometimes you have days like this. Days where the most trivial little thing... Ends up getting you wrapped up in some big, annoying trouble.
Quote.3386: Ask of me, and I shall give thee the heathen for thine inheritance, and for thy possession, the ends of the earth. Thou shalt break them with a rod of iron. Thou shalt dash them in pieces, like a potters vessel. Be wise now, therefore ye kings. Be admonished ye judges of the earth. Serve the lord with fear, and rejoice with trembling. Kiss the son lest he be angry, and ye perish in the way, though his wrath be kindled but a little.
Quote.3387: Pawns? Isn't that such an ugly term to use? We should call them the foundation for our futures. But it's a fact that they'll be sacrificed.
Quote.3388: But the truth is merely the majority of the living. It only revolves around their choices and actions and nothing more.
Quote.3389: I think society where people prefer earning to spending is a healthier one.
Quote.3390: If it's the army's job to end a war, it's the king's job to find a place for it to end.
Quote.3391: At times like these, you shouldn't depend on people's advice, but think about it thoroughly by yourself and make a decision. Because there's no right answer when it comes to love. Whatever your answer is, if it's your own choice, then it's right.
Quote.3392: You know, in the end, people come home to the people they love most.
Quote.3393: It's fine, I'll come to save you as much as you want. I'll make you fall for me as much as you wish. Leave this to your master.
Quote.3394: But I wasn't slacking at all. I practiced till I passed out. I gave my all. And if I still turned in a sloppy performance after all that, then... That's who I am now. It's the current me, playing with everything I've got.
Quote.3396: If the only way to be granted life in this world is to surrender my body and soul to insanity, then I shall choose to meet my doom!
Quote.3397: Even if you want to tell him and want to be with him, sometimes, that's not enough.
Quote.3398: Inuyasha, you and I were fated to never meet again.
Quote.3399: I wanted to know why was the world so twisted? Where did this twistedness come from? How can people be so wicked without needing to be? And why don't they realize their wickedness? Why are there things that bring chaos to so many lives? Why do people rule and let themselves be ruled? And why do they hurt each other? And why despite all that do people still want to live their lives? I was just looking for answers. I thought that if I met with you, you'd give me those answers... because you're looking for the same thing along a different path from mine - from the path where people can understand each other.
Quote.3400: It's easy to say "choose so that you'll have no regrets," but that's impossible. No matter how hard you've agonized over your path, you'll always regret something about it later. That's just how we humans are made. Which is why I think our true feelings are important. If you choose your path based on your true feelings, it'll hurt just a little less when you feel the same regret, right?
Quote.3401: Just like humans, approve killing animals in society, we, approve the killing of humans.
Quote.3402: Detective, don't waste your time trying to change their minds. Fight by their meaningless rules and you'll be pulled down with them. There's only one real law of the dark tournament: the strongest man prevails. I've retrieved enough energy to rip my way out, let's show this entire stadium a new definition for victory!
Quote.3403: I'm impressed. No one has ever gotten the better of me like that. It is almost a shame to take the bending of someone so talented. ALMOST.
Quote.3404: It just so happens that I was caught in a web. A web known as malice. Whether you put up with it, or put up a fight, it makes no difference. In the end, you get killed. If you don't like that... risk your life... and retaliate.
Quote.3405: But you know the saying, "play with fire, and you'll get burned". I'll make you regret underestimating L...underestimating me.
Quote.3406: In some ways, the more one thinks, the closer one feels to getting the answer...but in the end, it's hard to tell what is really the safe answer. I started to dislike being like that at one point, and my motto is, "make quick decisions and act fast." I choose the first answer that feels "right" to me.
Quote.3407: If you don't protect that child, I will never forgive you! (referring to Tohru as she was talking to Kyo on the day of the accident)
Quote.3408: Duh!! There's no such thing as free wish.
Quote.3409: When a girl calls someone a "nice guy", it means she couldn't care less about him.
Quote.3410: If there's something you want to go through with, you should stick to it without keeping up appearances.
Quote.3411: No one dies alone. When someone dies, the part of them that lives inside someone else also dies. You already live inside me.
Quote.3412: We ran through our school that was filled with noises, screams, life and death.
Quote.3413: Nothing can suppress a human’s curiosity.
Quote.3414: After all cool men don't cheat on their partners, do they?
Quote.3415: It's like that myth about the hero... He made wings out of wax so he could fly... but when he got too close to the sun... to God... the wax melted and he crashed to the ground...
Quote.3416: There's no advantage to hurrying through life.
Quote.3417: When extremes are reached, evil turns to virtue.
Quote.3418: *after Joey offers him to duel* No thanks, I think I'll have much more of a challenge playing solitaire.
Quote.3419: If I can't even manage a polite smile, I'll be in trouble in the real world.
Quote.3420: They often say that humans can't live alone. But you can live pretty long by yourself. Instead of feeling alone in a group, it's better to be alone in your solitude.
Quote.3421: I'm scared of everyone. I need to learn to deal with people better.
Quote.3422: Yeah it's going to be freaking awesome!
Quote.3423: “Expectations” are what you have when you have given up. Expectations are born from a despairingly large difference in skill.
Quote.3424: There's no need to pretend to be cool. Let's show our lame sides. That's who we really are, after all.
Quote.3425: Identity? What? The people who yap about identities all the time are usually the ones with no identity. Like something that changes so easily could really be an "identity", anyway.
Quote.3427: Why shouldn't you quit, if that's what you really want to do? Everything will work out somehow.
Quote.3428: Impossible, right? Compared to the enemy we're facing, you and I are the same, no more than dots! What's the point in comparing our heights? That is what makes this exciting! The smallest, the weakest - it doesn't matter! I should still wish to go and take over the world, with nothing more than my tiny dot of a body! Within my chest, beats the heart of the King of Conquerors!
Quote.3429: Some memories... aren't meant to leave traces.
Quote.3430: I’ll promise you one thing: you two will never be in danger again.
Quote.3431: We didn't even know each other then. And now, I can't imagine my life without you in it. You're the most loyal, brave and selfless person I've ever known.
Quote.3432: What does it mean to be a winner? Is it the last one standing? It means to climb over a mountain of corpses to get to the top. By no means is it a glorious sight to behold, in fact, it is extremely cruel. Even so, if you still wish to seek victory... then you must become a devil.
Quote.3433: This is called the "Rippling Sword". "Rippling Ophelia"... Great name, don't you think? But it's not too well known yet. Because most of the people who've seen it are dead.
Quote.3434: "Never trust anyone too much... Remember the devil was once an angel..."
Quote.3435: I hate all these damn rich people.
Quote.3436: Humans continue to live in a cycle of death and destruction. Guns can't change anything. It merely creates an infinite chain of hatred and retribution.
Quote.3437: This silence belongs to us... and every single person out there, is waiting for us to fill it with something.
Quote.3438: You've finally realized that the one thing you want, something greater than money, it can never be yours.
Quote.3439: Walking along the path that she chose, without being affected by others... in this sense, white is her color...in another sense, it also makes me want to put more colors on her.
Quote.3440: Stories where love and courage win in the end always turn out like that, you know? When I think about it, I became a magical girl because I always loved those stories.
Quote.3441: Nothing that happens is ever forgotten, even if you can't remember it.
Quote.3442: Ancient creatures died and left naught but fossil fuels, like coal and petroleum. Without that sacrifice, our present energy civilization would not exist. That sort of sacrifice is what is always demanded.
Quote.3443: It’s only natural for demons to defeat Humans.
Quote.3444: Hey bitch, get off me! I'm supposed to be on top!
Quote.3445: The Kuchiki clan is one of the four noble houses. We must set the standard for all shinigami. If we do not abide by the code...then who will uphold it?
Quote.3446: It's pointless to force people to do their best if they don't want to.
Quote.3447: Words alone, can make an entire army withdraw.
Quote.3448: Remember that a sword held by someone who is about to die… will never be able to protect anything.
Quote.3449: If you lose something big, that nothing can replace it... Then it’s okay if you have more than one, right? Even if the number is small, whether it’s 10 or 100, if you gather them up then you will have a reason to go on!
Quote.3450: The root of all your evil is in always relying on one of your other possibilities to get your wish. You must accept that you are the person here, now, and that you cannot become anyone else other than that person.
Quote.3451: *on the phone* I'm sorry to interrupt you, Major, but let me offer a bit of feminine advice. BABIES AREN'T BORN AFTER JUST FIVE MONTHS!
Quote.3452: No matter what may happen... As long as you walk by my side... There shall be no enemy that can stand before us.
Quote.3453: Providence may guide a man to meet one specific person, even if such guidance eventually leads him to darkness. Man simply cannot forsake the beauty of his own chosen path. When will man learn a way to control his soul?
Quote.3454: (referring to the letter for Kisa from the teacher) Here. It says to "like yourself". But good things about yourself... how are you supposed to find them? I only know things I hate about myself. 'Cause that's all I know, I hate myself. But even if you force yourself to find good things... it feels so empty. It doesn't work that way. People like your teacher just don't get it. I think... when you hear someone say they like you, for the first time... then you can begin to like yourself. I think when someone accepts you, for the first time... you feel like you can... forgive yourself a little. You can begin to face your fears... with courage.
Quote.3455: If you're always worried about crushing the ants beneath you... you won't be able to walk.
Quote.3456: There's no telling when this war will end. No matter how many troops the country deploys, the desert just absorbs them like water. We suffer, conquer, and what's left? Nothing but sand.
Quote.3457: History is not merely a linear collection of points that we pass through on a timeline. They are connected by a line. No, perhaps it is more accurate to say that they are made to connect.
Quote.3458: Check it out yo, how kick ass is my new fighter plane of doom!? Dude, it blowin your mind yet or what?
Quote.3459: [as a child] Why should I be sad?! My parents died protecting the village from the monster fox. They're heroes, and I'm the son of those heroes! If I cry, it's because I'm happy! I'm not even sad that they went and left me all alone...
Quote.3460: I used to think that eating was only consuming needed nutrients. I never thought it could fill the emptiness in me.
Quote.3461: Every one of us must do what's in their power! If we're going to die anyway, then it's better to die fighting than to do nothing!
Quote.3462: Learning and copying are the same.  Everyone starts out copying someone else. Every last person.
Quote.3463: You really don't know what happened, do you? It doesn't matter. By all means, stay in this cozy coffin of yours and continue to play prince. But I have to go now. She's not gone at all, she merely vanished form your world. Farewell.
Quote.3464: [sarcastically] In my country, we exchange a pleasant "hello" before asking questions.
Quote.3465: Look what I found! These are packue berries, known to cure the poison of the white jade plant... THAT, or makaoli berries that cause blindness.
Quote.3466: In that case, you have nothing to fear. Mistakes aren’t made by locking your feelings away and holding back… They’re made while wearing your heart on your sleeve.
Quote.3467: For the right price, you can buy not only treasures, but dreams, hearts and even people's lives!
Quote.3468: From now on, Lacus Clyne will be singing the song of peace.
Quote.3469: *to Reim* It means that you have no affinity for chains with fighting skills. You try to avoid violence even when you fight. That's a very good thing.
Quote.3470: Not every result can be the one desired. Trust your own judgments and actions. That is enough.
Quote.3471: Be more confident despite your weaknesses and failures.
Quote.3472: The right thing is… to have faith in life, until you’re sure of death. That’s what makes a great detective.
Quote.3474: Every single one of them died while furiously giving off the light that resided within them and that light is then inherited by the next person where it will go on to shine with an even greater radiance. And thus people are connected together... allowing us to work towards a better tomorrow.
Quote.3475: Human memories aren't reliable. Your brain will add something or just glorify it, memories make you believe what happened was better than it actually was.
Quote.3476: When we first met, you set my heart ablaze. When I see you, all I can do is gaze. Gaze at the beauty and wonder that is you. The constellation Gemini will make me think of me and you. You are my Yami and I am your Hikari. I love you, my Yami. Now and forever.
Quote.3477: In order to save a life, you must throw another life away.
Quote.3478: Who cares about school?! The real me lives on the Internet!
Quote.3479: Glad you're okay *wink* I kinda like you.
Quote.3480: Exams are an opportunity to teach correctly the meaning of winning and losing, of strong and weak. Students soak up heaping helpings of successes and setbacks! Take in now what it means to win, what it means to lose!
Quote.3481: I'll help you... But not by death, this world has enough of that. You can keep your life as long as you change the way you live it. It's never too late, believe me.
Quote.3482: I was too bent on fulfilling my objectives… I failed to see things from a larger perspective. I failed to build up a good relationship with them.
Quote.3483: Why should I apologize for being a monster? Has anyone ever apologized for turning me into one?
Quote.3484: [as a child, to Rangiku Matsumoto] I've decided. I'm going to become a Shinigami. Become a Shinigami and change things. So that they'll end...without Rangiku having to cry.
Quote.3485: Ashitaka... can you save the girl you love?
Quote.3486: Maybe everything you wish for won't become stars, but if you have a dream to believe in, they'll be thousands of the most glittering jewels in the night sky.
Quote.3487: You see, the world will not change through naive talks.
Quote.3488: If I ignore a friend I have the ability to help, wouldn't I be betraying him?
Quote.3489: Willpower alone isn’t enough in battle.
Quote.3490: I'd better split before I catch loser-itis!
Quote.3491: All the more reason to dissect one, before the whole species dies off.
Quote.3492: I am looking at things from a much higher perspective than you. I observe this world, this universe, the truth of all things. And I have come to realize that humanity must be destroyed. Out of all which the Gods have made, humans are their sole failure. They are a disease that must be vanquished. A filth that must be cleansed. They have no place here, in this universe, and if I am to make it a utopia once more, then I must take upon the grand task of removing humanity forever, in place of the Gods who refuse to admit their mistake.
Quote.3493: For you I will go deeper than mountains, and higher than sea.
Quote.3494: Today, everything's shining brightly! The air, the people, and even this classroom; because today, I actually did my homework!
Quote.3495: The moment you find the courage to give up your life for someone, would be the moment you understand love.
Quote.3496: Understanding 100% of everything is impossible. That's why we spend all our lives trying to understand the thinking of others. That's what makes life so interesting.
Quote.3497: Most people are irresponsible, changing their opinions easily based on unconfirmed information or convenient rumors.
Quote.3498: Getting dumped always makes a man stronger. But then again, men aren't meant to pursue happiness.
Quote.3499: There are times when working hard may not be enough. But those who succeed worked hard.
Quote.3500: Just because someone is important to you, it doesn't necessarily mean that, that person is good. Even if you knew that person was evil... People cannot win against their loneliness.
Quote.3501: Dedication is a talent all on its own.
Quote.3502: There are two types of lies: Lies that hurt, and lies that don't hurt.
Quote.3503: It seems that you still want to dance but... You will not be able to make steps anymore.
Quote.3504: Noblesse oblige. You have the power but not using that power is a sin.
Quote.3505: You ain't gonna know unless you climb up yerself. Ain't no way to look if you don't try.
Quote.3506: If we only focus on making the best moves, we will never get the better of our opponent. When necessary, we must be willing to take big risks, and be prepared to lose everything. Unless we change how we fight, we cannot win.
Quote.3508: Somebody's a little light on his feet. What's your fighting name, the Fancy Dancer?
Quote.3509: Because they saved me from myself, they rescued me from my loneliness. They were the first to accept me for who I am. They're my friends.
Quote.3510: If you're felling like there's nowhere you belong... That you're trapped in a small world. It's those feelings that drive us beyond our world.
Quote.3511: I'll never show you my tears. These are the tears of those who died with regrets. If there's a way to take away these regrets, I'll make sure I'll find it. If it's fear that you speak of, then I'll stand and face it. I'll never give up. The only time I lose is when I die!
Quote.3512: The real me is super cool!
Quote.3513: Let me ask you the reverse. How is it that you can give up so easily? [exaggerated sigh] I can't understand that…attitude! “It's bad luck! I have no choice!” People who passively accept their fate…because no one knows their future, least of all me, so I don't dare put things off. I have to do what I can, while I can still do it, so…I'll be kicking and screaming, 'til the very end.
Quote.3514: The first one to move wins. Stay on the defensive and you'll lose your chance.
Quote.3515: I'm going to keep getting closer and closer to you. And not just day after day, oh no. It's going to happen much faster than that! See I'm already closer to you than I was a moment ago. And I'll keep getting closer and closer to you, until I swallow you up and then, you'll disappear. Things are not turning out well for you at all, are they? (laughs) See you around.
Quote.3516: Wrong, holy man. All we want is to get our bodies normal again. See, we don't lie about what's possible. We didn't start a cult.
Quote.3517: People who can’t throw something important away, can never hope to change anything.
Quote.3518:
There are no inherently bad people. Everyone believes that, myself included. I don’t doubt the existence of virtue. And yet people bare their fangs when it seems they can profit. People will rationalize their own behavior whenever they become tainted with evil; they’re not supposed to be evil. In order to preserve their own twisted integrity, the world becomes twisted. 
Someone you praised as “cool” until yesterday is “stuck up” today; someone you respected as “smart and knowledgeable” is now scorned as someone who “looks down on bad students”, and “energetic vigor” becomes “annoying and overly carried away”.
Quote.3519: Whenever I see tulips, I'm always reminded of when we learned that these precious little flowers, have the strength to endure harsh winters.
Quote.3520: [In his Resurrección form] I can see! I can see! I can see!!! So this is the sky!! So this is blood!! So this is the world!! ...So this is what you look like. Komamura. You are uglier... than I thought.
Quote.3521: The person you like the most, likes you back the most. It seems so simple. But why is it? It feels like it will never come together...forever like this...
Quote.3522: Even I... know what it's like to be jealous.
Quote.3523: If I'm not at my limit, means I'm not trying as hard as I can!
Quote.3524: Now all that is left is the destruction of earth, but I think it would be a waste to destroy it. The food of this planet is very delicious.
Quote.3525: Why are you acting like you're the only one hurting when you pushed him away?
Quote.3526: I'll ward off the water from above, can you handle the water on the ground? We'll work together, it's a good thing there are two of us here. This plan would be impossible alone. Quite an obstacle.
Quote.3527: Damn that sister of mine! She's always talking about our father, but what did that baldy ever do for us?! He just played Othello with us from time to time!
Quote.3528:
Even if I’m not perfect… Even if I’m not the ideal me… He says that I’m still my own person.
The point of life isn’t to be perfect.
It’s to do want you want to do, to be who you want to be.
That’s how I should be trying to live.
Quote.3529: Kindness can sometime translate to hostility.
Quote.3530: Being the best decoy ever is as cool as being the ace.
Quote.3531: It's not justice if you don't go overboard.
Quote.3532: If it’s an important memory, then you shouldn't forget it. Since those who aren't with us only live on in our memories.
Quote.3533: I could say I'm not sad, but I'd be lying. The problem is the world won't let me stay a kid forever, so I can't lie around crying about it either.
Quote.3534: A name has nothing to do with loving someone.
Quote.3535: Love and the human mind can't be analyzed with formulas. It's not so unusual for love to make you forget the sense of care and respect for others. There's no logic. It's an uncontrollable urge. To tell you the truth, it’d be worrisome if you became like that. Your mind is keen, and your character is good. But passion has nothing to do with mind or character.
Quote.3536: I knew that it was pointless to hope for anything. I was so apathetic because of this sort of upbringing.
Quote.3537: I've already made up my mind, to the statement: "The most important thing in life is money". I answered "No".
Quote.3539: Break them and they're all just trash.
Quote.3540: Don't go thinking that there's a world where it's natural to be happy! Even if you start complaining, nothing will change! You need to make things fun by yourself!
Quote.3541: The beginning of a story is a sudden event; the start, a happy accident, the end, the fate for which it's meant. A story that never ends is a sad fate.
Quote.3542: Whether fairies have tails or not, or whether they even exist, nobody knows for sure. So it's like an eternal mystery, an eternal adventure.
Quote.3543: The final curtain falls at the very moment a person gives up.
Quote.3544: At first, people only play as dots. But when lines of trust and friendship connect those dots, the lines become a circle and that circle is teamwork. As long as you keep playing as a dot, the others won't trust you either.
Quote.3545: I won the battle but lost the war!
Quote.3546: What is really wicked... is judging people without even trying to get to know them!
Quote.3547: Just because my reasoning is childish and wrong, and just because my argument can be easily defeated with a bit of cleverness, does not mean your reasoning is completely correct.
Quote.3548: Happiness is hot chocolate on a cold day.
Quote.3549: A picture of you sleeping with a stupid look on your face totally oblivious to the dangers of this trip serves as a warning to future generations!
Quote.3550: I'm not asking you to love me. No, actually, please don't love me. But please let me be in love with you.
Quote.3551: Everything in this world is just a game and we are merely the pawns.
Quote.3552: Hmm... never noticed those before *after accidently groping Momiji's chest*.
Quote.3553: Doesn't seem to matter how far I travel, my destiny is always followed by blood and gunsmoke. The result is always the same every time, mountains of death and debris.
Quote.3554: I am Justice! I protect the innocent and those who fear evil. I'm the one that will become the god of a new world that every one desires!
Quote.3555: Be proud as someone who, after being struck by this power, is still able to retain the shape of a body.
Quote.3556: But I suppose it’s not so bad that an old friend is the same as ever.
Quote.3557: I never like to work based on trust. It takes hard work to build up trust, but only an instant to lose it. There's no less profitable investment.
Quote.3558: If we make it back to the real world, I'll find you. And fall in love with you all over again.
Quote.3559: One cannot live by jokes alone. But if there were no jokes, I’d rather not live.
Quote.3560: Even if they're not your own child, you can't, as an adult, overlook their wrongdoings.
Quote.3562: Don’t wimp out! Save him! Save him! Save him! Im not powerless anymore! Move!!
Quote.3564: Missy, could you please lend me your underwear?
Quote.3565: To ask is a moment's shame. Not to, lifelong.
Quote.3566: I hate waiting, but if waiting means being able to be with you I'll wait for as long as forever.
Quote.3567: I had no intention of deceiving anyone. It's just that none of you could understand...My true self.
Quote.3568: Life is like a playground swing, the higher and farther forward you go as you swing, it carries the risk of falling just as far back.
Quote.3569: Ephemeral and brilliant one, fall to my embrace. That is my decision.
Quote.3570: (singing) A tisket, a tasket, a pokemon egg basket!
Quote.3571: You can't see the whole picture until you look at it from the outside.
Quote.3572: In the battlefield, there is no place for hope. What lies there is only cold despair and a sin called victory, built on the pain of the defeated. All those people who met there have wholeheartedly admitted the evil and foolishness of this act called war. As long as people don't repent and don't regard it as the most evil taboo, then hell will endlessly reappear in the world.
Quote.3573: If your face gets any closer, someone who isn't supposed to be in this scene is going to come over there and kick your ass!
Quote.3574:
I really hate violence ...

I just want to get stronger, 
strong enough so that someday 
I can contain my anger!
Quote.3575: You’re the only one that can save my sister.
Quote.3576: It is foolish to listen to one who will not listen to you. Do as you wish.
Quote.3577: There is something mysterious about the life of a pirate.
Quote.3578: Nothing you or your friends say will affect my life in any way, shape, or form.
Quote.3579: A brat who is afraid to be hurt isn't qualified to love someone.
Quote.3580: [naked and smiling at Shinji] Hey Shinji, you idiot! Want to become of one mind and one body?
Quote.3581: If things were to change, do you think you could ever fall in love with me? Or fulfill a dream for which I long? The world is about to change. That's why I'm here now. I've come and this will mean a new beginning for my life.
Quote.3582: Food tastes best when you don't have to work for it.
Quote.3583: Love is a magnificent thing but, incidentally, it can also give birth to dreadful tragedy.
Quote.3584: If I have the power to make a difference, I should put it to good use.
Quote.3585: Flowers are disturbed, god of flowers weeps, winds of Heaven are disturbed, demon of Heaven laughs. Katen Kyōkotsu!
Quote.3586: Goodbye, vice captain. Why don't you suck on some mayonnaise in the afterlife? [he shoots, blowing up the whole wall]
Quote.3587: Our minds don't work the way we expect them to.
Quote.3588: Breaking a bond is every bit as painful as being physically torn apart. Can you endure that?
Quote.3589: I feel confined, only free to expand myself within boundaries.
Quote.3590: If I told her how I feel, she'd miss me even more. Afterall, I'm the guy who keeps breaking her heart by making her wait an eternity... even though I'm always by her side. I don't wanna see her cry anymore. Even if it means I no longer have a place in her heart. Seems pretty childish of me, doesn't it?
Quote.3591: I want to be the only one... who can help the one I care about.
Quote.3593: To ensure that all I've done won't end up a lie. I don't want to talk big game to people, then run away when it matters the most. This is a wall I must overcome on my own. If there's anything I want to change, I have to change myself. If I must become evil to defeat evil, I will become the devil himself. That's all to it.
Quote.3594: Killed in action and promoted two ranks for it. Brigadier General Hughes. You were the guy who was supposed to work below me and to push me to the top. Then you get yourself killed and surpass me in the ranks. I don't know what's more absurd, You or the State.
Quote.3595: A memory is something that is consciously recalled, right? That's why sometimes, it can be mistaken or wrong. It's different from a memory locked deep within your heart.
Quote.3596: Youth is a hoax. It's evil. People who make a big deal of their "youth", are just inviting trouble. They try to keep everything going on around them. For them, if there's something that has to do with their "youth", they jump at it without a second thought. From normal daily life, to rebelling against the view of society. If you fall in with them - lies, secrets, failure, and even crimes await you. But for them, it's just a spice of life. And if failure is also a mark of "youth", then isn't it ironic, that a person who failed to make any friends, is also technically leading his "youth"? Though I wonder if they would agree. Everything runs on their schedule. Let me be clear. The people who enjoy their "youth", will eventually fall apart.
Quote.3597: I think there are many things in this world we are better off not knowing. Sometimes the truth is the cruelest thing of all. Not everyone can bear it.
Quote.3598: I’m built to last I’ve got plenty of energy left to spare. I’m not giving up.
Quote.3599: It's dangerous here. If you stare at the stars long enough, you start thinking you could grab one, and you get this feeling like all your dreams will come true.
Quote.3600: It may be hard right now... But you must silence those thoughts! Stop counting only those things that you have lost! What is gone, is gone! So ask yourself this: What is there... that still remains to you?!
Quote.3601: Thinking it's your fault after the fact is just pointless.
Quote.3602: I'm selfish, I know. But to keep you only mine, I will do everything I needed to do, even if it's illegal.
Quote.3603: It is a thousand years too early... for you to become worthy enough to die by my Bankai.
Quote.3604: I'm the smartest member in the Straw Hat group.
Quote.3605: Not taking the initiative to secure your future but just waiting for luck to come your way, wasn't that just the definition of being lazy?
Quote.3606: I should just do what I'm able to do. No matter how small it is, there's no need to feel ashamed.
Quote.3607: If you'll cower at the sight of the great foe before you, leave at once, coward. If you'll lose the strength you believed in, then fall to the ground, weakling.
Quote.3608: I'm creating trouble. Can't you see?
Quote.3610: Applying knowledge is of the utmost importance when studying. You wrestle with various things and come up with a solution from there. It's true that asking someone who knows the answer is the quickest. But you can't necessarily say that that's the best way, don't you think?
Quote.3611: When I began thinking of him as I fell asleep, I stopped having nightmares. I began to look forward to seeing him. For the first time since I arrived here, I was happy.
Quote.3612: The biggest mistake in my life is that i was born!
Quote.3613: *mockingly* That's amazing, Mikuru! We're counting on you! The Earth is in your-- *breaks into uncontrollable and hysterical laughter*
Quote.3614: Searching for someone to blame is just a pain.
Quote.3615: It could be real difficult to hide when you're as big a star as I am.
Quote.3616: I always wanted to become stronger. At first it was to protect myself. Next, it was to protect Hak, who gave up everything for me. Now, it's to repay my friends, who enabled me to live.
Quote.3617: Since when did the "Cat" set the rules for this house? You mean to tell me that you contribute more to this house than anyone else? Do you pay all the bills? I can't stand people who do absolutely nothing but complain all the time! (To Kyo)
Quote.3618: I want to see and understand the world outside. I don’t want to die inside these walls without knowing what’s out there.
Quote.3619: Forcing yourself to like something you don't like brings sorrow.
Quote.3620: While we talk,  look forward to making up for all the time you've wasted looking back! We can start by talking about tomorrow. You can say anything like, whether you'll make Japanese or Western style breakfast tomorrow, or whether you'll put on your right or left shoe first. It can be something silly like that. No matter how silly it is, you can talk about tomorrow because you have a tomorrow.
Quote.3621: We have no need for the past. All we need are the present and the future.
Quote.3622: If you let anger and revenge consume you... You'll find yourself unable to behold the beautiful sights right before your eyes.
Quote.3623: Lelou? I'm glad that I could talk to you in the end. You know? When I got my memories back, I was so scared... A fake teacher... Friends with no memories... Everyone was... lying to me... It was as if... the whole world was watching over me... Lelou, you've been fighting... all by yourself against this world... All by yourself... So that's why... I wanted to become the one thing truthful to you... I love you, Lelou. Even when I knew you killed my father... I couldn't... bring myself to hate you. Even when you tried to make me forget everything... I still fell... in love with you again... Even when my memories were altered... I still fell in love again... No matter how many times I'm reborn... I'm sure I'll... fall in love with you again, Lelou... This... is fate, right? So, it's okay, right, Lelou? That I fall in love with you when I'm reborn... No matter... how many times... I'll... fall in... love with you...
Quote.3624: Gai...what I said earlier...I was out of line. I was being a self-righteous fool. I realize now that if I'd been in your shoes, I probably couldn't have stopped him, either.
Quote.3625: Strangely enough, when you get older, the things you didn't understand when you were a child... start to make sense. "When this happened, I should have done that." "When that happened, I should have said this." Those types of things. You start to understand rather than regret. It may be closer to repentance. So it may be that I do want to repent and erase the ignorant self from my childhood. Maybe that's what they mean when they say adults are selfish.
Quote.3626: All people have sanctuary which mustn't be touched. A scar of sadness which mustn't be entered. The living confront each other to achieve their ideals. In a quiet voice, the man in the white coat told me... that he had finally found me, that he wanted my life. That man smiled a smile deeper than darkness. Legato Bluesummers, a man fascinated by Death...
Quote.3627: Even a dim star is sending light somewhere.
Quote.3628: There were sad days, and painful ones and there may be more. Even so they're treasured days that I'll never forget.
Quote.3629: If you were to be troubled over something as trivial as losing face, then it's better to not have it at all.
Quote.3630: Sinful? Corrupt? I don't understand your logic. Why must pleasure and sin be connected? Pleasure gotten through evil means could be a sin. But pleasure can also result from good deeds. What kind of philosophy calls pleasure itself a sin?
Quote.3631: Even if I could redo the past, I must not take back what has already happened, because if I do that, everything would be a lie: those tears, that pain, those memories, that cold reality that hurts my heart, all of it. There were people who died in pain. There were people who risked their lives to save others. There were people who mourned for the deaths. But then, if everything were taken back and it did not happen, where would all of those go? The dead people would not come back. Reality cannot be overturned. To continue on remembering the pain and the weight… isn't that how lost things remain? People will eventually die and death itself is sad, but pain shouldn't be the only thing that remains. A death is painful, but it also leaves behind bright memories. As I am bound by these people's deaths… As I am protected by my memories of Kiritsugu... I believe memories become constraints and change the people living now... Even if... They are memories that will eventually be forgotten.
Quote.3632: When something dies or is lost, that thing doesn't truly disappear, as long as someone remembers it. And that remembering it is to acknowledge its existence, and because of that, it can sometimes be seen again.
Quote.3633: I never feel more human than when I'm fighting real monsters.
Quote.3634: Why do we have to be okay being friends with someone who won't treat us as friends?
Quote.3636: Everyone can make a choice after they have learned what it will result in. It is so easy to say we should have done it this way afterwards. But you can’t know what your choice will result in before actually choosing.
Quote.3637: I am the great assassin Black Star! And I've come here to assassinate you all!
Quote.3638: A warrior would rather die, than survive defeat.
Quote.3639: Humans who would dare to play God must pay a steep price for their arrogance, that is Truth.
Quote.3640: There are always chances in life.
Quote.3641: Love requires no reason. That is what makes it love!
Quote.3642: I shall light a fire upon the fang that falls short, so that I needn't see that star...So that it shall not tear this throat of mine.
Quote.3643: *talking about a nosebleed* And why would a girl your age pick hard enough to get a nosebleed?!
Quote.3644: You find a glimmer of hope, only to lose it. That is when your despair tastes the most divine.
Quote.3645: The chosen one? I feel more like the frozen one.
Quote.3646: You are the most important person to me in the whole wide world.
Quote.3647: There is no guarantee that your dreams are just good ones.
Quote.3648: No matter where you go, everyone's connected.
Quote.3649: Being rivals does not mean being an enemy.
Quote.3650: I like myself. I have never once hated myself. My high specs, my half-decent looks, my pessimistic, realist point of view... I don't hate any of it at all.
Quote.3651: You got away with just physical damage, but I'm going to take CRITICAL MENTAL DAMAGE!
Quote.3652: I bet that when they run out of delicacy points, girls turn into old ladies.
Quote.3653: I'm not fighting because I want to win. I'm fighting because I have to win.
Quote.3654: Celebrations are more fun if there are more people.
Quote.3655: Yeah, if I saw her smiling to herself while reading this, I might think it was creepy. But there's something wrong with people who talk trash and laugh behind another's back, too.
Quote.3656: My own mother thought I was a monster. She was right of course... but it still hurt.
Quote.3657: You're not supposed to find yourself, you're supposed to choose yourself!
Quote.3658: I don't need you anymore. I'm tired of you. (To Haru)
Quote.3659: Knowing what it feels to be in pain, is exactly why we try to be kind to others.
Quote.3660: When you are down, how do you pick yourself up? People fall into two categories... depending on how they pick themselves up. The first one sees somebody who is worse off and thinks, "Hey! I am better off than that guy." And the second kind of guy sees a challenge and tries to raise himself to it.
Quote.3661: Death on the battlefield comes regardless of class, royal or common. The loser must die!
Quote.3662: But there's nothing wrong about worrying. It's like a wall you need to overcome, to make it to the next level. If you're running up against that wall, it means you're moving forward. I wonder how many walls I've broken up until now, but if you won't move yourself, you will never get anywhere.
Quote.3663: You disappointed me. So I have to give you a punishment. Regret your helplessness and feel despair.
Quote.3664: Even in my second life, a failure is still going to be a failure.
Quote.3665: Do you need a reason to not want to lose?
Quote.3666: And so, the prince and the princess lived happily ever... Happily!? Happiness in stories is, at most, a trifling matter of a couple of lines at the end — the epitome of boredom. Now, show me a magnificent tragedy! A cataclysm of tears from which not one of the players is saved, and to which a happy ending never comes!
Quote.3667: I'm an apple for a day and I need a doctor right away...
Quote.3668: There is nothing more expensive than something free.
Quote.3669: It’s the most powerful words in the world. No just argument or eloquence can stand a chance against it. It’s… ”So what?”
Quote.3670: This is your home now, so make yourself comfortable. And take advantage of everything here, except me.
Quote.3671: Why..? How can she say things like that so easily? If we hear that from our parents, what are we supposed to do? Rin thinks that she's been "bad". But who do you think is the one who's being "bad" here!?! Having people take their anger out on us, being laughed at, not being taken seriously. We kids get hurt just like you do! Why can't you understand something so simple?! Apologize! APOLOGIZE! APOLOGIZE TO RIN!! [Rin's mom shuts the door] HEY!! I TOLD YOU TO APOLOGIZE!!
Quote.3672: You can't bring back what you've lost, think about what you have now!
Quote.3673: I love her so much that I don’t know what to do with myself.
Quote.3674: Love in real life isn’t as smooth as in manga...
Quote.3675: What we cannot speak about, we must pass over in silence.
Quote.3676: There is great value in the time spent in ones own company, but a life time of total isolation is a fate no one should endure.
Quote.3677: You think you're special? You're not. Everyone lies, everyone hides things... Nobody makes it through this life being completely honest.
Quote.3678: [to Aang, who is playing around] Stop! Stop it right now! What's wrong with you? We don't have time for fun and games with the war going on.
Quote.3679: The death of a culture, is the death of a people.
Quote.3680: It doesn't matter who your parents were. Everyone is a child of the sea.
Quote.3681: No matter what painful things happens, even when it looks like you'll lose... when no one else in the world believes in you... when you don't even believe in yourself... I will believe in you!
Quote.3682: In this world, there is no such thing as "absolute"!
Quote.3684: The Devil's finest trick is to persuade you that he does not exist.
Quote.3685: Are you telling me to flee from my foe!? The blood of a coward doesn't flow through these veins!
Quote.3686: It's because we don't unterstand! It's because we don't unterstand that we wonder what the other is thinking and try desperately to unterstand every word they say... You end up thinking too much about the other person, and being close to them becomes painful so you try to distance yourself... I believe you become friends with somebody by doing that over and over, and that's how... As much as I hate to admit it, it's how I became friends with these guys.
Quote.3687: The Camellia Blossom also know as Tsubaki, is a flower without fragrance. It proclaims nothing, blooming in silence. When the blossomed pettles scatter, it's quietly tragic. I am Tsubaki. A silent flower without fragrance.
Quote.3688: Yesterday my mouth tasted like mud. Now it tastes like sand. I never thought I would miss the taste of mud so much.
Quote.3689: If you keep trying to reason with yourself instead of listening to your feelings, you'll never be able to feel true happiness.
Quote.3690: I've never seen a man with a screw sticking out of his head before. I don't know how I'm supposed to deal with a guy like that!
Quote.3691:
Just because someone's friends with a nice person doesn't mean they're nice, too. 
Sometimes they're friends because the person's nice enough to have them.
Quote.3692: Three times now... We've fought world wars for our own nations, our own villages. We've hurt one another. We've hated one another. That hatred bred a lust for power, and that lust for power created ME. I was a Jinchuuriki, the embodiment of hatred and power. And I hated this world, and all the people in it... I wanted to destroy it with my own hands. The exact same thing Akatsuki is trying to do today. But one man, one ninja from Konoha stopped me. I was his enemy, yet he wept for me! I hurt him, yet he called me his friend! He saved me! My enemy, my fellow Jinchuuriki... He suffered the same pain as me, yet bore no ill will! There are no enemies here because we've all suffered at Akatsuki's hand! SO THERE IS NO SAND, NO STONE, NO LEAF, NO MIST, NO CLOUD! THERE ARE ONLY SHINOBI! And if you still hold a grudge against the Sand, then when this war is over, come and take my head instead! Our enemies are after the friend who saved my life! If they take him, if we hand him over, our world is finished! I want to protect him, and I want to protect our world! But I'm too young to protect it all on my own! All of you lend me your aid!
Quote.3693: You're either incompetent or you're spineless cowards. How pathetic. You can just sit here and suck on your fingers. Yeah, do that.
Quote.3694: Then just become stronger. I have my ambition, you have your ambition too. Which means you should just keep walking forward towards that goal.
Quote.3695: Anime - it's not something that can be thought of in a hall for conferences. It is made out of strange juices current from the brain of animators.
Quote.3696: It is a sad truth that greater the authority a person possesses, the more he tends to fear change.
Quote.3697: If this world wasn't a complete hell for me, that's because you were alive.
Quote.3698: You can become happy right now." I won't say these types of absurd lies. However, if you get through these current hardships and survive - a time where you can be happy will come.
Quote.3699: Jojo, being human means having limits. I've learned something. The more carefully you scheme, the more unexpected events come along
Quote.3700: My goal is so far away that I'm not even on the starting line yet.
Quote.3701: It's only the end if you give up!
Quote.3702: Sorry I'm late guys, a black cat crossed my path so I had to go the long way.
Quote.3703: When there's nothing to be gained, rising to the challenge at those times... is surely the mark... of a true hero!!
Quote.3704: Hey, all it did was go around in a full circle.
Quote.3705: I too used to believe that the world would be a better place if I hadn’t been born. I was hated merely for the fact that I existed, and I died for the happiness of many people. But there was one thing I wished for with all my heart... If I’m ever given a second chance in life, I want to live for only myself. That is my sincere wish.
Quote.3706: Nothing amazing happens here. Everything is ordinary. The huge factory that can be seen from our town, the Medical Mechanica Plant, all the adults got excited when it came here, like it was really a big thing. The white steam that blows out every day at the same time, it looked to me like smoke that signified some kind of omen. Smoke that spreads out and covers everything.
Quote.3707: We finally became friends. I've said everything I wanted to say. Now we know everything about each other. Though, from the moment we become friends, we'll never speak to each other again.
Quote.3708: What must triumph here is the knight's path of chivalry that we champion. Is that not so, Heroic Spirit Arturia?
Quote.3709: All of the Arrancar follow me... because they see me as fearless and the only individual who can actually bring forth the new world... the new future where you can belong. Without me, that dream can't be fulfilled and without me the gotei 13 will destroy you all...  Do you see it now from my point of view?
Quote.3710: For a man to stand up again, he needs one thing... "To make excuses".
Quote.3711: In the human world, truth and reality aren't always one and the same. Humans just call their desires and ambitions as "truth". Humans will even kill other humans if they have "truth" as an excuse.
Quote.3712: Any kind of life can go wrong, or sicken or suffer. Lives get old, decay, and finally die. Disliking that fact because it hurts, isn't any different than disliking life itself.
Quote.3713: Success comes only to those who have dared to stand up without fear!
Quote.3714: I can hardly tell anymore where the truth ends and the lies begin.
Quote.3715: The longer one holds on to a memory, the longer one lives in the past. The deeper the memory they hold onto, the more beautiful the past will become. The beautiful memories will eventually turn into hate. Even if they look ahead, they lose the ability to walk. As long as the heavy chain called revenge continues to bind the heart, the tears of sadness will continue to flow.
Quote.3716: Since childhood, my body was weak. There was a limit to what I could do. A weak body... A life which I don't know how long I would live for. Well, life has its limits. I felt like my limit was exceeding faster than others' limit.
Quote.3717: Push through the pain, giving up hurts more.
Quote.3718: Love. I myself have never loved another person.  Most likely, I don't even love myself.  I do have knowledge of it.  But I am incapable of determining whether or not it is vital in my life.
Quote.3719: [To Yuki] Liar! Moping around like a sad rat who lost his cheese!
Quote.3720: [as Zhao threatens the moon spirit] Whatever you do to that spirit, I'll unleash on you tenfold! Let it go now!
Quote.3721: Who falls for who depends completely on the person. If there are a hundred people, there are a hundred ways to love... There never is one absolute form of love.
Quote.3722: We do not live in a fairy-tale world. We cannot simply take revenge on those who have betrayed us and say "the end". We have to live on after this. And taking revenge for betrayal only invites more revenge.
Quote.3723: There's a thin line between recklessness and courage.
Quote.3724: Maybe... just maybe, the light can reach even the bottom of a dark ocean.
Quote.3725: Even if I found happiness, my weakness can't be discarded. But, even so, I'm sure that we took the right path to move forward.
Quote.3726: This is the world I live in. The dirty world of the adults.
Quote.3727: People who grow up in different environments will invariably have different tastes and preferences. Therefore, could one say that the subsequent marriages necessarily lead to happiness?
Quote.3728: *To Lambo*  Smile... I said smile! Smile! Damn you!
Quote.3729: It's not always possible to do what we want to do, but it's important to believe in something before you actually do it.
Quote.3730: I'm just a guy who's a hero for fun.
Quote.3731: It’s natural that men have things they need to protect.
Quote.3732: The most precious thing is different for every human. They resist and kill each other because of their difference. It has nothing to do with the inability to sense the other's most important thing.
Quote.3733: Someone who cannot hate something, cannot love something, either.
Quote.3734: No point in wondering who someone really is, all you can do is trust them and accept them for who they are. Because the person you come to know is who that person really is.
Quote.3735: People do not cease to exist immediately after dying, as long as there are people who remember them.
Quote.3736: Sometimes when I'd go to visit her in the hospital...she would purposely avoid me. Then I didn't know what she was thinking about anymore... (to Yuki, about Rin)
Quote.3737: You're young. Time is on your side. You'll grow up and I'll grow old. Someday you'll likely beat me. It's only natural. Even the strongest man must die.
Quote.3739: Expecting others to read your mind is delusional. But... But... I... I..."It's not empty words I'm after. There was something else I desired all along. Not mutual understanding, friendship, companionship, or anything of the sort. I don't care about being understood. I simply wish to understand. Understand, know, and rest easy in that knowledge-- gain some peace of mind.
