Wanting to know people inside-out because being in the dark terrifies me is an awfully self-indulgement, egoistic, and arrogant wish. It's downright despicable and disgusting. Having a desire like that makes me sick to the stomach! But if it's at all possible to share that desire-- if it's possible to have a relationship where you're free to burden one another with that repulsive self-gratification...I know that it's out of the question! I know that it's out of my reach! Even so!" Even so, I... I want something genuine.
Quote.3740: Our relationship has already been formed. No matter how trivial a meeting and the incidents that follow may seem, a relationship is made. Even if it is just for a short amount of time, a knot that has been tied does not unravel. It means that during your lifetime, every incident that passes has meaning. The meeting between you and I also has meaning, so remember it.
Quote.3741: Let's calm down. The enemy is shooting at us.
Quote.3742: Huh? What are you doing falling into a hole? Some genius you are. Serves you right!
Quote.3743: The Bird of the Hermes is my name, eating my wings to make me tame.
Quote.3744: Look around you, and all you will see are people the world would be better off without.
Quote.3746: For a winner, there is nothing to say to a loser.
Quote.3747: The world you want can’t be built after destruction. We build it everyday -step by step!
Quote.3748: People who want to leave are going to leave. But not everyone is like that.
Quote.3749: That morning's dawn was painted a beautiful scarlet, the likes of which I had never seen before. Like the color of Erza's hair, it was warm and passionate... If she could only lift her face a beautiful sky would be spread out before her.
Quote.3750: The time known as "LIFE", cannot be rewound.
Quote.3751: If a couple curses stopped me, what kind of hero would I be?!
Quote.3752: Red is supposed to be the color of fate, right? Even if its annoying right now, it might connect to something good when you least expect it.
Quote.3753: It's not about wanting to do something that you can do, it's about what you do. It's not about wanting to become someone, it's about who you want to become.
Quote.3754: Whatever I do, I'll always be me. I won't tone myself down to fit in.
Quote.3755: I say... that people do not live just so that they can someday die. It is because they are alive that they someday die. There is no point to living. The same goes for judgment. Judgment must be performed hand in hand with both life and death. It is something that must be performed hand in hand with humans.
Quote.3756: If I were to live out life without any mistakes that would be great. But... there is no such path. Falling, tripping, losing the way, making mistakes, little by little, walking one step at a time, this is the only way to live out life.
Quote.3757: Profit could warm his coin purse, but never his back.
Quote.3758: The world...what a glorious place! Seek freedom, and it will lie stretched out before your eyes. If the endless dream guides your restless spirit, seize it! Raise your flag, and stand tall!
Quote.3759: Don't start a fight if you can't end it.
Quote.3760: Geniuses don't understand the feelings of people who aren't able to do something.
Quote.3761: The thing that we call power is dynamic, it keeps on changing.
Quote.3762: It's amazing how much you kiss your own ass.
Quote.3763: [To Orihime, when she refuses to eat] Shall I force it down your throat? Or would you rather be strapped down and given IV's?
Quote.3764: And what of it? If you're good on the inside, then looks don't matter!
Quote.3765: Even if it is shameless and vulgar, somewhere I seek some sort of connection with people.
Quote.3766: I know I haven't always made the right decisions up to now... Whether I was right, or whether I was wrong, may not even matter in the first place. However, running up against my sins like this-- all of the choices I've made up to this point-- today, being able to die for someone-- is something I'm glad for...
Quote.3767: High school girls, high school girls, all for me, high school girls!
Quote.3768: Don't underestimate me! I don't quit and I don't run! You can act tough all you want! You're not gonna scare me off! No way! I don't care if I DO get stuck as a Genin for the rest of my life! I'll still be Hokage someday!
Quote.3769: The important thing is to think of something nobody else is thinking of. "Ignorance is a sin" is not about knowledge - it's about wisdom.
Quote.3770: If you think unconditional kindness is good, and any sort of kindness that comes with conditions is hypocrisy, you should reconsider. People can only achieve as much as the situation allows.
Quote.3771: [in her head] My happiness comes from the kindness of those around me.
Quote.3772: The strong feed upon the weak. It’s such an obligingly simple rule. Except in this world, my friends tried to be strong.
Quote.3773: Whatever you value... What you consider right is up to you. But don't force those ideals onto other people.
Quote.3774: Your home is the place where you can be yourself.
Quote.3775: I'm still a man too, I wanted to look calm and composed in front of everyone. Especially in front of the one I'm in love with.
Quote.3776: Everyone in this place is unhappy. And since they're unhappy, they're probably looking for someone worse off than they are.
Quote.3777: Fishing is a life and death struggle between man and fish. Forget this and you will most certainly get hurt.
Quote.3778: If you accept everything you’re told without question, you’ll lose your ability to think. Even if you reached the same conclusion, it would still be worth analyzing the reasons behind it.
Quote.3779: A barbarian punches someone when he feels like it, a soldier attacks when it's time to attack, and Ikta Solork says everything he wants whenever he wants to say it.
Quote.3780: Huh?!? Aliens!? What kind of a person believes in aliens anyway?! I know. A STUPID ONE.
Quote.3781: I'm a man who makes precise choices about time, place, and people. Pleople call me Master of Choices. I'm gonna be the King of the Choices!
Quote.3782: I bet he likes setting oil-slicked gulls on fire.
Quote.3783: Some of us showed a strength we didn't expect. Some of us went ballistic like we thought they would, some got all fired up for next time and some irresponsible- lookin' types turned out to be crazy serious. The guy we thought was just a little runt turned out to be a genius assassin, and a guy we thought was a genius was secretly workin' hard all along. With all these different skillsets...we just might be able to handle any challenge that comes our way.
Quote.3784: Foolish alchemists who have turned their backs on the ways of God...shall all be punished.
Quote.3785: Sakura-chan, you sure do love Sasuke, don't you?
Quote.3786: This world that we live in is gentle yet sad, fun yet sorrowful, strong yet ephemeral... ...but as long as you're alive, something good is bound to happen. I'm sure of it.
Quote.3787: It is the role of a parent to stand in front of their children... and protect them even if their legs were to give out at any moment.
Quote.3788: When things seem beyond help, if you open your eyes and take a really good look... It's a lot better than turning your back and hiding your eyes.
Quote.3789: People can say there is a balance, a logic that everything happens for a reason... But the truth is far less designed. No matter how hard you work, when you die, you die. Some spend their entire life trying to scratch their way to the top, and still die in poverty. While others are born into wealth without ever working at all. It's a cruel and random world. And yet the chaos is all so beautiful.
Quote.3790: Ruling over death means ruling over life. Death is the climax of life. To have the best death, you must honor life.
Quote.3791: The most annoying thing is that I can't do anything for you, even though you're crying.
Quote.3792: All of the connections we encounter in this world serve as teachers who nurture us.
Quote.3793: The only people who say that money doesn't matter in this world are the ones with lots of it.
Quote.3794: Are you, what they call, a heart?
Quote.3795: In my next life, I want to be me, and meet you again.
Quote.3796: Even a piece of garbage has its pride.
Quote.3797: The toilet is a wonder of civilization. It is a grand invention. It preserves human dignity.
Quote.3798: If you find a raw diamond, wanting it to become polished is natural right?
Quote.3799: Don't tell me what to do, you seaweed head.
Quote.3801: As long as our love is stronger than the hatred within us, we can keep it sealed away.
Quote.3802: If we fight again... We're both gonna die.
Quote.3803: [To Tohru] Ever since you left I've been getting pissed off about everything, and because I couldn't understand why, it just pissed me off even more!
Quote.3804: Quick as a rabbit! It’s no sweat. If you’re going die, get the job done first… Mirko!! Not done yet! Because a Hero never, ever… gives up!
Quote.3806: Hatred will never be erased! The only thing you can do is erase the ones you hate!
Quote.3807: What we call the human heart... It's such a mystery, isn't it?
Quote.3808: Crying over ill luck won't do you any good. You must believe tomorrow will be better than today and smile.
Quote.3809: Oh right, most talented artists become famous after they're dead, I'll make you great by taking you to the cemetery called prison!
Quote.3810: I think pain is the best discipline.
Quote.3811: People must continue to fight for their fate. Unless they fight for the future they wish for, they will never know whether or not they can attain it.
Quote.3812: It's overpriced, but that's okay, HERE'S YOUR CHANGE!
Quote.3813: A dream... It's something you do for yourself, not for others.
Quote.3814: You're all grown up, so you won't feel dirty looking at my body, right?
Quote.3815: If one feels it is fun now, one will be able to enjoy life the most. Everything will change over time, so we must treasure the happy moments before us.
Quote.3816: Yamcha, I was worried about you. For all I knew, you were dead in a ditch in a country you can't pronounce. You'll have to make this up to me. And you're going to enjoy it.
Quote.3817: *to a dying Elliot* I really liked you. It was only thanks to you that Gil managed to live in that house without forgetting how to smile.
Quote.3818: Family? Let me tell you what kind of link I have with them. They are just lumps of meat linked by hatred and murderous intent!
Quote.3819: [After seeing Yuki, Shigure, and Kyo Sohma transform for the first time] THEY'RE ALL ANIMALS!
Quote.3820: To lose the woman you loved, not even being able to grieve… if not a tragedy, what is it?
Quote.3821: Life is suffering, pain, and misery.
Quote.3822: I do not think humans are foolish. I have respect for people who live fulfilled lives.
Quote.3823: Pain, suffering. It's pointless to just think about those things. The traveler (referring to "The Most Foolish Traveler" by Natsuki Takaya) didn't. That may be stupid to some people but that's not stupid to me. Yuki... Kyo... when you close your eyes, what do you think?
Quote.3825: [after Princess Yue unexpectedly kisses him] Okay, now I'm really confused. Happy, but confused.
Quote.3826: After spending most of my life trying to live as someone else wanted, I’d apparently forgotten who I was.
Quote.3827: Well, singing, or music... I think by nature it was always meant to convey something. So if there's something you want to say, don't you think you should try singing it?
Quote.3828: You people, are you satisfied with this kind of world? I'm not.
Quote.3829: If I can be the best in the world at something, then I think it's worth a shot.
Quote.3830: Every day, the words cross my mind.  "If I had done this back then..." but they don't take the sincere form of regret.  The words are just an excuse that come to my mind then disappear.
Quote.3831: I believe you have the potential to bloom into something even more beautiful than the cosmos.
Quote.3832: Just walk the path you believe in. And don't forget, you're the main character of your own life story!
Quote.3833: You can't change the world without getting your hands dirty.
Quote.3834: The only principle is that there is no principles.
Quote.3835: You know, isn't it said that life has its ups and downs? It's fun because downs come after ups, but if life was full of downs, wouldn't it get boring?
Quote.3836: Yhwach. You desired a world... Where fear would no longer be a burden. But... In a world without fear of death... People will never attain the hope that is to be found from casting their fears aside and preserving through them. While it is true that people can continue to press forward through the simple act of living... That is no way comparable to marching forward in the face of death, while doing their damndest to keep it at bay. That is why... That is why people have given that very march a unique and special name. "COURAGE."
Quote.3837: Half breed or full breed, to me it don't matter. But when you insult my mother, that's when I get angry. For her sake then if for nothing else... I'm gonna make you pay! [he jumps up and attacks Sesshoumaru, hitting him for the first time]
Quote.3838: Sometimes your biggest effort will be ignored, but your smallest mistake will be judged.
Quote.3839: I can't seem to get my head on straight.
Quote.3840: Losing something is sad. Even when I lose something as tiny as a worn-out eraser, I feel pretty down for a day or two. That's why I'm looking for him.
Quote.3841: You took my teacher, and now I let you take my friend. What the hell do you want from me?
Quote.3842: Just apologize, even if you don't mean it. *to some kid, about Inuyasha*
Quote.3843: Honestly, how meaningless.. For something called love, which has neither meaning nor form. Laughable, isn't it?
Quote.3844: There’s no meaning if you win alone!
Quote.3845: Yes! One small candy for man, one giant candy for new mankind.
Quote.3846: What is the point if those with the means and power do not fight?
Quote.3847: Death and pain are just a small price to pay for the enjoyment of battle!
Quote.3848: A man can't just live on carbohydrates alone...
Quote.3849: Watching TV or playing games alone is more fun. Playing along with your friends' hobbies... Laughing at their jokes when they're not funny... All that does is tire me out.
Quote.3850: For all our sake I will sing and pee my heart out in the name of spirit!
Quote.3851: If someone were to drown in the seas for my sake, then I would be released from stone and return to life... to live once more. But if I were to return to life one day, which would give me the most important thing - I would then cry alone. I would cry longing for my stone. Of what use would my blood even be if it were to ripen like wine for it would not be able to bring back the one who loved me most from the water's depth.
Quote.3853: Life is like a mountain - you can say you've reached the top, but only after climbing back down.
Quote.3854: Everyone has changed. That's not it. The one who's changed the most, is me.
Quote.3855: Not following through to the end can be fatal.
Quote.3856: Finally I saw... A world so bright I almost wanted to cry... It was then, that my consciousness was engulfed in darkness.
Quote.3857: Know what makes Ganta so amazing? He always gets up again.
Quote.3858: Wasted effort is one of the privileges of the youth.
Quote.3859: That, I don't want to do. You may feel that I'm currently an abnormal Nagato Yuki. That judgement is correct. But I myself cannot accept that I am abnormal... because if I do, I'll become alone. I was scared, so I tried to hide it.
Quote.3860: Who'd want to date girls that talk smack about your friends?
Quote.3861: You kids don't understand anything! By declaring that you're neutral and have nothing to do with this, you can still distance yourselves from what's happening? You don't really believe that, do you?
Quote.3862: You can change fate as long as you believe you can.
Quote.3863: Besides, miracles don't exist in this world. There are only inevitabilities and accidents, and what you're going to do. That's it.
Quote.3864: I ain’t giving up!! To not give up, I have a reason.
Quote.3865: Such words are wasted on someone like me.
Quote.3866: The sounds you find pretty, and the sounds the other members find pretty... Are they really the same?
Quote.3867: I kept the ball in the air, it’s not your place to give up.
Quote.3868: There's probably no one who's more of a realist than the unpopular loner. I have lived my life with the Three Nevers of the Unpopular: Never to hold (hope), Never to open (your heart), and Never to treasure (sweet words).
Quote.3869: I always knew you were no mere mortal... but I had no idea that you were a cat.
Quote.3870: I want to make his dreams come true...
Quote.3871: We can't live if we don't keep running forward.
Quote.3872: Happiness is only happiness when everyone shares it.
Quote.3873: Once you get used to the abnormalities, they become mundane.
Quote.3874: Don't do something wasteful as to wash your frustrations with tears. Your frustration is motivation that you can use to make yourself better. Hold it inside like it's an important thing!
Quote.3875: Emblem? Looks like a grumbling, drunken tapeworm to me.
Quote.3876: Time passes, people move. Like a river's flow, it never ends. A childish mind will turn to noble ambition. Young love will become deep affection. The clear water's surface reflects growth. Now listen to the Serenade of water to reflect upon yourself.
Quote.3877: What's important, is to know fear and yet take a step forward.
Quote.3878: Thus at long last the fighting between the rival gangs had ended! To sum up, this leads us to number 778 of the 1,000 provisions you must observe. Never mail a letter without the return address or the proper postage. And don't call collect.
Quote.3879: I will see the truth of this world... LORD OROCHIMARU WILL SHOW ME!!!
Quote.3880: No matter the journey, when you come to a fork in the road, you must decide in an instant which path to take.
Quote.3881: But I have a fear stronger than the fear of losing. It's the fear of boredom. I fear those days full of boredom.
Quote.3882: Anyone can make a mistake. If you feel bad about it, will that sin disappear?
Quote.3883: Man fears the darkness, and so he scrapes away at the edges of it with fire. He creates life by diminishing the Darkness.
Quote.3884: If I'd known that the end would come so fast, I would have said so much more.
Quote.3885: To Mello, it's like playing a videogame against me, I think. "See who gets to Kira, the last boss, first."
Quote.3886: Even if there's nothing here today, there might be something tomorrow.  It's a caring heart that's important.
Quote.3887: The hungrier one is, the more satisfying one's dinner.
Quote.3888: Let's eat fast so we can eat again!
Quote.3889: People’s feelings sometimes go astray and lead to irreversible consequences.
Quote.3890: If we love someone, we need to tell them about it. That way, we'll feel relieved and a lot stronger.
Quote.3891: If I can, I'd prefer nobody to be sad.
Quote.3892: Look. Look at me! Watch as the man you cast out spills his blood and dies. Take a nice long look! I will save you all. I want you to live the rest of your lives knowing the man you abandoned saved you. And I will laugh at you from the afterlife. And tell you that it serves you right!
Quote.3893: I'll give it a try. Anything that man can do, I'm sure I can do just as well.
Quote.3894: Idiots in their idiotic way have their own idiotic worries.
Quote.3895: If... If you have such good deductive skills, you should have been able to see through my sister's disguise easily... But... but... WHY...!!!
Quote.3896: If there is such a thing as the work of the devil, then there's no doubt it's what happened in this incident.
Quote.3897: I always wished to be accepted by my surroundings. I tried to change myself for that reason. But, I don't care if I'm disliked. I don't care if I don't have a place where I belong. I don't mind if everybody rejects me starting tomorrow. I will even become a devil for the person who is trying to protect me.
Quote.3898: There is no such thing as "truth" or "lies" in this world; there never has been. There are only plain, hard facts. And yet, all beings who exist in this world acknowledge only those "facts" that are convenient to them, and take them to be the "truth". They do so because they know no other way of living. However, for those powerless beings who comprise the majority of this world's population, inconvenient facts that affirm their very existence, are their only truth.
Quote.3899: So you're trying to accept everyone and their feelings, aren't you? I think you already know this, but if you keep trying to do this "accepting" thing with everyone, you're liable to be torn to bits.
Quote.3900: I couldn't confess my feelings for you, so I watched you from afar, being happy with someone else.
Quote.3901: It's true, I don't have a body, but I'm here. This is my punishment for setting foot on holy ground where mortals are forbidden. We made a mistake, Rose, and we're paying for it.
Quote.3902: I loathe all things, I despise every living creature who's bound to time.
Quote.3903: You'll have some painful, despair-ridden experiences. In fact, most of them will be tragic. But we chose to walk this path. We'll take on the dirty work. And change the world. After we finish, we can disappear.
Quote.3904: In the past and the present, I have to change, or nothing else will.
Quote.3905: Books are nice, aren't they? With just one sentence you can get lost in all sorts of dreams. They way I think of it, literature allows the reader's consciousness to deeply relish the author and be closer to him. And so, we freely walk around the world of the story from the yarn spinner's point of view. It's only when you immerse yourself in the world of a book that you are able to forget just who you are.
Quote.3906: You know, it's funny. Every crook I meet wants to tell me how much I'm just like them. But there's a big difference between you and me and the burdens we bear.
Quote.3907: At times, I feel as though the whole world is gray, as though time is standing still. But time never stops. It moves forward endlessly, as surely as bodies buried in the ground will one day become white bones. Listen, it's always you who stops time. If you stop in fear of the future - you gain nothing, and nothing begins. You spend your life as though already dead. Whether you wish it to or not - time never stops. That's why there is nothing more interesting than this world. Don't be too negative. You haven't become ashes just yet. You have your flesh and blood, and your bones are supporting you.
Quote.3908: No one can draw a clear line between sane and insane. You move that line as you see fit for yourself. No one else can. You'll understand soon... that the one that's insane is this world.
Quote.3909: I'm worthless garbage who can't even write a straight looking K!
Quote.3910: I sunk again. *after sinking in the desert*
Quote.3911: I don’t need to believe in God to believe in myself.
Quote.3912: The world is just another word for the things you value around you, right? That's something I've had since I was born. If you tell me to rule such a world, I already rule it.
Quote.3913: Every week, when it is time, they stick to the TV. They watch my actions in the comfort of their families after dinner. Children watch my actions and their hearts leap. They see me stand up to evil spirits and... they know what courage is! Do you understand, boy? With them watching, I can't run away from the enemy
Quote.3914: I haven't relied on luck since the moment I was born. Everything has been the result of my choices. That is what leads my existence towards the future.
Quote.3915: Damn it, I really don't want to follow her to hell... Looks like I'll just have to pull her out of it!
Quote.3916: It's a beautiful night. It almost makes me want to go out for a bite to drink.
Quote.3917: Bare emotions tell the truth much eloquently than any justification.
Quote.3919: So what if the government collapses or the country is ruined? I'm not civic-minded! All I want to do is stand tall and live on until the day I collapse and die!
Quote.3920: The weather's nice and the breeze feels good. The little birds are making their cute chirping sounds. Perhaps people nowadays have forgotten how wonderful nature is... Yes, don't you think it's a waste to not feel it with your entire body like this?
Quote.3921: When you are feeling sad... smile, even if you have to force yourself... If you cry when it gets painful... it will only get more painful.
Quote.3922: Laws exist only for those who cannot live without clinging to them.
Quote.3923: There’s no such thing as a person who doesn’t belong. You’re here because there’s someone who wants you to be here.
Quote.3924: Life is built upon the taking of another life. If you have the resolve to kill, then you have the obligation to eat.
Quote.3925: Sometimes, the blood rushes to my head and I feel like, if I run, I'll lose something important.
Quote.3926: Violence, greed, slaughter, corruption, defeat, failure, immorality, humiliation… These are everywhere. As long as you live, you will face them.
Quote.3928: I was ten Billion percent certain that you were alive. There is no way a guy who was intent on confessing to Yuzuriha would give in after just a few thousand years. You aren’t that weak.
Quote.3929: I don't need a reason to save someone.
Quote.3930: If you don't hold any regret in your choice, that means you must've made the right decision.
Quote.3931: I'm not very good at sensing people's boundaries. Without knowing how far is too far, I gradually get closer and closer. It's terrifying. Being unable to sense that is terrifying.
Quote.3932: A mystery... (Haru says this a lot, usually when it's not a mystery at all)
Quote.3933: Even If evil makes you lose your way, you stay your ground and keep searching for the path of good. Is that search now what justice is? It is for that reason that gods gave mortals knowledge.
Quote.3934: There is no such thing as luck in this world. Rules, prerequisites, psychological states... There are any number of invisible factors that combine to produce an unpredictable, but inevitable result. The winner of each game is decided before it even begins. Chance is never a factor.
Quote.3935: When we were still in the world of living, death was something that came indiscriminately and randomly. So, there was no way to fight it.
Quote.3936: All problems come from the human mind. In the mind, one's consciousness is just the tip of the iceberg. What lies beneath the surface... the subconscious... is far more vast.
Quote.3938: If so many people believe in this, the lies will become reality. That's the so called group mentality.
Quote.3939: If it's fear that you speak of, then I'll stand and face it. I'll never give up. The only time I lose is when I die!
Quote.3940: I guess I'm a girl who lacks self-awareness as one, or just too manly, eh?
Quote.3942: There's no point in the world. But isn't that wonderful? Because if there isn't one, then you can decide what it is for yourself.
Quote.3943: I lost all of what you could call feelings of love. They weren't sealed, so they can't be released. They weren't broken, so they can't be fixed. That which is lost, cannot be recovered.
Quote.3944: I finally get a bouquet and it's a goodbye present. That's depressing.
Quote.3945: The world won't always go the way you want it to. Better not take it to seriously.
Quote.3946: [after winning a game of beach volleyball/"Kuai Ball"] Yes! We defeated you for all time! You will never rise from the ashes of your shame and humiliation! [pause] Well, that was fun.
Quote.3947: Protecting the powerless is simply a soldier's duty!
Quote.3948: No one's gonna save me. People just accept help selfishly, for their own sake.
Quote.3949: Looks like most of what you say immediately vanishes from your head once you say it. I really envy you for a brain with such a lively metabolism.
Quote.3950: *to Rei Miyamoto* I'd be an actor if I could look happy right now.
Quote.3951: I'm actually a hardcore otaku who likes maids more than having three meals a day. And I only read books related to maids. Also, I only visit maid cafes. Of course, I also collect maid figurines. I play games which feature female maids and it turns me on so much. Then I wear maid uniforms and jump in joy. I'll take my leave now.
Quote.3952: Is this God's punishemt for falling in love with an angel? As the gossamer floats ever eluding my grasp, it weighs heavily upon my heart.
Quote.3953: If you only feel fear after knowing both the abilities of your enemy and yourself, flee with your tail between your legs. However, if you're going to stand firm and fight with a focused mind, you will definitely have victory within reach.
Quote.3954: We’re going to explore the outside world someday, right? Far beyond these walls, there’s flaming water land made of ice, and fields of sand spread wide. It’s the world my parents wanted to go to.
Quote.3955: No person can become a replacement for another. Not even the past version of themselves.
Quote.3956: When it comes to catching Spinda, we sure are the Winda!
Quote.3957: Brush my teeth and go to sleep at night. Wake up and eat breakfast in the morning. People do those everywhere. When I realized that everyone did all these things on a daily basis, everything started to feel so boring.
Quote.3958: Sokka, you're supposed to put the tarp on top of the tent. You know, so we don't get rained on?
Quote.3959: Don't lie if you don't have to.
Quote.3960: You cannot go into battle believing you will lose.
Quote.3961: I've always been afraid...Always been pretending to follow you closely, always pretending to sharpen my fangs, when the truth is...I'm scared to death just treading on your shadow.
Quote.3962: Fear beyond rational limits, forces people to cling to normality.
Quote.3963: I'm the one who selfishly decides who's my friend and who's not.
Quote.3964: If you are doing it, I'm doing it. If I don't do it, will you? If you don't do it, I'll do it. I'm doing it so that you'll do it too!!
Quote.3965: Our fates... can be changed. All we have to do is try.
Quote.3966: Words are very powerful. That's why you have to watch everything that comes out from your mouth.
Quote.3967: It's meaningless to just live, and it's meaningless to just fight. I want to win.
Quote.3968: If strength is justice, then is powerlessness a crime?
Quote.3969: Please save everyone. Our crybaby hero!!
Quote.3970: You don't look like you'd be endowned with something so great (To Tohru, referring to "womans intuition")
Quote.3971: With such nice weather, I start thinking about useless things much more than usual. Humans are free. Although we can’t fly through the skies all alone, if we can think it, we can do almost anything. We can sleep when we’re sleepy. We are free to start or stop anything whenever we wish. Of course, it is a bit hindered by common sense, moralities, and the rules of society. Walking nude out in the streets, stealing from the elderly, and even killing, we can do all of this as long as we throw out our morals. Which is why they drill these laws in our head when we are children. And yet, people still continue to fight, deceive, and steal from each other. And so, people suffer because they live. Even now, there are events of happiness and unhappiness going on all over the world. …What can we do to make everyone happy? Of course that’s impossible for me to know. If the answer to that could be found in the shallow wisdoms of a kid, wars would have stopped long ago. But I also dislike just leaving that problem up to society or the government. After all, a great person is just one who follows the popular will of the people. In this world, the essence of a frank honest human is just an idealization. I’m sure that there’s nothing that can make everyone happy. Happiness is relative, and that’s how people want it. Evil is also relative. Mothers can become demons when they do anything to protect their child. Yet it’s usually seen as admirable. But when a person does anything for the country he loves, wars break out. Isn't it all the same thing? No matter how much a person pretends to be good and kind, he will still have negative aspects. But nobody really tries to notice that fact. Why is that? They all try to place the blame on others, and never even consider the possibility that they themselves may have played part in the problem. Just what the heck am I thinking? The world isn't going to change no matter what I think. Then what should I be doing? I don’t really want to do anything. I don’t want to order nor trouble anyone. That’s just laziness, I guess. I don’t go to school nor do I work and I've been wasting my time away since noon. Look at me, talking about the freedom of humans when I’m just some suspicious punk in this town. In conclusion, I have nothing.
Quote.3972: Stand back? [To Kira after Gin asked him to stand back] No, Kira...Run. Run until you're out of my sight, and keep running. Otherwise...I can't guarantee you won't get dragged into this and be killed.
Quote.3973: I have two rules: First, I'm never wrong. Second, if I'm wrong... back to the first rule.
Quote.3974: I don't give a rat's ass about going to hell. I guess it's because I feel like I'm already there.
Quote.3975: If you hurt me, then so be it. Do you think that there is any human in all the world who has never hurt another? You are all so kind...It hurts you to hurt others. That is why I had been hiding my pain, as well.
Quote.3976: If providing people with what they desire is a sin, then all mothers are sinners, and the world is bereft of love.
Quote.3977: If you're gonna hit it, hit it until it breaks!
Quote.3978: Wow, he did it. He's gonna fl- *boosts up to the ceiling and smashes his head*
Quote.3979: [Urahara writes Ichigo a message in blood] Please meet at Urahara shop immediately. [After Ichigo freaked out] P.S: If you look at this message and think that it is the message of a person before his death... then you have no sense of humor.
Quote.3980: "Checkmate" doesn't mean you've simply cornered the enemy king. It's a declaration that the enemy king is yours. That's why I said it the first time I met you. "Checkmate."
Quote.3981: So maybe I can't defend against attacks from multiple angles, but sometimes a good defense is just kicking ass!
Quote.3982: Life is too bitter, so coffee, at least, should be sweet…
Quote.3983: A skilled dictator is much more beneficial to humanity than a democracy of ignorant people.
Quote.3984: After all, most human beings are completely selfish. Eventually, they will meet their desires and try to help others. However, that isn't their only desire, they wish to stir people up. It is simplistically easier to do so anyway, they think it is a stupid ideal to show love to anyone but themselves.
Quote.3985: Perhaps the souls of those we couldn't save, will eventually find their way to my sister. If they do, could they relay a message for me? That I promise to live for her too. And even if she feels a little lonely, just wait there for me for a little while longer.
Quote.3986: I want to break up while I can still say I love you.
Quote.3987: I vowed that earth would forever remain in peace. Since I made that vow, not a single threat has been made against earth. That’s all thanks to the fact that my name is known through the entire galaxy.
Quote.3988: Even when times are at their hardest, don't let it show on your face. If the captain is shaken, the team will waver.
Quote.3989: Are you looking at the stars?.. In the middle of the city? Even though the only stars you can see from here are fake?
Quote.3990: Think you're pretty smart, you old hag. (to Kaede)
Quote.3991: There are some flowers you only see when you take detours.
Quote.3992: It is not wise to judge others based on your own preconceptions and by their appearances.
Quote.3993: I prefer to have my nightmares with open eyes.
Quote.3994: I was not capable of stopping it even while using both hands. That surprised me a little. Was that your full power? Well, it seems to be... disappointing.
Quote.3995: When a person encounters that which they cannot understand, what do they do? Why, they think. But you know, the more you think about something, the further you get from the truth. Yes. Your thoughts get in the way of what your instincts desire. In the way of the real answer.
Quote.3996: Huh? DO whatever you want without DICE? As if someone like you could understand. What's so bad about wanting to reach higher than yourself? After all, you're already up there. The place where I've always longed to be. If anything, isn't this world at fault? There's plenty of proof this world was created unfairly. The Crime rate's higher than ever. Wealth is the determining factor in life, and so when the most prestigious universities held an experiment, "Does appearance affect the outcome in a trail?" When comparing the results of the beautiful and the plain, the beautiful ones were declared innocent more often. Looks decide your worth. LOOKS, SEX, AGE, ETHNICITY, EDUCATION, JOB, once you realize that there will always be a 'High' and 'Low", the goal is clear. Higher... and Higher! I'm sure that looking down from the highest place will be beautiful sight, so I must reach higher!
Quote.3997: I’m seriously in the sh*ttiest mood right now. Piss off, or I’ll kill you.
Quote.3998: You might be able to do it if you try. But if you don't try, you definitely can't.
Quote.3999: Ha ha ha ha! Promise me something, if you're gonna sue, go after the spirit first, okay?
Quote.4000: To define true madness. What is it to be nothing else but mad?
Quote.4001: Freedom can be found at the bottom of your heart.
Quote.4002: It's difficult to change someone's emotions, no matter how they are, so long as they are deeply engraved in the heart. I suppose hatred would be the hardest. Many people will say that hatred fades over time, but that doesn't mean it ever really goes away. It's still there. It's just hiding where you can't see it, and given the slightest chance, it will reassert itself. Now then, given hatred's persistence, what should you do if you can't get rid of it? The only possibility is to overwrite it with an equally powerful emotion – with an emotion as strong as hatred… Yes, those would be love and trust.
Quote.4003: Even though it's painful sometimes, if you keep on living then good things can happen.
Quote.4004: *singing* It's a long long way to BaSingSei, but the girls in the city they look so pretty~!
Quote.4005: A beast in human's clothing understands better than anyone how people want to be treated.
Quote.4006: Once you question your own belief, it's over.
Quote.4007: I'd rather fight for my life than live it.
Quote.4008: (to himself, after revealing to Aang that he was the one who sent Combustion Man) Ugh, why do I have to be so stupid? How could I tell them that I sent an assassin after them? Couldn't I say that Azula did it? They would've believed that! Stupid! (Hits his head)
Quote.4009: 42-42-564 whenever you wanna knock on deaths door.
Quote.4010: Happiness isn't something you divide in halves.
Quote.4011: [to Yammy Rialgo, as the Espada grips the edge of a hole in the floor] Mala Suerte. I pity you. [shoots the floor just before Yammy's hand, causing him to fall] Oh, and I broke the pillars on every floor on the way up. So, you'll probably fall all the way to the bottom.
Quote.4012: Being strong on your own is meaningless. To have power you need other people, and they need a world where they can be at their best.
Quote.4013: I thought that the closer the real and virtual world got, the better the future would be. But the more the boundary between them blurs, the more it starts to trick people.
Quote.4014: The more exciting it was to meet, the sadder it feels to say goodbye, right?
Quote.4015: Copper, 40g; Zinc, 25g; Nickel, 15g; Hiding Embarrassment, 5g and Spite, 97kg.
Quote.4016: Those who close their eyes to the past, become blind to the future.
Quote.4017: The strong feed upon weak. It's such an obligingly simple rule. Except in this world, my friends tried to be strong.
Quote.4018: So, who should we hold responsible? Compensation. Punishment. If you didn't want any problems you shouldn't have taken risks.
Quote.4019: I love the word "fate". Because, you know how they talk about "fated encounters"? A single encounter can completely change your life. Such special encounters are not just coincidences. They're definitely... fate. Of course, life is not all happy encounters. There are many painful, sad moments. But this is what I think: sad and painful things definitely happen for a reason. Nothing in this world is pointless.
Quote.4020: When you're in front of the enemy, even if your hands are trembling - fight.
Quote.4021: The world offers up a choice to live or die. The survival of the fittest that's the only governing law this world recognizes.
Quote.4022: Just 'cause you're a girl, it doesn't mean you have to wait for a prince to come along on a white horse. You can go out and find Prince Charming yourself. It is up to you to find the right boy.
Quote.4023: Every phenomenon that happens in the human world is caused by people for their own convenience.
Quote.4024: You failed to protect your planet, because of your own leniency. The only way to avoid this outcome is to send Frieza back to his flower garden.
Quote.4025: Well excuse me for making you sleep in the wild all the time.
Quote.4026: What could that creep possibly be thinking sending sexy underwear to his own daughter.
Quote.4027: You should treat me with awe and wonder!
Quote.4028: If I give my best and am told that I’m useless, then that’s my own fault. But being considered useless, without having even tried, is something I can’t allow.
Quote.4029: Should we have let people die, all in the name of the law? Isn’t it a hero’s job to save people?
Quote.4030: Women who cannot become princesses have no choice but to become witches.
Quote.4031: The Killer instinct is not perceived by words, but by look
Quote.4032: Forty thousand brothers could not, with all their quantity of love, make up my sum.
Quote.4033: You couldn’t save your mom because you… weren’t strong enough. I didn’t face the Titan… because I wasn’t brave enough.
Quote.4034: It’s not the time to be scared. Of course it’s better if the opponent is strong rather than weak, right!
Quote.4035: Lovers don't need words to communicate.
Quote.4036: No matter how unimportant the meeting... how small the outcome... it will always have some later effect on you. It can be the smallest of things. It can be the shortest of moments. It may never be remembered. It may have never been recorded. But a bond of fate never disappears once tied.
Quote.4037: With a keen eye for detail one truth always prevails.
Quote.4038: Oh, you're one of those guys... You don't care if somebody beats the crap out of you, but if someone lays a finger on a family member, you completely freak out. What a waste...
Quote.4039: When I saw you, I just wanted to find a way to protect you.
Quote.4040: I want nothing more than to be a bayonet; a bayonet wielded by the hand of God. I would have been happy to be born a storm, or a divine threat; a mighty explosion or even a terrible hurricane. A divine force of nature without heart or pity. And if this relic can transform me into such a thing...then I am happy to abandon my humanity.
Quote.4041: Then I ask you, what do you define as the beginning of the sky? At one hundred meter or even one thousand meters, it isn't much different from right here. The sole difference is the air density and water concentration. So, this is where sky begins. Anything above the earth belongs to the domain of sky.
Quote.4042: Work together with everyone, motivating one another...even though they may not be your close friends, you can still understand each another. I'm looking forward to bonding with more people.
Quote.4043: Children don't grow up looking at perfect parents. Rather, using their imperfect parents as anti-teachers, children nourish a spirit of independence.
Quote.4044: I fight to get what I need, and I kill whoever gets in my way. I always have.
Quote.4045: Chastity and grace - traditional virtues that have been lost. They comprise the educational ideology of Ousou Academy. They're priorities that are not valued in boys, only in girls. After having them instilled in us, we're shipped out as brand-name product, refined, sheltered maidens, and purchased by men who seek a classic piece of furniture called "a good wife and mother" in a formality known as marriage. Students in this school are all components that will be processed into an artwork called "the lady". They are rough stones waiting to be polished and finished up. They live sad and boring lives, even though there are many other possible ways they could bloom.
Quote.4047: You're just an overnight shinigami. You couldn't put one scratch on us real ones.
Quote.4048: It must really be a lonelier journey than anyone could imagine. Cutting through absolute darkness, encountering nothing but the occasional hydrogen atom. Flying blindly into the abyss, believing therein lie the answers to the mysteries of the universe.
Quote.4049: If it means mankind will live on, I don't mind being called a murderer
Quote.4050: But that's enough. If there is overwhelming power and speed, there is no room for technique. Techniques are something humans invented to compensate for their weaknesses.
Quote.4051: The way you perceive yourself doesn't match the way others perceive you. Those who work hard despite that discrepancy shine brighter than anyone else!
Quote.4052: Never send a boy to do a mans job.
Quote.4053: People become stronger because they have things they cannot forget. That's what you call growth.
Quote.4054: Even if other people think it’s meaningless, it’s disgusting for me to quit, even when the possibility is 0. Therefore, I will never... Give up !
Quote.4055: Do we really have to fight, Yama-jii?
Quote.4056: If a prediction is right, then it's like you only have one future. Like that future has been decided. But if it's wrong, then you have an almost infinite number of possibilities. And that means that even the tiniest twist of fate can change your future. I want to believe that I have choices - that the path I walk has many different turns, and many different roads to follow!
Quote.4057: They are two types of people. Those who let go and those who are let go. How many times have I watched people leave up until now? I may have been able to reach them if I'd reached out, but I was afraid of being pushed away, so I simply watched them disappear into the distance.
Quote.4058: I shall grieve, and I shall weep. But I shall never regret.
Quote.4059: But... When I lost the whole foundation of my happiness in one instant, I realized that I was the biggest coward in the world.
Quote.4060: A clever retreat? Throw that to the dogs! Once you've dived into the battlefield, you can only devote yourself to the fight, regardless of your opponent!
